story:
The Problem at Hand 

In our current day and age, we are all making changes in our personal and professional lives; as a result, we are all using our hands now more than ever before. With all this usage, you would assume there is a proportional effort to take care of our hands. Unfortunately, this isn't the case and this has gotta change!!! The lack of active care for our hands is a direct contributor to early onset arthritis, cases of carpal tunnel syndrome, along with leaving people to endure limited mobility in their hands; none of these factors will let you live your best hand life.

 

The Handy Solution:

This is where Earth Bones comes in!!! We went out and brought together two natural and easy to use tools that work with body reflexology to ensure that your hands will have the care they need and you deserve. 

Introducing Earth Bones Crystalline Baoding Balls and Multicoloured Acupressure Rings.

 

With this combination, you will go from hand no to hand yea in an instant. The acupressure rings deliver relief via the spikey points that make up the structure of the ring. All one needs to do is roll the ring down your fingers and the spiked points will massage the often forgotten muscles in your digits. In addition, reflexology shows that the nerves in your fingers connect deeply to the rest of your body, so when using the ring you will also feel a wave of relief travel throughout your body. With regular practice using the rings you will begin to form a deeper connection to your hands and the body carries us along the best life has to in store for you. 

While the rings bring relief to your fingers, using the orbs builds creates longevity within the whole of your hands. The orbs do this by effectively utilizing the body’s interconnected muscle structure; in other words, by swirling the orbs around in your hand you will be stretching and strengthening the back of your hand, your forearm, the back of your arm and your upper shoulder all while blood flow is stimulated throughout your body.   

 

 

Bonus benefit!!! Regularly practicing with the orbs helps to stimulate the left brain. In a 2013 study carried out by Montclair State University, they found that clenching a ball in one's left hand increased neurological activity in the frontal lobe of the opposite hemisphere, measurably increasing creativity, memory and sensory processing information. With just 10 minutes of practice using your new baoding balls in your left hand, you can reap those same benefits no university lab required. ? 

 

What do my orbs come with?

Each set of orbs will come with an acupressure ring, two wooden stands for your orbs, a pitch of sage to bring good fortune, a sticker with the name of your orb type and a small guide book to help you understand your orbs better with a stone specific poem at the end. All this comes within a blank box house for your orbs, which you will be able to fully decorate any way you like the best box is sure to win prizes on our Instagram page @earthbonez.

 

How do I know my hand size?

That is a great question, we want your orbs to fit like a glove; so to find the best fit for your hands we measured the breadth width of your palms. Through our rigorous testing as well as cross referencing the average hand sizes from NASA’s Anthropometry and Biomechanic report. We have found that:

For ladies hands the best fit is 43mm

While for male hands the best is 52mm

In future we will also offer orbs in the ranges of 48mm and 60mm so the hands that are made to hold a little more love then the rest won't be left out. Otherwise, these two sizes should cover the majority of hand sizes.

 

Metaphysical Benefits

With Earth Bones Orbs you are not only getting physical benefits that the baoding balls have to offer but also metaphysical ones; all of Earth Bones orbs are made from energy crystals that can be utilized by reiki healers and many other energy adept practitioners. For distinction, Earth Bones has separated the crystals by their effects on the mind and the emotional body. 

The Mind Edition: 

This Amethyst is particularly unique due to the bands that are apart of its aesthetic this crystal is stronger than your normal Amethyst linking the third eye and crown chakras together. This important channel is useful when attuning and aligning yourself with higher energies and frequencies. Meditating with this stone will increase the clarity and imagination of one’s dreams and the messages that lay within. This is an excellent life guidance stone for when one feels like they need a little direction from the universe.

 

This stone was chosen to be a part of Earth Bones starting line up to help you see yourself and your hands in a brand new purple light and to align you with messages from your higher self. 

 

Lapis Lazuli has fascinated humanity from early in our history, worn and sought after by King and Queens alike to signify royalty status and connection to higher conciseness. Modern users report many of these same traits remaining true. Lapis Lazuli is a stone to seek out deeper knowledge of self and the universe, heal and strengthen the throat chakra, as well as aid the process of life long learning. It is also happens to be an excellent stone for the written word and communication, even, helping to write the words for Earth Bones campaign :D

Lapis Lazuli was chosen to be apart of Earth Bones starting line up so that you will have the tools to connect to your hands and your higher self, helping you live your best hand life. 

 

Emotions Edition:

Another old stone of humanity, Clear Quartz has been assisting us spiritually and scientifically for years. For the energy adept, clear quartz is also nicknamed "The Master Stone" so named for the plethora of uses one can utilize and program clear quartz to help with solving. Need assistance in your personal healing? Clear Quartz, want a little boost in your manifestation? Clear Quartz; you even want to help power quantium comupters that will help explore the cosmos .... yeah clear quartz has got you there too. You name it and Clear Quartz will help you with it, Earth Bones is pleased to be offering this stone in its beginning line up to allow you and your hand to experience all that Clear as Quartz has to offer.

Clear Quartz was selected as one of the beginning stones as an homage to the history of crystal healing and to give you a boost in your future manifestations.

 

Arguably the mascot for crystal healing and likely the first stone many obtained along their journey, Rose Quartz is another stone that humanity has a long history with ever since it was used as a token of love back in 600 BCE. Speaking of love, that is Rose Quartz’s specialty; use this stone when you want to feel a little more love in your life or attract a little more love in their too. But don't think Rose Quartz is a one-trick pony, this stone is also a great amplifier in manifestations and will allow one to see a different perspective in themselves while performing inner work.

Rose Quartz was chosen to feature in Earth Bone starting line up to make sure the world received just a touch much more love amidst all the craziness of 2020.

 

The History of Baoding Balls:

Initially created during the Ming Dynasty 1368 - 1644 in the small town of Baoding in the North China Plain, the orbs have accumulated many names: Relaxation balls, Medicine balls, Zen balls, but the real name is Baoding balls so named after the town they originally came from in Baoding. Traditionally, Baoding balls are made from either chrome metal or iron, but they have been made from other materials such as walnuts too. the orbs were always meant to tools used for one's hands, originally they were given to generals to increase their intellegence before being repurposed for general bodliy mantiance. Boading balls have always been meant for the body and now we have the opportunity to build on the orbs orginal purpose to help all hands and to write the next chapter in the use of the Baoding balls to help everyone with hand pain find the relief that their hands need and that you deserve. 

 

Thanks so much for your time and your generosity, your better hands look forward to meeting you

story:
The Product.

With Gerly Heir Swim Caps, we will help women embrace their legacy, health, and future, by protecting their crowns!  Kinky, braided, locked, or smoothed, our hair is unprotected by the current swim retail industry and this acts a major barrier to learning and competing.

Your generous contribution will support a hydrodynamic and hydrophobic (water-fearing) cap that keeps hair healthy and ensures more natural curly-kinky-braided-locked-smoothed crowns learn, train in, and compete in swimming.

Gerly Heir Swim Cap provides every woman with the confidence to know she belongs in the water and the water belongs to her.

The Need.

Africans were considered the world’s greatest swimmers and divers. We were taken very far and we have come very far. Women are claiming their inheritance and crowning a new legacy of the waters. Thank you 2016 Olympic Gold Medal Winners and 2015 NCAA 100 Yard Freestyle champions! We want more and we need more, but nearly 80 percent of African-American’s are uncomfortable with water, and are 3 to 4 times more likely to drown. It is time to claim our inheritance and enter the waters.

The Opportunity & Talent.

Comprised of African-American women with decades of extensive professional and academic training, our collaborative is uniquely qualified to tune and improve swim caps for anyone sporting kinks, braids, locks, or exceptionally long hair. Go here to learn more about us!

We need you in order to produce better performing fabric and conduct usability tests on our preliminary prototypes. In addition to a thank you gift, each donor will receive a big social media thank you our Twitter feed and Our Digital 'Wall' on the website.

Risks and Challenges.

From naming the product, to preliminary sketches, to creating prototypes, you told us how we should make this cap. We want to make it, and we need your help to pay to develop and manufacture our prototypes.

Supply Chain Risks

Much still needs to be learned about volume manufacturing. Initially, we plan to make 200 caps.   Getting the right quality controls takes time, and it's crucial. The result we are aiming for—a lower defect rate than most mature products by overseeing the entire production process, start to finish.

Fulfillment Risks

We'll be ready for addressing fulfillment, and are developing an automated order fulfillment schema.

Other Ways You Can Help.

We understand it's a difficult time financially for a lot of folks—but that doesn’t mean you can’t help:

  • You can help us get the word out by sharing information about this project on social media networks like Twitter, Reddit, or Facebook.
  • You can also use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
There is a new kid on the block, a silent killer that kills 480.000 people yearly that's roughly 1 per minute... The time  you'll spend learning about this about 300 people died...Spoiler alert... It's getting WORSE and will worsen for the next 15 years...

At Friends and Company, we have a unique solution to the problem that does not currently exist in the marketplace today.  Our vetted multi-faceted approach from brick and mortar locations to our SaaS (Matchmaker, Care Portal) and our new social media app “is novel, scientifically sound and will greatly increase the length and quality of life of more than       50, 000, 000 people in the US”. 

We are anchored by a female founder with a very strong and diversified management team and board of directors who have the skill-set and backgrounds needed to drive this solution.

We are looking for like-minded people who believe in our mission and want to join us in this life saving mission.

What We Need & What You Get

We are looking to raise $150,000.00 dollars to bring our SaaS- Matchmaker, Care-Portal live and will help us launch our Social Media site.  Every penny we get will be spent towards completing our life saving mission and bring to life  “The Bucket List Initiative” … Think of it like  a make a wish foundation for older adults…

Now we need you to be the Super Hero, our backer, a life saver !

Every backing of $25 or more will  get a limited 1st edition Friends and Company 1st
T-Shirt- with the “Original Backer” Tag !

Any backing of $100 or more will be able to participate in Beta testing of the App (Locations for Testers must be, USA or Canada). (plus the shirt)

Any backing  of $1000 or more will be invited to the Private Launch Party in Phoenix, Arizona (travel expenses are not covered). (plus shirt and Beta testing)

Any Backing of $1500 or more will have a special spot on our Wall of Superhero Backers ! (you guessed it, the spot plus all of the above)

The Impact

Together we will save lives, make the world a better place.  Help our less fortunate, our hurting people,  our LOVED ONES.  

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand money is tight for most of you and if you cannot contribute monetarily, in exchange please: 

  • get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  •  use the Indiegogo share tools!

Together we can make a difference.

story:
The "Why"

  • Natural skin care started off as a hobby. As I experimented with various formulas to try to make the best ones, I started to get interest from my friends and followers on social media to offer them commercially.  
  • By supporting my campaign you can help me turn my hobby into a side business that will help me fund going back to school. 

What We Need & What You Get

I like to use these fundraisers (this is my 4th one!) as market research. Your purchase will determine which products go forward.  I've realized over the years after putting lots of money into projects that went nowhere,  that just because I like something or it gets a ton of attention on social media doesn't mean it's a financially viable or desirable product. 

All the money raised goes into making the products ordered, getting supplies for new products.  Perks range from the products themselves to some of my personal artwork (some prints, some one of a kind) to items produced in previous fundraisers & will be updated frequently throughout the fundraiser.  

The Impact

  • My products are valuable because natural skin care is important.  Your skin is your largest organ, yet so many people slather it with chemicals that are then absorbed by your body.  If you look at the ingredients in main brands carried in stores, most of the ingredients are words you can't even pronounce, much less know what exactly they are.  
  • I have done 3 other campaigns for ventures and have delivered what was promised in each one.  

Feedback Given Thus Far on Test Products 

"the more i am using it, the more i like the way my skin feels when i get out of the shower. i do LOVE the oatmeal on the bottom, feels wonderful!" - Dannica

"the lip balm is a perfect blend - not too waxy, not too oily and it lasts much longer than others I have tried" - Terry

"Beautiful presentation so much so I felt guilty to get it wet. I unwrapped my treasure with ease and immediately noticed the flowering detail both on and in the soap. A sculpture of femininity! I next noticed the texture and literally couldn't believe it wasn't butter! So creamy, smooth and luxurious. I felt like i was holding a heart shaped dollop of body butter in the palm of my hand. The smell is light, clean and pleasant. BUT! the bath is where this beauty really shines! My water smelled lovely, the flowers posed zero issues and felt nice on my skin. Soap gets a bad wrap of drying out the skin but that was not the case! my skin felt both clean and moisturized. I wasn't itchy in the least and felt like I had already applied lotion. Again the smell was pleasant and gently lingered on my skin." - Jen

"It keeps my beard really soft"  - Juan

"I really like the body butter. It's so thick but it doesn't feel greasy at all. I love the neutral scent.  I only really could smell it when I first put it on and that faded quickly."  - Jeanette

Other Ways You Can Help

Re-posting this link on social media is a HUGE help- Facebook, Instragram, Twitter & Tumblr

story:
PENDL Vision

Revolutionize the exercise solution marketplace with accessible, affordable, zero impact technologies, for home, gym, studio, and outdoors that enable all amateurs and athletes alike to achieve higher levels of fitness through simple access to fun and efficient full body exercise.

 

The Inventor- Framuaro Fortich-Perez 

Framauro Fortich-Perez, creator of the PENDL, had long suffered immobility and chronic back pain. He consulted many physicians and therapists in various modalities of healing without success. After years of finding no relief, he decided to take his freedom into his own hands.

So he combined his expertise in martial arts, dancing, and engineering to invent and create a solution to regain his mobility!  The PENDL is the product that emerged and Framauro is immensely humbled and eternally happy to be sharing his invention with the world. His passion for movement is contagious. PENDL allowed him to regain his mobility and with that he has his life back as well.  Because of the incredible health benefits of the PENDL his mission is to make PENDL available for everyone who needs it.

PENDL In Action! 

PENDL allows users to safely float, stand, stretch, spin and swing in the air all while standing on foot platforms. Complete suspension in the air is possible, but not necessary, to utilize the various functions of the device. The ability to float and move freely while on the device allows users increased mobility, flexibility and circulation. It’s a rush! What users can achieve on the PENDL truly cannot be compared to any other form of exercise or therapy currently on the market. 

The applications are endless, from basic agility improvement to dynamic aerial training for the thrill seekers. In fact, PENDL is already being put to the test through a specialized scientific study of it’s utility. Not to mention the endless joy and laughter we see when we get to share the PENDL with someone new.

The PENDL is fun! You will be flying around in your backyard and your neighbors will be asking you how to get their own! 

 

Rehab.Fitness.Fun.

Rehab- 

In spring of 2020, we put the PENDL to the test using evidence based research. At Middle  Tennessee State University’s Exercise Science Lab, a PhD candidate conducted an 8 week clinical  trial research study using the PENDL on individuals who experienced low back pain. The initial  results show promise in what the PENDL can do for alleviating low back pain. We are pleased to  present the following initial results of our first preliminary study, while these figurers are on an  “Average” and do not show the “Statistical Significance”: 

‣ 76% Reduction in Back Pain 

‣ 31% Increase in Back Extension 

‣ 21% Increase in Back Flexion 

‣ 28% Increase in Peak Power 

‣ 25% Increase in Average Power 

‣ 14% Increase in Back Strength 

‣ 81% Increase in Seconds Held in Plank Position 

‣ 9% Increase in Daily Average Physical Activity Steps 

Fitness-

With PENDL, fitness is fun! Try something fun to burn those calories in the comfort of your own home or in a fitness facility with others. Harness up, it’s time to fly! The PENDL is ready to be safely installed anywhere. Start putting the Fun in Fitness! 

Fun!-

PENDL will make you feel like the surfer on a wave. The rush of endorphins released when riding the PENDL is exhilarating. It feels like you are flying. You will be inspired to discover your body on another level, just by playing! Your inner child will thank you. 

Testimonials-

Tasha Allen, Occupational Therapist and Dancer said,

"Five years ago I tore my calf muscle while dancing and I have had chronic knee pain since then. I was given exercises by a Physical Therapist to strengthen the muscles around my knee but had difficulty doing them because of pain. The PENDL provided me an exercise program that freed me from pain. It was amazing how I was able to move my knee through every exercise without pain! Finally after three weeks of doing the rehab program with the PENDL I have the freedom to do the activity I love without limitations...Dancing!” 

 

Dion, MTSU Study Candidate said, 

"I came into the PENDL study to alleviate my back pain. I have had back pain my entire life and just using the PENDL for 3 hours a week for 8 weeks made an amazing difference in alleviating not only my back pain but it gave me a greater range of motion. And, Also, it gave me an overall sense of well-being and fitness and I can't live without it and I want one!"


 

PENDL-Development

Future-

This is just the beginning of what the PENDL can do. The PENDL is scientifically proven to improve mobility and ROM (range of motion).  The PENDL team knows that the proof is really in the smiles the PENDL brings onto everyone who tries it.  Because the PENDL is more than en exercise activity or rehab utility. Riding the PENDL  brings pure joy and freedom! 


Manufacturing & Installation-

PENDL is Patent Pending. The PENDL can be used in various locations under various configurations. Inside a home using the ceiling trusses / studs  or outside between two trees in the backyard. We recommend having installation done by a professional home contractor.

 

PEDNL  Timeline

Partners-

Our early partners will benefit in the journey of making the PENDL a commercially available product that you, your friends and family, fitness and rehabilitation institutions can purchase and use for a lifetime. You will be the first in a quickly growing community around this activity that will bring everyone together to play! We’ve been amazed how we’ve seen the PENDL spark curiosity and creativity in everyone who tries it.  

If you would like to partner with us please email info@thependl.com
 

Invitation-

Join us on the ground floor of a revolutionary product that serves as a platform with infinite applications. Our team and our early PENDL participants have all fallen in love with their PENDL.  We are eager to share this product with the world. We are very proud to share such a life-changing fitness tool. 

The PENDL has truly made it’s own path by sustaining all the creators, team members, and participants along the way, we are always playing on the PENDL, which brings energy and vitality to our team even on the most difficult of days.  We LOVE the PENDL and we think you will too!

Reserve yours today and join us on this journey to making fitness fun around the world. Welcome to the PENDL family! 

 

Thank you! 

The Team at PENDL Enterprises
story_txt:
PENDL VisionRevolutionize the exercise solution marketplace with accessible, affordable, zero impact technologies, for home, gym, studio, and outdoors that enable all amateurs and athletes alike to achieve higher levels of fitness through simple access to fun and efficient full body exercise. The Inventor- Framuaro Fortich-Perez Framauro Fortich-Perez, creator of the PENDL, had long suffered immobility and chronic back pain. He consulted many physicians and therapists in various modalities of healing without success. After years of finding no relief, he decided to take his freedom into his own hands.So he combined his expertise in martial arts, dancing, and engineering to invent and create a solution to regain his mobility!  The PENDL is the product that emerged and Framauro is immensely humbled and eternally happy to be sharing his invention with the world. His passion for movement is contagious. PENDL allowed him to regain his mobility and with that he has his life back as well.  Because of the incredible health benefits of the PENDL his mission is to make PENDL available for everyone who needs it.PENDL In Action! PENDL allows users to safely float, stand, stretch, spin and swing in the air all while standing on foot platforms. Complete suspension in the air is possible, but not necessary, to utilize the various functions of the device. The ability to float and move freely while on the device allows users increased mobility, flexibility and circulation. It’s a rush! story:
Why are we doing this? 

The answer is simple: We want to use our experience with Stage IV Colon Cancer to benefit as many cancer fighters as we can reach. 

 If you want to know more about our journey, you can watch the video above or read it HERE. For everyone else, we will spare you the details and get to the punchline!

The Founders, Jamison and Rachel Dye

 

Meticulously Sourced Products, Delivered to Cancer Fighters

The Cancer Box is filled with life-giving products we have meticulously researched & sourced, and ship to cancer patients monthly. We work with doctors to continuously research and gather the highest quality set of vitamins & supplements possible.​

Each month is different, and often builds upon the themes of previous months, but the foundation is always the following Supplements and Vitamins: 

1. Curcumin (Check out this video to learn why)

2. Mushroom Extract (Check out this blog post to learn why)

3. Vitamin C (Check out this blog post to learn why)

4. Melatonin (Check out this video to learn why)

5. Vitamin D3/K2 

6.  Moringa Leaf ​

These will be the core of the box! Each one has a proven track record in clinical studies to aid in the fight against cancer and there are detailed instructions & explanations for each.​

In order to keep costs down and give time to ease into the new diet changes, the first month contains a two month supply of half of the supplements, the second month provides the remaining half. This pattern continues to ensure you always have what you need!​

On top of that foundation:​ We also pack each box with carefully curated items that range between snacks, cancer-fighting recipes, side-effect aids, swag, healthy eating guides, & inspirational content.​

Each month is a new theme, focusing on dietary, emotional, mental and spiritual support! 

Note: As with any nutritional changes during cancer treatment, we make sure that any recipient of The Cancer Box has discussed these changes with their primary doctor! If the full list of supplements are not approved by the doctor, we can make changes to the contents of the box and adjust pricing accordingly.

 

 

Our plans don't stop there... Behind the scenes, we are using profit from this endeavor and working to support cancer fighters at home and abroad with the tools they need.

 

We are preparing and need your help!  

 Boxes are designed, we are ready to order, pack, and ship. The budget and plan are in place...Now all we need is your support and engagement!

 

 

We have done all we can to make this project successful...it is now up to you to get the word out and support the cause!  

 

Still want to learn more? 

Visit our website, or check us out on Facebook, Instagram, or Youtube!

 

 

Risks and Challenges:

Supply Chain
As we will be working with a variety of manufacturers, there could be unforeseen issues that arise that we will need to resolve. We are confident that we can plan for some of these unknowns and always have a back-up plan for sourcing issues for our box. 

Medical Community Support
It is important to us that we have the continued support of the Medical Community. We recognize that we are fitting a unique niche and want to make sure we always provide a balanced perspective between many different camps. We are working hard to foster the support of the community and see this as being vital to the long-term success of The Cancer Box. Because this topic can be so visceral for so many people, we continue to see this as a challenge to press through.

story:
CLEAN YOURSELF AND THE PLANET 

On behalf of the Gift Wellness team, thank you for checking out our campaign. 

A bit about us and what we're passionate about

  • Gift Wellness was founded by Dr Zareen Roohi Ahmed from Derby, UK. She initially created a range of natural anion sanitary wear, which has benefited women from all walks of life, including women who buy our products; and women such as refugees and homeless women - who we donate sanitary pads to for free.
  • We're always on the look out for solutions to problems and ways that we can benefit people. Undoubtedly, the biggest problem that we all face right now is the pollution of our planet caused by decades of plastic waste. 

  • Everyone is talking about how plastic waste is destroying our land, rivers, oceans and wildlife - but what can we do at an individual level? Well one of the main sectors that is responsible for single use plastic waste is toiletries such as shampoos, conditioners, body washes, face washes and hand washes. So our aim is for every bathroom to become plastic free!

The magnitude of what you will help us achieve:

  • Our goal is to create a cultural shift in every community and every household, to stop using personal cleansing products such as liquid shampoo, conditioner, body-wash and soap that are packaged in plastic - and opt for cleansing products in the form of bars instead. If everyone eliminated the plastic waste from their bathrooms, can you imagine what a difference it would make to the environment? 

  • The amazing this is that you won't have to compromise on the convenience or quality when it comes to our new range of cleansing bars. In fact they're so much better than the liquids. 

  • All the cleansing bars in our range contain Epsom Salts (excluding children's). Each bar is carefully blended with natural vegan blends and organic essential oils, that have specific health benefits. There are no synthetic fragrances and no SLS/SLES's or parabens. 

  •  Join us in this campaign and let's send a message to the big manufacturers that we don't want plastic packaging any more.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Help us to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • Simply use the Indiegogo share tools!

Any Questions? Don't hesitate to get in touch.

Thank you for your support!

story:
We have a limited supply of My Pullup Bars
available to ship in December 2019 

 

Make those Impossible Pull-ups - POSSIBLE

 

Push-ups and Pull-up are the two best exercises you can do to add shape and tone to your upper body -- ask anyone who has been to boot camp?

The Problem

  • Most women (not all) Can't do Pull-ups
  • Most men, if they've Added a few Pounds or Years - Can't do Pull-ups
  • They both hate being confined or bolting anything to a doorway
  • And hate pausing their workout to run to the garage or closet to do pull-ups 

 

The Solution  

Don't Neglect half Your Upper Body
Because You Can't do Pull-ups

Pull-up bars are GREAT - If you can use them?

  • But how many Women buy pull-up bars?
  • How many men, who have added a few pounds or years, are buying pull-up bars?
  • How many people like pausing their workout to run to the garage or closet to do pull-ups in a doorway?

Because it's PORTABLE, you have the freedom to workout in your living room, outside, the office, on the road! 

You can't do that with various door or wall mounted pull-up bars!

 
,
Now, both Men and Women can add shape and tone to their upper body by doing inverted pull-ups.

Inverted pull-ups are what knee push-ups are to a regular push-up.  They allow you to 'off-load' some of your body weight, so you can reap the benefits of the exercise.

Often times you will see people doing inverted pull-ups at the gym on the Smith machine or squat rack? 

Who has space for those machines in their house?

Inverted Pull-ups work you back, biceps and forearms - just like a regular pull-up, PLUS it also targets your upper back muscles, which you don't work when you do a regular pull-up. 

 

Why Push-ups and Pull-ups?

These two exercises target all the major muscles of your upper body!

  • Push-ups target your chest, shoulders and triceps...half your upper body!
  • Pull-ups hit your back, biceps and forearms...the other half of your upper body!

You wouldn't work your biceps without also hitting your triceps - so why would you do Push-ups and Not include Pull-ups?

From the Sports Medicine Perspective

If you ONLY do push-ups and Neglect pull-ups - you're creating muscle imbalance and setting yourself up for possible unexplained aches and pains. 

 

Don't forget, most people spend their life with their shoulders pulled forward from computers, laptops, cell phones, driving, reading, etc....which shortens and tightens your pec muscles.  So, if you ONLY doing push-ups and neglect pull-ups, you will exacerbate the muscle imbalance in Your Upper Body. 

My 5 Minute Workout

Research shows that short, high intensity workouts will drive up your testosterone (TT) and growth hormone (GH) about as much as a 30-45 minute weight training session.  That's the real secret.  It's these two hormones TT and GH that build lean muscle and burn fat!

The key that drives these 2 hormones is your Intensity.  

Your Goal is to do as many Push-ups and Pull-ups as you can - in 5 Minutes!   

It's that Simple - No Gimmicks!  This is the workout I follow and I'm in my 7th decade!

Eat Right - Train Smart!
Learn more in To Burn or Not to Burn, Fat is the Question and The 10 Biggest Workout Mistakes.  These are the Perks that will help you Eat Right and Train Smart!

 

If your goal is to be on the cover of a bodybuilding magazine, you need to spend hours in a gym.  But if you are like the other 80% of the population, who simply wants to add some lean muscle and drop some body fat - My 5 Minute Push-Pull Workout is ideal for you. 

Yes, You can make your pull-ups harder!

My Portable Pullup Bar is the perfect addition to any home gym or anyone with limited space.

Five minutes of an 'anaerobic' Push-Pull workout - before or after your 'aerobic' walk, jog, treadmill, elliptical workout, or dance routine will give you both the aerobic and anaerobic workout for optimum fat burning and muscle building.

It’s a great addition to any body sculpting class or boot camp

It makes a perfect gift for the start of the New Year!

 

Easy to Assemble

 

Reviews and Testimonials for My Portable Pullup Bar...aka...My WorkHorse
 

  • As a personal Trainer and gym owner, My Portable Pullup Bar is always being used. My ladies and guys are always using it. I’m going to have to get more!

Allura C

  • I think every trainer should be using the Portable Pull-up Bar. It is easy enough to take with you and will probably become a staple item in all gyms the same way exercise benches and balls have become

Doug Atkinson Dallas Mavericks Trainer, retired

  • Finally a simple way for everyone to be able to do pull-ups at home. What a great idea. I think the Work Horse is a must have for anyone who likes to train at home

Doug Caporrino Celebrity Trainer, Author and Speaker

  • My Portable Pullup Bar is multi-purpose, easy to transport and doesn’t break the bank!

PFP Fitness Magazine

  • I have been training on the WorkHorse and I really like it. So quick and convenient. I can really get a lot done in a short amount of time. And it targets the muscles groups that matter!!! 

Darin Steen, Drug Free Bodybuilder Personal Trainer & Fitness Advisor to Dr. Mercola

  • Given the sturdy construction, extreme usefulness to anyone who struggles with pull-ups, and easy storage I give this product a solid A-minus! My 17 year old daughter who can barely do one pull-up was able to do 8 pull-ups with the WorkHorse

Weight Loss Headquarters

  • I think this is the next great piece of equipment everyone should have in their home. You can train all those upper body muscles with The Portable Pullup Bar

Elizabeth Sparks INFF Champion, Ms Fit Galaxy

  • Muscle imbalance is a huge problem that contributes to upper back and neck pain that contributes to the fact that most people only do pushups for their upper body and not enough pull-ups simply because they can’t, I think the Portable Pullup Bar definitely addresses that problem

Dr. Gary Wilkerson University. of Tennessee; Head Athletic Trainer

  • I think the Work Horse is a simple idea that is genius. Only fit males can do pull-ups, but when you can off-load their body weight, now everyone can get the benefits of pull-ups

Dr. Cliff Sheats Bestselling Author

 

Folds-up for easy storage 

 

How the idea came about

After I got married, like a good husband, I asked my wife, if this is the right height to hang my pull-up bar.  She quickly responded and said, "there is No Way you are hanging that ...bleppity, blep Pull-up bar...in My Kitchen!

It's said that "necessity is the Mother of Invention" 

As a strength and conditioning coach and chiropractor I knew the importance of these two complementary exercises from the muscle development aspect to the sports medicine perspective.

So after several prototypes, modifications and manufacturing searches, I started manufacturing My Portable Pullup Bar a few years ago.  I've sourced manufacturing domestically, south of the border and overseas, and have finally found a reliable manufacturer who can provide a quality product.

Our reviews are great and demand is increasing, so I need the help of the Indiegogo family in launching another production run.

The Perks (our ebooks) are filled with great information.

We hope to start overseas shipping soon, so any help to get us there would be well appreciated. 

 We plan to start shipping in January on 2020.  Although some of our early backers will get theirs Pullup Bar in a couple of weeks. 

I hope you can share the message with others.  I appreciate your time and consideration.

Research shows that short, high intensity workouts will drive up your testosterone (TT) and growth hormone (GH) about as much as a 30-45 minute weight training session.  That's the real secret.  It's these two hormones TT and GH that build lean muscle and burn fat!
The key that drives these 2 hormones is your Intensity.  
Your Goal is to do as many Push-ups and Pull-ups as you can - in 5 Minutes!   
It's that Simple - No Gimmicks!  This is the workout I follow and I'm in my 7th decade!

Eat Right - Train Smart!Learn more in To Burn or Not to Burn, Fat is the Question and The 10 Biggest Workout Mistakes.  These are the Perks that will help you Eat Right and Train Smart!

 
If your goal is to be on the cover of a bodybuilding magazine, you need to spend hours in a gym.  But if you are like the other 80% of the population, who simply wants to add some lean muscle and drop some body fat - My 5 Minute Push-Pull Workout is ideal for you. 
Yes, You can make your pull-ups harder!

My Portable Pullup Bar is the perfect addition to any home gym or anyone with limited space.
Five minutes of an 'anaerobic' Push-Pull workout - before or after your 'aerobic' walk, jog, treadmill, elliptical workout, or dance routine will give you both the aerobic and anaerobic workout for optimum fat burning and muscle building.
It’s a great addition to any body sculpting class or boot camp
It makes a perfect gift for the start of the New Year!
 
Easy to Assemble

 
Reviews and Testimonials for My Portable Pullup Bar...aka...My WorkHorse 

As a personal Trainer and gym owner, My Portable Pullup Bar is always being used. My ladies and guys are always using it. I’m going to have to get more!
Allura C

I think every trainer should be using the Portable Pull-up Bar. It is easy enough to take with you and will probably become a staple item in all gyms the same way exercise benches and balls have become
Doug Atkinson Dallas Mavericks Trainer, retired
Finally a simple way for everyone to be able to do pull-ups at home. What a great idea. I think the Work Horse is a must have for anyone who likes to train at home
Doug Caporrino Celebrity Trainer, Author and Speaker

My Portable Pullup Bar is multi-purpose, easy to transport and doesn’t break the bank!
PFP Fitness Magazine
I have been training on the WorkHorse and I really like it. So quick and convenient. I can really get a lot done in a short amount of time. And it targets the muscles groups that matter!!! 
Darin Steen, Drug Free Bodybuilder Personal Trainer & Fitness Advisor to Dr. Mercola

Given the sturdy construction, extreme usefulness to anyone who struggles with pull-ups, and easy storage I give this product a solid A-minus! My 17 year old daughter who can barely do one pull-up was able to do 8 pull-ups with the WorkHorse
Weight Loss Headquarters
I think this is the next great piece of equipment everyone should have in their home. You can train all those upper body muscles with The Portable Pullup Bar
Elizabeth Sparks INFF Champion, Ms Fit Galaxy

Muscle imbalance is a huge problem that contributes to upper back and neck pain that contributes to the fact that most people only do pushups for their upper body and not enough pull-ups simply because they can’t, I think the Portable Pullup Bar definitely addresses that problem
Dr. Gary Wilkerson University. of Tennessee; Head Athletic Trainer
I think the Work Horse is a simple idea that is genius. Only fit males can do pull-ups, but when you can off-load their body weight, now everyone can get the benefits of pull-ups
Dr. Cliff Sheats Bestselling Author

 
Folds-up for easy storage 

 
How the idea came about
After I got married, like a good husband, I asked my wife, if this is the right height to hang my pull-up bar.  She quickly responded and said, "there is No Way you are hanging that ...bleppity, blep Pull-up bar...in My Kitchen!
It's said that "necessity is the Mother of Invention" 
As a strength and conditioning coach and chiropractor I knew the importance of these two complementary exercises from the muscle development aspect to the sports medicine perspective.
So after several prototypes, modifications and manufacturing searches, I started manufacturing My Portable Pullup Bar a few years ago.  I've sourced manufacturing domestically, south of the border and overseas, and have finally found a reliable manufacturer who can provide a quality product.
Our reviews are great and demand is increasing, so I need the help of the Indiegogo family in launching another production run.
The Perks (our ebooks) are filled with great information.
We hope to start overseas shipping soon, so any help to get us there would be well appreciated. 
 We plan to start shipping in January on 2020.  Although some of our early backers will get theirs Pullup Bar in a couple of weeks. 
I hope you can share the message with others.  I appreciate your time and consideration.

story:
Climbro is a highly efficient training system for improving climbing performance based on 10 years of scientific research. The hangboard has 8 hold depths, integrated force sensors and a Bluetooth connection to the mobile app providing real-time feedback of the applied force.

Climbro assesses your finger strength and endurance and shows your climbing potential. It is your pocket trainer that gives you a personal training plan and guides you during exercise execution.

Climbro is an all-in-one climbing training tool with all the features you need for optimal and efficient training.

 

Climbro navigates you through the fastest route to send your project. No need to spend time researching how to train. We have done it for you. Just focus on following your training journey.

 

The first thing to do with Climbro is to check your climbing specific physical fitness. This is done by executing 4 tests that provide information about the different physical qualities of the forearm.

  1. Max Strength – checks your maximal finger strength.
  2. Finger Hang – checks your forearms strength and endurance.
  3. Continuous – checks your forearms anaerobic capacity.
  4. Intermittent – checks your forearms aerobic capacity.

 

The measurements from the tests are transformed into climbing grades for your convenience. The indicators raw data is also available for in-depth analyses.

 

Once you have completed the performance test battery you can get a personal training plan to improve your weaknesses. The plan consists of 16-24 training sessions. Each session consists of several exercises of different intensity, repetitions, work and rest times. The app tracks your progress and timing and reminds you when you have to train or rest.

 

The app guides you during training and testing. It provides real-time feedback of the force applied on the rung and intensity target range. The app provides also information about the duration and number of repetitions and indicates when to work or rest.

 

After each exercise the app shows you a summary of your results. The summary includes an execution score to check how well you have performed the exercise, the parameters of the exercise and various indicators about the work done.

 

The app provides also  an opportunity to perform single exercises that are not part of a training plan. This is meant for more advanced climbers that want to follow their own training plan.

 

Climbro is designed to have fun with your family and friends while testing and training. Any mobile device can connect to any Climbro hangboard - pairing not required. Get together with your climbing buddies anywhere a hangboard is available and checkout who has the strongest fingers, best endurance, or just have fun training together.

  

The Android version is already available for download. We are working hard to develop the iOS version. We have planned to deliver it March 2020, together with the shipment of the hangboards.

The hangboard is portable and easy to transport and mount. Take it with you wherever you go and don’t miss your training session.

 

The hangboard is as easy to mount as the painting on your wall – 2 screws and it’s ready for use. You can mount it everywhere – at home, in the backyard, at your office, in the gym, etc.

 

Every part and function of the smart hangboard is based on solid research and testing. Our scientists have used standardized tests scientifically proven to be reliable, valid and suitable for assessment of climbers' physical fitness. All the data was collected in climbing specific conditions using the most advanced equipment in the world. Part of the research was focused on finding out the best body and arm position during testing and the optimal rung shape and size.

The first prototype of the hangboard and mobile app were created back in 2014 to help our scientists do their research in assessing finger strength and endurance of elite climbers. Since then more than 6 prototypes of the hangboard have been developed to find the best design. The mobile app has evolved from a measurement tool for scientists into the pocket AI trainer that completely automates the training process.

The Climbro hangboard has two rungs (3cm and 5cm) with 2 magnetic reducers (0.7cm and 1.0cm) which offer 8 variations of rung depth (from 1.3cm to 5cm).  The rung edges are rounded to provide the most comfortable grip during testing and training. Their skin friendly design minimizes injury risk and maximizes training effect.

  •  Dimensions: 650x235x105(mm)
  •  Weight: 5.5kg
  •  Power Supply: 2x AAA batteries
  •  Connectivity: Bluetooth Low Energy(4.0+)
  •  Sampling rate: 100hz
  •  Operating System: Android 5.0+
  •  Max load: 180kg

 

 

We are passionate climbers and our love for climbing and what we do complemented each other to create Climbro hangboard and bring it to the world.

 

 

Don’t keep it secret 

Tag a friend 

Share with favorite subreddit

Add to your board 

 

Where we ship: We ship worldwide, VAT and GST not included for shipments outside EU.

When we start shipping: We plan to start shipping in March. We will keep you up to date. Shipment will be processed on First In First Out basis.

Why order now: Firstly, you can take advantage of the big discounts of up to 60% from the retail price, which will be available only during this campaign. Secondly, backing now and providing your valuable feedback to us, you will become part of the team that will shape the future development of the product.

If you have a question check out first the FAQ section at the top of the page and if your question is not there just drop us an email at hello@climbro.com.

story:
Applying Wonder-C Tex (*antibacterial fabric) that kills harmful substances such as athlete's foot bacteria and fungus and suppresses foot odor, Inevitable Insole proves its efficiency just with insole replacement. Wonder Feet Inevitable Insole is here to help you if you’re suffering from athlete’s foot and foot odor.   

 

 

 

 

   It is known that 15% of the world's population has athlete's foot. 1 out of every 6 people has athlete's foot bacteria, and millions of people visit hospitals every year to receive treatment.      

 

 

  Athlete's foot occurs with an infection by a fungus called 'Trichophyton Rubrum', and once it occurs, it becomes contagious, moving from skin to skin as a parasite. Athlete’s foot bacteria can be infected to the face and ears, as well as toes, fingers and feet. Due to this contagiousness, the bacteria continuously re-occurs and it should be completely eradicated.    

 

 

 

1.  Foot (athlete’s foot infiltrates feet)    

2.  Athlete’s foot bacteria breeds inside the shoes  

3.  You try to weaken the bacteria by washing your feet and putting ointment on,    

4.  but the moment you put your feet back into the shoes, the bacteria infiltrates again   

5.   Vicious cycle repeats itself 

 

But with Wonder Feet?

 

 

 

 

1. Foot infected with athlete's foot bacteria   

2. From the moment you put on the Wonder Feet shoes, the athlete’s foot bacteria will be attacked, weakened and killed 

3.   When you take off your shoes, the Wonder Feet insole attacks the athlete's foot bacteria, killing them     

4.   When you keep your feet clean, athlete’s foot bacteria gradually weaken 

 

  •  What is wonder-C Tex (antimicrobial copper fabric)?   

  Wonder-C Tex is a new anti-bacterial material made by whipping 99.9 % of pure copper into slices thinner than human hair.   

 

 

  • What is antibacterial copper?    

  It is called "Antibacterial copper" due to the natural occurrence of antibacterial activity in copper.   By acting on bacteria and viruses such as E-coli and food poisoning bacteria, antimicrobial copper is highly effective in preventing infectious diseases and cross infection.  It is the strongest and non-toxic human-friendly antibacterial material, being a natural material. 

 

  • Excellent antimicrobial effect.   

  There is little variation in the antimaterial activity regardless of the particle size. Also, it has much better antibacterial power than silver (nano) and ceramic materials because it does not create resistant bacteria even after time.    

  •   Long-lasting antimicrobial effect      

  Antimicrobial effect stays unaffected by the external environment including heat and humidity. Antibacterial copper is a semi-permanent material that maintains its antibacterial powers even after discoloration or abrasion.    

  •   Guaranteed safety     

  Antibacterial copper is a natural antibacterial material that is harmless to the human body and the environment. It is 100% recyclable because no added chemicals are required, thanks to the natural antibacterial effects of copper itself. Even in recycled copper, the effect remains unchanged.   

 

  In 2011, Dr. William Keevil of the University of Southampton, England, conducted an experiment to compare the antibacterial powers between 10 million super bacteria on stainless steel and on copper. While the super bacteria on stainless steel remained alive, those on copper were almost entirely killed in 9 minutes.    

 

 

In an average of 1 hour, the stench has dropped by over 90%.

 

Ammonia ㅣHydrogen sulfide ㅣTrimethylamine ㅣ Methyl Mercaptan

 

    KATRI Examination Researcher says 

  “Test results show that the bacteria cannot be seen under the microscope, which means this is an inhibition stage”   

 

 

 

 

    On top of wearing Wonder Feet, apply other athlete’s foot medication on the market to maximize treatment effect. (Including toe-type athlete’s foot)     

  This is because Wonder Feet can both care for the foot and shoe environments where athlete’s foot bacteria breed.   

     Also, we recommend using Wonder Feet Insoles in matching numbers as your daily shoes to enhance effectiveness. This is to prevent the possibility of cross-contamination that could happen when you switch to normal soles from Wonder Feet soles.   

 

 

 

Hello friend.

 I'm Yuni,   the founder of Wonder Feet.   I would like to briefly introduce how the WONDER FEET came into the world.   

 Originally, I had a job of making and distributing shoes in S. Korea. However, the shoes I usually sell have the cheapest insole to minimize cost, and I was always unsatisfied with the lack of cushioning because my feet were not comfortable. 

I had a chance to talk with the boss of a partner company, when I found out that using good materials makes more comfortable insoles. So, I developed an insole using a thick latex (6mm) without worrying about the cost and applied it to shoes and heels, which was met with positive response by the customers.   

  Since then, I became more interested in people's feet and started to study the various types of functional insoles. But the question was why premium functional insoles were limited to foot arches, cushioning and structural problems.  

  Actually, I thought the real issue with people's feet was athlete's foot and foot odor. Of course, not everyone has these problems, but I knew for a fact that quite a lot of people are suffering from this problem.     

  I thought I had a solution to solve this problem by connecting it with the insole. Because feet are always in shoes and shoes are always laid with insoles.   

  After desperately searching for a way, I finally found my answer.    

  I thought it would be really cool if people could just say goodbye to the repulsive itch and shameful foot odor by simply replacing their insoles.  

  So, I named my invention, Wonder Feet. Of course, arch supports and shock absorbing cushioning are basic functions.        

  If you are suffering from athlete's foot, itching, foot odor for a long period of time, or are afraid to know how to prevent them, I recommend trying out Wonder Feet. I’m more than confident they will help!   

Your friend,  

Yuni      

 

 

 

Q.  Is Wonder Feet only applicable to athlete’s foot patients and those with foot odor?  

A.  No. Athlete’s foot and foot odor are very common problems exposed to everyone, because they result from fungus bacteria that are easily infected even with the smallest contact with people around you.

 

Q.  Is Wonder Feet effective on toenail athlete’s foot, as well?   

A.   Toenail-type athlete’s foot lasts longer and is more difficult to eradicate than athlete’s foot. Wonder Fit effectively creates an environment in which athlete’s foot bacteria cannot thrive, even for toe-type disease.     

 

Q. What if the odor remains even after I wear Wonder Feet insole? 

A.  Wonder Feet is not a deodorant, the odor eliminating effect doesn’t come magically as soon as you put it on. The antibacterial copper fabric needs time to reduce the bacteria and odor. Foot odor will be eliminated in as early as 3 day, and usually within 7 days. But in case of severe symptoms, it could take up to a maximum of 15 days.       

 

Q. Does Wonder Feet help with plantar fasciitis?   

A. Of course. Wonder Feet has adopted a proper cushion and arch support structure to help people suffering foot pain.

 

Q. Does it help with ankle or back pain?

A. Wonder Feet's arch supports and heel features help your feet to better support your body's load.  If the arch of a foot collapses, it causes the body to lose balance. Wonder Feet insole will help both feet work well together to balance.   

 

Q. How thick is the insole?   

A.   Wonder feet has a thickness of 4mm for proper cushioning. Usually, insoles are about 2~3mm thick. So, it is recommended to use Wonder Feet in shoes that are slightly looser than others.   

 

Q. Do the insoles come in children’s sizes, too?   

A.   Unfortunately, we could not prepare the children's size for this moment. But we’ll consider them if there are requests by the consumers.

story:
Short Summary

Innovate.  Educate.  Motivate!

What is STEMstick?

STEMstick is an innovative, fun-to-use, educational technology system to stimulate highly interactive learning experiences for K-12 students.  STEMstick augments and reinforces traditional classroom instruction over a wide range of Science, Technology, Engineering, and Math (STEM) topics. STEMstick makes learning STEM fun. The STEMstick System is comprised of four main components:

  • Hardware (instrumented drumsticks and drumheads)
  • Software (system control, computational engines, and game-quality graphics)
  • Academic content (highly-interactive, standards-oriented STEM learning)
  • Concept visualizations (abstract & concrete stimuli-response lab activities)

The STEMstick (shown above) uses patented, advanced navigation technologies to measure and predict users' movements as tracked by a pair of instrumented "drumsticks," using a suite of sensors (e.g., accelerometers, gyros, and compasses) sized for a form-factor able to fit inside a big-barreled "3S" drumstick.  Users' movements with these instrumented strikers are translated into raw and processed signals, which are fed into a patented processing engine that drives graphics-based concept visualizations.


STEMstick capitalizes on the link between music and math.  “Active learning” is proven to improve students’ comprehension, concept retention, assessment scores, and motivation.  STEMstick will make STEM learning interesting, and help prepare students for lucrative technology-based careers, which often go unfilled for a lack of STEM-trained graduates.

We on the STEMstick team think the right innovative tools, right educational path, and right personal motivation, can help K-12 kids improve their Science, Technology, Engineering, and Math (STEM) learning, comprehension, and motivation.  Hence our tag-line:

Innovate.  Educate.  Motivate!

STEMstick uses powerful, fun-to-use game system-like learning tools to turn passive STEM learning into highly interactive STEM engagement.  The user interfaces will be familiar to students and teachers alike.

While the students use the STEMSticks to interact with the system as they would with a gaming system, the movements produced by the users are processed by our engine that drives graphics-based concept visualizations  

And what is the purpose of these abstract and concrete concept visualizations?

Just as a student transitions from learning about biology to experiencing biology when they dissect a frog, or transitions from learning about chemistry to doing chemistry by performing and analyzing experiments in a lab, STEMstick visualizations shift passive learning about STEM topics into actively experiencing STEM concepts intuitively.

STEMstick visualizations:

  • Are "active learning" lab activities
  • Are delivered as lesson plan "plug-ins" to augment teacher's lectures
  • Support the full spectrum of STEM concepts and topics
  • Are designed and produced to strict quality guidelines
  • Respond to standards-based, grade-appropriate learning objectives
  • Engage also the "A" for arts in STEAM



Our Team

We are a multidisciplinary team of educators and developers, engineers and musicians, business leaders and professional services support staff, introverts and extroverts, thinkers and doers.  The STEMstick team is currently 20+ folks of different but complementary technical, academic, and professional backgrounds. 

Through STEMstick, we aim to share our love of learning, ideas, and the power of STEM skills and careers to change lives.


What We Need & What You Get

20 team members, $475,000, 4 - 6 months, 4 vendor partners...and You!

If improving kids' abilities to learn, retain, and apply STEM concepts so they can pursue STEM courses in college and good paying technical jobs after college is important to you, please consider contributing to our STEMstick 1.0 prototype.  Give a lot or give a little: every dollar helps us get a little closer to bringing this exciting technology to a school in your neighborhood.

STEMstick is based upon Mr. John Rapp's innovative electronic percussion patent (”Electronic Music Controller Using Inertial Navigation”).  Our campaign to raise $475,000 is to complete the 1st working prototype across the full spectrum of our hardware, software, academic content, and dynamic concept visualization development efforts.  With your backing, we will complete a working prototype in 4 - 6 months, possibly sooner.

20 team members, $475,000, 4 - 6 months, 4 vendor partners...and You!

What do you get for your contribution to this fun & powerful educational product?

Everyday items:  Many people love everyday items.  We have t-shirts, coffee mugs, and water bottles galore, emblazoned with the distinctive STEMstick logo.  Proudly show your family and friends you care about K-12 STEM education.

Product-based items: At higher giving levels we offer product-based perks, such as commemorative working or non-working instrumented drumsticks with our STEMstick logo, or at the highest giving level, an actual full STEMstick system.

Participation-focused perks:  For people who like to participate actively in the projects they back, there are opportunities to appear in a cameo role in one of our concept visualizations, or to sit in a design meeting with any of our hardware, software, academic content, or visualization teams.

20 team members, $475,000, 4 - 6 months, 4 vendor partners...and You!

The target is right sized.  However, we are ready for either situation: the money comes in faster or slower than planned.  The $475,000 lets us complete detailed design and proof-of-concept testing, and to produce the first end-to-end working prototype which we will focus group-test with our Teacher Advisory Panel of educators.

Please join us in Phase 1 goal to complete a functional prototype

But what happens if we don't fully hit our goal?  

Well, one thing, we don't give up.  We are in this for the long haul.  Yours and the contributions of every member of the growing STEMstick community help make this product come to life that much sooner.  Like Yoda counseled Luke Skywalker in the Empire Strikes Back, "Do.  Or not do.  There is no try."  

We are not trying to deliver STEMstick to innovate teaching & learning STEM concepts, we are doing it.


Or, the Money comes in faster than planned?

Certainly a good problem to have.  This happy circumstance allows us to accelerate completion of the 1st working prototype and to transition to the next phase, which is iterative design and functionality improvements.  This situation also allows us to accelerate lesson plan content writing - synchronization with content-derived concept visualizations, which are very labor intensive at the outset.


The Impact

Make a difference in STEM education.  Join the STEMstick community...

Why is STEMstick important?  According the Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences (PNAS), active learning improves comprehension rates and reduces failure rates by 55% among K-12 students.

Source: PNAS.org "Active learning increases student performance in science, engineering, and mathematics"

Trying to deliver innovative, active learning-based tools, is an effort to respect the efforts of school teachers everywhere, by making their jobs a little easier.  Talking to an advanced placement math teacher in Arlington County, VA, last year, we heard that even among her highest performing students, if she is not engaging them and focusing them every minute, their multitasking lives kick in and they mentally drift away to other pressing issues.  Having useful, instructionally sound teaching tools is critical to keeping kids interested in the hardest subjects.

So, why STEMstick and highly interactive learning for visualizing complex STEM concepts?  Because, if the highest performing kids have trouble focusing on STEM topics, what about everyone else?  

Make a difference in STEM education.  Join the STEMstick community...

Though this is our first crowdfunding campaign effort as the STEMstick team, each and every one of us has had successful careers in other complex product or system or knowledge development and delivery environments.  Some of us built high technology satellites for the US Govt and industry.  Some of us built undersea technologies for the US Navy and foreign navies.  Some of us are software application developers for government and commercial clients.  Some of us are instructional systems designers for schools and colleges and universities in the US and around the world.  This is a highly experienced team.  One of us even managed program management artifacts and schedules for a portfolio of R&D projects for different government agencies.

Make a difference in STEM education.  Join the STEMstick community...

We are talking to people in education research, STEM education practice, and future STEM careers.  There is a strong demand in the US and abroad for finding new and interesting ways to reach K-12 kids, at levels appropriate to each kid, taking into account his or her ability and learning styles...and helping them "get" their different STEM classes, and catch the bug to want to do better, to learn more.


Risk & Challenges

Where are the hurdles and how will we get over them?

What are our risks & challenges?  

STEMstick is an innovative educational technology product, but our innovation stems (no pun!) not from NEW technology to be created, but from the creative integration of existing technologies applied to novel and powerful uses.  

That being said, we face a handful of pressing Technical and Market/Programmatic Risks.  These include:

Technical Risks

  • Form factor:  Shrinking the sensor suite, on-board processors, power supply, and a wireless radio into the 3S drumstick-sized form factor poses some technical challenges.

  • Instrumented striker durability:  If you have ever seen a great drummer or an enthusiastic kid pound away with their drumsticks, you know the sticks take a beating.  We must ensure the strikers can sustain thousands of strikes.

  • Power management: Providing sufficient charge duration in wireless instrumented strikers requires thinking through typical charge duration and matching it to the planned use-cases.

Market/Programmatic Risks

  • Public sector stakeholders:  Our market is primarily public and private K-12 schools.  These present a variety of funding/spending mechanisms.  Schools and school districts have controlled budgeting cycles and technology insertion approval processes.  We will have to navigate these smartly.

  • Staffing content writers:  From a project management perspective, managing the hardware (H/W), software (S/W), and concept visualizations development is relatively straightforward, and in-house to the STEMstick team.  But content writing is a huge labor challenge.  We envision a future lesson plan content library of 3,000+ STEM concepts/topics.  The challenge?  Most of our technical development will be relatively steady state throughout the year, and the content writing will mostly surge during the summers.


Other Ways You Can Help

From the entire STEMstick team we thank you so much for your help, interest, and contribution.

We're building a community of STEM education-loving supporters...

If our project is something you feel passionate about, but contributing cash right now is not in the cards, we still welcome your enthusiasm and your support.

There are lots of ways to get involved.  The easiest and most useful right now will be helping us share the word.  

Please pass the word about the STEMstick project to your social network in all the different ways that make sense: email, Facebook, Twitter, and other social media.

Please use the Indiegogo share tools as one way to get started.

story:
Recent documentation rules that adding this device to a pistol makes it an AOW

Due to recent documentation coming in, I am sad to announce that the SlipGrip can only legally be used with AR15 rifles, as adding this device to a pistol will declare it an AOW, and will require proper form 1 documentation from the ATF.
I apologize for any disappointments that this declaration may cause, however if you are still looking to purchase a SlipGrip for your rifle, or you would like to purchase one to legally process with an AOW, they are still available through my contact information. 
If this is cause for a refund on funds you have sent in, pleas contact me directly and I will have the money to you as soon as humanly possible. I thank you all for your contributions to this project. Even though the goal was not reached you have all been a great help and I cannot thank you enough.
If you do wish to purchase one of the grips and use it LEGALLY, they will be available for $80 USD. 
PLEASE take this ruling seriously. The ATF does not play around with these sorts of matters so please use the SlipGrip RESPONSIBLY.
I CANNOT BE HELD ACCOUNTABLE FOR ANY ILLEGAL ACTIONS UNDERTAKEN WITH THE SLIPGRIPS. I do not wish to sound harsh but the warning is there. 
Thank you all again so much, and God Bless America.

story:
My name is Tina Carreras and I have been a Certified Personal Trainer and Group Fitness Instructor for 9 years. I live in San Diego, California with my husband and 2 young daughters and for the past 3 years, I have been spending time in my kids school, being involved in PTO and getting to know their Teachers. Each day I feel the calling more and more to be investing in these Teachers lives and one specific way I can do that is by encouraging Exercise.  

Thus began Fitness 4 Teachers; it is an on-site Fitness Program developed for Teachers at their respective schools. The program consists of Health and Fitness Professionals, like myself, coming to schools to conduct exercise classes for the Teachers so that it is readily available and convenient. It provides exercise accountability, nutritional counsel, community, and motivation for these Men and Women who are taking care of our most valuable resources-our children. Teachers are overworked and underpaid and deserve to be poured into, taken care of, encouraged and led to live healthy lifestyles so that they can be the example for our kids.  I want to give them the opportunity to exercise without having to fight all the obstacles along the way such as lack of money, time due to commute, low energy after a long day at work, increasing job demands, emotional and mental stress from dealing with children all day, etc. The program will be designed as a benefit/perk for the Teachers.

The program was launched at City Tree Christian School in San Diego as of February 2015. Still in its initial phase and despite obstacles such as scheduling conflicts, I currently teach 4 classes throughout the week, reaching 9 Teachers and 1 Parent. Some of the ways they are benefiting from this program are by increasing overall energy, changing sedentary habits, learning proper exercise form/posture, moving their bodies in different ways, increasing flexibility, and having fun. The exercise is motivating because it's so convenient!

I WANT TO DO THIS IN MORE SCHOOLS, IMPACT MORE TEACHERS, CHANGE MORE LIVES, AND ENCOURAGE BETTER HEALTH STANDARDS SO THAT OUR CHILDREN CAN SEE AND FOLLOW IN THE SAME WAY.

For this I am looking for financial support/sponsorship of $12,000 for the initial development and implementation of Fitness 4 Teachers over the next year. These funds will go toward providing exercise classes for the Teachers at City Tree and the next school I pursue, purchasing mobile exercise equipment that will stay at the schools, applying for grants and other state & federal funding so as to bring it to as many schools as possible, and other related costs. 

*The initial/immediate goal is to get this exercise program funded for the Teachers!!!!! and to find partners to help create a well developed plan as to how it will be designed, presented, promoted, funded and implemented in any future school going forward.

*The short term goals are to have this funded exercise program running in 2 schools by the end of 2015 and apply to be a 501c3 as of 2016. 

*The 3 year goal is to have 3 other Fitness Pros bring this funded exercise program for Teachers into another 4-6 schools in SD. 

*The end goal or big dream is to have this funded exercise program offered in schools all over the nation which would also create more jobs for Health and Fitness Professionals. Teachers will become healthier overall and will find the passion to stay physically fit by exercising more regularly. This positive energy then impacts our kids to keep moving which will help them fight the sedentary lifestyles they are fast approaching.

The obstacles I will face are many but the opportunities are even greater. This may or may not work on a bigger scale and I may only impact a group of Teachers in my area but I am committed to see it through til every door has slammed in my face.  I see this big trickle down effect happening by simply caring for the Teachers who help raise and educate our children. Makes way too much sense to me to ignore.

I will keep you updated and informed as to my ups and downs with this program.  I can't promise any sort of perk except a big THANK YOU! I believe that this could be the start of something really exciting for Teachers and you could be a part of that. I invite you to financially invest in this with me to provide schools with the Fitness 4 Teachers program. I also ask you to send this to as many people you know who might be interested.

Thank you again for your consideration of financial support!

Tina Carreras

p.s. I am not set on or attached to this programs name, Fitness 4 Teachers. Want to help me name it something even more stellar? Contact me on our Fitness 4 Teachers facebook page.
