story:
Hello,

Thank you for stopping by.
If you are ready to eliminate some of the harmful chemicals in your daily life & not willing to sacrifice quality & effectiveness, you will LOVE my products! Natural products do not have to be wimpy!I
Thistle Hill Botanicals needs your help, be part of something bigger!  Part of the "We demand natural" movement  In order to continue to grow and expand we will need a little help from our friends.  You can feel great about your contribution to THB, we have a proven product already! 
Here is just one of many testimonials.  Thank you Cynthia! (6/2015)

A few months ago I bought your deodorant at a store in Floyd. The name of the deodorant says it all! The deodorant works great! I love it! In the past I tried 2 different national brands stick deodorants before trying yours, so I was grateful yours actually worked, and it works in all situations and weather! (Recently tested it in the Florida heat and humidity). Thank you so much! I can't wait to buy more the next time I am in SW Va!!   


What is Unique about Thistle Hill Botanicals Products?

  • No Parabens
  • NO GMO's
  • NO Animal testing!
  • NO Pthalates
  • NO Mineral oil
  • NO Proplyne glycol
  • NO Carbomer
  • NO DEA, Acralates, or BHT
Today studies show that many chemicals are endocrine disrupters and harmful for both WOMEN AND MEN!   As a result I have spent many years creating natural and healthy products that I can use for myself and my family.
The cost of owning a business.  Moving to a new facility, Electrical and Plumbing setup, Commercial shelves, New packaging with heat sealing equipment, labeling,  a large commercial mixer,  Stainless steel tables and racks, molds, software.........and more equipment is needed. 

By year three I will be hiring a few local people, and offering a scholarship in the local high school to a deserving student that is studying something to do with our environment.  You can help and you can be part of our success.

I have arranged for a variety of exciting Perks as a way to let you know that your help is appreciated.

TWO very Special Limited Perks for our Launch at Floyd Yoga Jam, Floyd, Virginia USA where we launched this campaign!

A two night stay in an elegant YURT in Floyd, Virginia

Wood turned bowls created by local Floyd Artist Jim Grant (you will LOVE his work)

An Authentic Green Label Organic T shirt! (Fabulous & Comfy Organic Ts, Low Impact Garment Dyed)  Ladies Blue T has their "Birdsong" design, and Men's Soft Black T has a tall tree design

Multiple Perks with our products like Spa Day

One Perk sends our best sellers to you AND donates the same to a local Women's Resource Center.

Some Perks will change as the campaign progresses.

Choose a level that works for you. Many perks of course include our Clean and Wholesome products....in addition they are also VERY effective!  

THE SHARK TANK STORY:  Even though I have years of experience recently I took a business class organized by the local Economic Development Authority.  At the end of the class we were offered the opportunity to "pitch" our business to a panel of judges. The judge lineup: One from the Small Business Association, One Venture Capitalist, One regional Economic Development Department official, and our own local head of Economic Development Authority.  First we had to submit our written plan weeks in advance, then we had a ten minute live presentation, then a ten minute Q & A to defend our idea and listen to the judges feedback.

Yes I was a bit nervous but I stayed on track.  The judges spent a lot of time reviewing and scoring the pitches that were presented. I was awarded FIRST Place! $5000. for business expenses and discounted rent in a new ENERGY EFFICIENT Innovation Center.  Thistle Hill Botanicals is off to a good start! More capital is needed to buy equipment and make us a success.  

Yes...that is me, stunned and VERY happy!

The Mischievous Carrot  (now Thistle Hill Botanicals) has been in the local paper and featured in an NPR interview! Here is a link to the NPR Report:  Kinder, Gentler Shark Tank 

Risks & Challenges

Making healthy products has been my main mission for 8 years now.  The biggest obstacle has been cash flow.  With the ability to purchase materials and ingredients in larger quantity we will be able to expand our reach and maintain our reasonable prices.

I live simply in a yurt in the woods, most of my clothes comes from "upcycling" from Goodwill.  I am not a wasteful person.  When you help with the growth of Thistle Hill Botanicals I promise to use the dollars wisely.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to help financially with our campaign, please SHARE, SHARE, SHARE!   SHARE this campaign, SHARE our website Thistle Hill Botanicals  Tell your friends on all social media platforms, friends at work....after all, who really wants to be unhealthy and have toxic junk in products that they use everyday?

Thank you for stopping by.


If you are ready to eliminate some of the harmful chemicals in your daily life & not willing to sacrifice quality & effectiveness, you will LOVE my products! Natural products do not have to be wimpy!I

Thistle Hill Botanicals needs your help, be part of something bigger!  Part of the "We demand natural" movement  In order to continue to grow and expand we will need a little help from our friends.  You can feel great about your contribution to THB, we have a proven product already! 

Here is just one of many testimonials.  Thank you Cynthia! (6/2015)

story:
Overview

Hi! We're Kere and Clare. Or Clere to our friends. Kere is a bit of an IT nerd and is developing our app, and I am a marketing geek and responsible for writing this pitch. We are also the founders of Run & Rule - the ultimate competitive health app designed to motivate and inspire a generation of healthy users.

Before we get into it, some facts we think you should know:

  • Global obesity rates have doubled since 1980*
  • In 2014, more than 1.9 billion adults were overweight*
  • Over 600 million were obese*

*According to the World Health Organization

Obesity can lead to:

  • Cardiovascular diseases (heart disease and stroke)
  • Diabetes
  • Musculoskeletal disorders
  • Some cancers (edometrial, breast, and colon)

The thing we find astonishing... There are over 40,000 health and fitness apps available, yet obesity rates are still rising! We're hoping to change this trend, by developing a competitive-based, fun, health app, designed for users of all ages, backgrounds and fitness levels.

So, how does it work, you ask?

Simply open the app, press 'start' when you begin your walk/run/cycle, the app will track your activity as you go, then press 'stop' when you're finished and see what territory, or Rule, you hold. (In order for the app to work best, your track should start and finish in the same spot, creating a loop.)

Run & Rule isn't about how quickly you complete your track. It’s all about how often you get out and get active. By using Run & Rule every time you go for a walk/run/cycle, you claim your Rule and build up your defenses. The more you walk/run/cycle, the stronger your fortifications! But as soon as someone runs in part of your Rule, your defenses become weak. You’ll need to get up and reclaim your Rule.

Our Indiegogo campaign focuses on finding funds to continue building this app. However, to give you an idea about our bigger business plan, we will be holding a number of free community events, and will be engaging dieticians and fitness coaches, to ensure we benefit ALL members of the community, with credible and useful resources.

We have both invested a considerable chunk of time and money into building a prototype. Now we need your help.


What We Need & What You Get

Right now Kere is building the ENTIRE platform - desktop version and the app (iOS and Android). We would love to hire another developer to speed up the process to get this app to market sooner. In return for supporting our campaign, you can access some fantastic perks...

Risks & Challenges

Our biggest challenge is building something that doesn't get lost in the sea of health & fitness apps currently in the market. We know we are building something great, but we need your help to share Run & Rule with the world.


Other Ways You Can Help

We know not all of you will be able to contribute financially, but we would love it if you could please spread the word and share with your friends. 

Thanks!

story:
Once Upon a Time, We had a Farm

In 1984, my family had a beautiful dairy farm in Oregon, it was an amazing place to be a kid. Our family had been farming for 70+ years. And in 1992 we had to leave the farm, move to Washington State, and live below the poverty level to qualify for help with the cost a lifesaving medication I needed to treat a genetic disease called Gaucher. I was eight at the time, doctors had told my mother I would probably only live to be 8 or 9.

Having to leave the farm was hard for everyone. Though my mom, two sisters, and I were able to each keep a couple of our favorite cows they had to stay on other farms ever since. Over the years those cows have had calves, some of those calves became cows and they had calves, and like everyone some of them have gone on now to the milky way in the sky.

In February of 2014 my mom and I were able to rent a home on 10 acres, and now thankfully are able to raise and care for our calves and a couple nurse cows. A long awaited desire after 23 years of living places where that was not possible. Until recent healthcare laws changed I still had to live below the poverty level to qualify for help with the cost of my medicine.

Now we have the opportunity to start farming again. And have dreams of bottling raw milk, making cheese and seeing all of our cows and heifers grazing and playing on pastures. On the farm we would raise our animals in a clean, natural and humane environment where they will have access to fresh pasture at all times. The animals will be loved on and cared for like they are part of the family, because they are. 

We hope to make Bossy Acres Farm a place where families can come and meet the animals where their milk is coming from. We hope to raise part of our start up costs to ensure we have a solid foundation and the tools we need to be able to offer high quality raw milk and dairy products. If we can raise more than our minimum goal we will use that money in the best ways to get MATCHING FUNDS, create jobs, help Veterans suffering from PTSD, and internships for those interested in 4H and FFA.

We are applying (APPLICATION DEADLINE JULY 2015) and can get matching funds through the USDA’s Value Added Producer Grant for eligible expenses such as bottles, labels, bottling employee salary, utilities, and marketing. So for each dollar we get and spend towards those items, we can get a dollar back, making your contributions go even further.  Supporting our campaign also gives you our appreciation forever and the chance to say “you were there when Bossy Acres became a farm again.”  

We have a vision of creating a CSA (community supported agriculture) style farm. In which members can not only get wholesome natural food, but also share in the experiences and joys of farming.


What We Need To Get Started

  • Hire farm hands - Looking for those who have a heart for working outside with animals. Also an interest in cheese making and raw milk is a plus. Working with animals in a outside environment has been effective at helping people suffering from Post Traumatic Stress Syndrome (PTSD)  


  • Lease 40+ acres of pasture land - Grass fed, pasture raised cows produce milk higher in omega-3's, CLA, beta-carotene, vitamin A, vitamin K, vitamin D, vitamin E, and antioxidants. Plus they love it!


  • Custom Animal Shelter - Housings for animals to get out of the weather, plus used bed-pack is composted and used for gardening and to sell.


  • Construct Mobile Milking Parlor and Bottling Room - Clean Brand New milking & bottling equipment will help produce quality raw milk. 

6 Kleen Flo 300 Milking units $1134 - 6 65lb Waikato Milk Meters $1554

100ft 1in Silicone Milk Hose $1269 - 7.5HP Vacuum Pump Package $3289

5K Commander Vacuum Reg. $489 - 40ft Shipping Container $2,000

Stanchions and Gates Pipe $1,000 - Stainless Steel Bulk Milk Tank $2,000

Stainless Steel Milk Pipe $Purchased - Stainless Steel Plate Cooler $Purchased 


  • Bottling Equipment 

Single-Valve Filler $7,900 - 114 AMCO Pump $2,000  - Controller $3,000


The Bigger Picture

  • A place where families can come and meet the animals their milk is coming from. With opportunities to get involved and make friends.


  • Grow and sell vegetables grown in our natural compost made from recycling the bed-pack. Great natural fertilizer, smells just like dirt!


  • Create internships for those interested in 4H and FFA. 


  • Get matching funds through the USDA’s Value Added Producer Grant.


Risks & Challenges

The Washington State Department of Agriculture agency said retail raw milk is legal to sell in Washington, but there are serious health risks. It reminded consumers they should read the warning label on the retail raw milk container carefully and make an informed decision. The WSDA said consumers should purchase only raw milk packaged with a Warning Label and  a "best by Date".

"WARNING: This product has not been pasteurized and may contain harmful bacteria. Pregnant women, children, the elderly and persons with lowered resistance to disease have the highest risk of harm from use of this product."

Educating people on the health risk involved with raw foods is important, and raw cows milk can be dangerous if proper animal care, clean milking equipment, and product handling are not taken seriously. But with a quality product and good handling care, raw milk has many health benefits. More people are sicken from eating raw greens every year than drinking raw milk, but you shouldn't stop eating salads. It starts with knowing where your food is coming from and proper storage to protect yourself from illness that can be caused by food.

Raw milk is enzyme and vitamin superior to conventionally pasteurized milk. In numerous health studies and private claims, it has been used to treat diseases and others elements. This could be due to the high profile nutrients that exist in raw cow milk that are identical to those found in human breast milk. Of course like with any product you eat you should make sure the raw milk you drink comes from well cared for cows and is produced in a clean environment. And the farm, the milking process, and equipment is up to quality standards and is licensed. You should take care to keep the raw milk in the fridge (32 degrees is optimal) much like other raw products in your kitchen. Quality Raw Milk can do your body good and provide powerful enzymes and vitamins your body can use to build strong bones, lean muscles, and a strong immune system. 


Other Ways You Can Help

If you want to help and can’t contribute funds to the campaign, sharing it will be greatly appreciated! Please let others know about our campaign.

You can also friend or follow Bossy Acres on social media, we are just getting social networks started so please invite others to our Facebook and Twitter pages. Help us reach people interested in raw milk and grass fed dairy products by letting others know about our mission and sharing or updates. Thank you for your time and consideration!

Please Visit BossyAcres.Club and Sign-up to Stay Informed or Get Involved

story:
Short Summary

Each year thousands of people get sick and die because they cannot get to the medical treatment facilities that they so desperately need. Our organization was set up to help meet that need by providing free medical transportation to low income folks who need that type of assistance but cannot afford it.

What We Need & What You Get

We are currently asking donors to contribute $12,500 to our cause. This money will be used to support efforts to provide medical transportation locally and nationally, if needed. We can use ground transportation, but our focus is on using medical air transportation. This allows for a faster transport. You never know when you or someone in your family might need this kind of help. So please consider us. Thanks.


The Impact

The real impact that this will have is a more healthy society. Also low income people will not have to decide between keeping a roof over theirs and their family's heads and getting the medical attention that they require. 

Risks & Challenges

People value transparency. So our organization, Wright's Aviation Ministries, will work hard to be as transparent as possible about how we help people. One of the challenges that presents itself is that not a lot of people are aware of services like ours. So this is another chance to expose people to what we do and, at the same time, raise money for our cause.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Pilots and Aircraft Mechanics can help by donating their services for free.
  • Doctors and Nurses can also help by donating their time to assist in transport.

And that's all there is to it.

story:
version francophone plus bas >>>

PRESENTATION



The KwiiziBox is a credit-card sized box containing a complete media-center which gives access to a lot of educative content including 7 million articles,videos of TED talks and a specialized medical database. It also allows you to make video calls and share files, all for FREE and WITHOUT AN INTERNET CONNECTION

The KwiiziBox is able to share content through a mobile application with an integrated Wi-Fi.

For large scale universities, the KwiiziBox can be easily paired to one or more Wi-Fi devices for betternetwork coverage and network quality for students and researchers.



You can also access just by using your web browser on a computer, a tablet or even a smartphone! 

African educational Institutions using the KwiiziBox can interconnect to build an e-Learning platform without an internet connection. It’s like a local intranet where all African schools will be able to share documents, research and communicate amongst each other.

The KwiiziBox and its native application include :

-  More than 7 000 000 articles (Wikipedia database) ;

-  45 000 books (Gutenberg Library) ;

-  More than 8000 video courses (MOOC, TED conferences, documentaries) ;

-  Free Video calls and File sharing tools

-  ShareScreen functionality to allow users to discuss and work on a project in real time

-  Offline mode allowing users outside of the KwiiziBox network to be able to check from home all the articles they already read in the network

-  Social : Users can chat on one or more articles, add them as favorites, allow users to follow in live their article readings.

-  Multilingual (French and English included) ;

-  Simple and Intuitive




What about learning?

Unfortunately numerous teachers in Africa are under-qualified or lack accurate training. It’s one of the major issues of the education process in Africa. The project KWIIZI is doing more than just giving content to students and teachers. It also has a focus on teaching best practices. Through the OER4School program integrated to the KwiiziBox, teachers are able to learn the best practices to give courses and get a better understanding of their students level.

The KwiiziBox objective is to make information available without internet and give a new experience of files sharing. The databases includes Wikipedia and could be installed in Schools, public librairies offering access to education to people with low income and even rural areas without internet.

All is in a little box you can have in your pocket! We think about environment so the Kwiizi box could also be powered by solar energy! We really need you to make this dream come true! We are at one step to build something which will help an entire generation of African students, we want you to be part of this amazing adventure. 

The KwiiziBox objective is to make information available without internet and provide a complete new sharing experience. The database could be included in schools and rural areas, providing access to millions of books and videos.




How We’ll USE THE MONEY

The kwiizi project and his kwiizi box wants to be able to connect schools and universities. We need to build more kwiizibox by school to interconnect them through a local network.

If we have  5000 USD we will be able to provide a Kwiizibox to 20 institutions! 

If we reach 10.000 UDS we will be able to connect schools in many cities! 

IF WE REACH 100.000 USD, THIS IS AMAZING! We will have a national network and get a new office! We will be able to leave more space for other startups in our incubator! :D



THE IMPACT

The Internet in Africa is limited by a penetration rate of 18 %. 

People have a better access to education but they lack accurate training. Technology is a great path between a better local economy and a great skills improvement which is possible with the information access.

By supporting this project, you contribute to the technological emancipation of all the African continent with a solution created by Africans which could also work EVERYWHERE!

For the next billion people connected to the web, do you want to contribute to local networks before internet comes in those areas? It’s already working, let us make history together. We are the world.


THEY TALK ABOUT US

We are glad and really happy to get the local and international web and TV medias support for KWIIZI project .

- Electronicsweekly :

Title : African free education project uses Raspberry Pi

Extract : “Raspberry Pi is being used as a low cost web-server platform for an ambitious project to provide schools and colleges in Africa access to online libraries of articles, books and videos for education.”

Link:http://www.electronicsweekly.com/news/business/information-technology/africa-free-education-project-uses-raspberry-pi-2015-05/

- Bloggeek .me

Title :How WebRTC Redefines Video in Education

Extract: …“If Vedantu was interesting, then what would you say about Kwiizi? An open source initiative in Cameroon, Africa. The idea is to “allow educational institutions to obtain millions of articles, books and videos for education while providing a communication platform where you can even make video calls. All without internet connection.”

Link : https://bloggeek.me/webrtc-education/

- Techtaget News

Title :WebRTC video conferencing impacting education

Extract : “…The second startup is Cameroon-based Kwiizi, which serves as a communication platform and gives access to educational materials like books and video”

Link : http://searchunifiedcommunications.techtarget.com/news/4500247058/WebRTC-video-conferencing-impacting-education

- Une Camerounaise : LesGeeks

Title : Les startups Camerounaises à suivre en 2015: Kwiizi

Extract :  « Kwiizi c'est toute l'encyclopédie Wikipedia avec ses textes, images et illustrations, plus de 46.000 livres dans des domaines variés tel la littérature, la philosiphie, l'ingénierie, la biologie, l'anthropologie, etc..., des vidéos de conférences dans diverses disciplines, soit plus de 10 Téraoctets de données accesibles à l'aide de laptops, smartphones ou tablettes sans connection internet. »

Link :http://lesgeeks.cm/entreprises-de-tics-au-camer...

- VoxAfrica TV



OTHERS WAYS TO SUPPORT KWIIZI
Even if you can't give financial support to the project, we still need you! Please share the message on social networks and to your friends. Everytime you talk about the project to someone,it gives more chance to get a Kwiizi Box for a school!

THANK YOU !
THE KWIIZI TEAM ^^

L'équipe






---------------------------------------------------------

Version française :)

Présentation

La KwiiziBox est une boite de la taille d’une carte de crédit contenant une médiathèque qui permet d’avoir accès à du contenu éducatif dans des institutions scolaires, faire des appels vidéo et même partager des fichiers le tout gratuitement et sans connexion internet.


Elle émet son contenu et son application de vidéo conférence par son wifi intégré.

Pour les campus universitaires de grande superficie, la KwiiziBox peut être facilement jumeler à une ou plusieurs antennes wifi pour une meilleure couverture de réseau et un meilleur confort des élèves et étudiants.

Son contenu est accessible simplement via le navigateur des utilisateurs sur laptops, tablettes et surtout sur les smartphones qui sont de plus en plus répandus en Afrique.

Les institutions scolaires bénéficiant de la KwiiziBox peuvent être interconnectées  pour construire une plateforme de e-learning sans connexion internet à l’intérieur de laquelle la documentation, la recherche et les communications sont gratuites et disponibles 24h/24..

La kwiiziBox et son application embarquée contient :

-  Plus de 7 000 000 d’articles (La base de donnée de Wikipedia) ;

-  45 000 livres (La bibliothèque de Gutemberg) ;

-  Plus de 8000 cours vidéos et éducatives (MOOC, conférences TED, documentaires) ;

-  Une fonctionnalité d’appel vidéo et de partage de fichier.

-  Une fonctionnalité de partage d’écran pour permettre aux usagers de partager ce qu’ils voient en temps réel.

-  Un mode offline qui permet aux usagers une fois hors du réseau wifi de la KwiiziBox de reconsulter chez eux tous les articles qu’ils consultaient lorsqu’ils étaient dans le réseau.


Les différents atouts de la KwiiziBox sont les suivants :

-  Responsive Design : adapte automatiquement l’affichage de l’interface pour les ordinateurs fixes et portables, tablettes et smartphones;

-  Social : les utilisateurs peuvent chatter sur un ou plusieurs articles, mettre des articles en favoris, permettre à d’autres utilisateurs  de les suivre en instantané dans la consultation de leurs articles.

-  Effectuer des appels vidéo dans le réseau et partager des fichiers ;

-  Rapide ;

-  Bilingue ;

-  Simple et intuitif;


Mais qu’en est-il de l’enseignement ?

De nombreux enseignants en Afrique sont sous qualifiés ou n’ont pas été bien formés dans ce métier. Cela est un inconvénient majeur dans la chaîne éducative. Le projet Kwiizi ne se contente pas seulement de délivrer du contenu éducatif aux élèves, étudiants ou professeurs, mais  aussi de mettre l’accent sur les méthodes pédagogiques de l’enseignement. Via le programme OER4school intégré à la KwiiziBox , les enseignants apprennent à mieux dispenser leurs cours et maîtriser au mieux le niveau de leurs apprenants.

Les objectifs  de la KwiiziBox sont de rendre l’information disponible sans connexion internet et offrir une nouvelle expérience de partage de ces informations. Sa base de données qui incorpore aussi celle de Wikipedia, peut être installée dans des milieux scolaires et dans des bibliothèques municipales, et permettre ainsi de mettre à la disposition des élèves, un accès à des millions d’articles, livres et vidéos même dans des zones sans couverture internet.

Le tout dans une boite qui consomme très peu d'énergie électrique et qu'il suffit tout juste de brancher sur une prise électrique sans assistance supplémentaire.

Ils parlent de nous 

-  Electronicsweekly :

Titre de l’article : African free education project uses Raspberry Pi

Court extrait : “Raspberry Pi is being used as a low cost web-server platform for an ambitious project to provide schools and colleges in Africa access to online libraries of articles, books and videos for education.”

Lien de l’article:http://www.electronicsweekly.com/news/business/information-technology/africa-free-education-project-uses-raspberry-pi-2015-05/

-  Bloggeek .me

Titre de l’article :How WebRTC Redefines Video in Education

Court extrait : …“If Vedantu was interesting, then what would you say about Kwiizi? An open source initiative in Cameroon, Africa. The idea is to “allow educational institutions to obtain millions of articles, books and videos for education while providing a communication platform where you can even make video calls. All without internet connection.”

Lien de l’article : https://bloggeek.me/webrtc-education/

-  Techtaget News

Titre de l’article :WebRTC video conferencing impacting education

Court extrait : “…The second startup is Cameroon-based Kwiizi, which serves as a communication platform and gives access to educational materials like books and video”

Lien de l’article : http://searchunifiedcommunications.techtarget.com/news/4500247058/WebRTC-video-conferencing-impacting-education

-  Une Camerounaise : LesGeeks

Titre de l’article : Les startups Camerounaises à suivre en 2015: Kwiizi

Court extrait :  « Kwiizi c'est toute l'encyclopédie Wikipedia avec ses textes, images et illustrations, plus de 46.000 livres dans des domaines variés tel la littérature, la philosiphie, l'ingénierie, la biologie, l'anthropologie, etc..., des vidéos de conférences dans diverses disciplines, soit plus de 10 Téraoctets de données accesibles à l'aide de laptops, smartphones ou tablettes sans connection internet. »

Lien de l’article :http://lesgeeks.cm/entreprises-de-tics-au-camer...
- VoxAfrica TV



A quoi servira la collecte ?

Le projet Kwiizi et sa KwiiziBox s’apprête à équiper un plus grand nombre d'écoles secondaires et supérieures. Il y a besoin de produire plus de KwiiziBox par école  et interconnecter ces institutions par un réseau local.

La collecte de 5000 USD servira à produire plus de KwiiziBox et mettre en place un réseau interne ne dépendant pas d'internet pour faire communiquer tous les acteurs du secteur éducatif (élèves, étudiants, enseignants).

Avec seulement 250 USD, une école secondaire ou supérieure peut être équipé d’une KwiiziBox. C’est extrêmement moins cher et économique en énergie.

5000 USD nous permettront d’équiper un minimum de 20 institutions.

Avec plus de 10 000 USD, nous assurons plus d’institutions scolaires dans plusieurs villes sans accès véritable à internet.

Si nous parvenons jusqu’à 100 000 USD, le réseau sera plus étendu et plus influent et ainsi nous pourrons avoir en bonus notre propre local laissant de la place chez notre incubateur.

L'impact

Aujourd’hui le taux de pénétration d'internet en Afrique est de 18%.

Le taux d'enfants scolarisés augmente mais les outils de formations manquent cruellement. La technologie est la chose qui combine meilleur marché et formation de qualité supérieure.

En y mettant de vous sur ce projet, vous allez une fois de plus marquer votre passage et contribuer à l’essor technologique de l’Afrique avec une solution adaptée pour l’Afrique et qui peut très bien marcher ailleurs.

Pour le prochain milliard de connecter à internet, voulez vous contribuer à faire des réseaux locaux en attendant la venue de l’internet dans ces zones ? Nous avons trouvé une solution qui est déjà utilisé et appréciée, contribuons  ensemble pour allez plus vite et plus loin.

D'autres façons d'aider

Si vous ne pouvez pas contribuer financièrement ce projet, votre main est toujours utile et la bienvenue. Vous pouvez passez le message via les réseaux sociaux ou le bouche à oreille. Un partage que vous faites, c’est une école de plus qui voit augmenter ses chances d’obtenir une KwiiziBox. 

Merci beaucoup.

L'équipe

story:
(mai jos pentru versiunea în limba rômana)
(version française disponible ci-dessous)

HOSPICE Angelus is the main provider of palliative care services from the Republic of Moldova. From 2001, when it was founded, HOSPICE Angelus cared for over 15.000 terminally ill patients and their families. And this wouldn't have been possible without the support of generous people and companies that understood that access to palliative care is not a luxury but a human right.

The Republic of Moldova is considered to be the poorest country in Europe and through our devoted work during the years we understood that more than 90% of our beneficiaries that are in need of palliative care come from vulnerable social and economical background.


The current economical situation of the country has taken a toll on local fundraising, and now more than ever WE NEED YOUR HELP in order to finance our Pediatric Palliative Mobile Department for 12 months.

Pediatric Palliative care is specialized medical care for children with serious illnesses. It focuses on providing relief from the symptoms, pain, and stress of a serious illness—whatever the diagnosis. The goal is to improve quality of life for both the child and the family.

Total cost of the department : 30.000 $ / year.

Department Structure : 1 Doctor, 1 Nurse, 1 Social Assistant, lots of volunteers and more than 100 children cared for yearly. 

Here at HOSPICE, we believe in a world where people know that it does not matter how many days you have to live but how you live every day. And when you are terminally ill it is all about family, love, care, comfort and most important a pain-free existence.

'’If death has a 100% success rate, PAIN SHOULD NOT’’


With 15$, you can actually finance a home visit of our Pediatric Palliative mobile department.

Visit our website and discover more about HOSPICE Angelus.


************** versiunea româna **************

HOSPICE Angelus Moldova este principalul furnizor de îngrijiri paliative din Republica Moldova. De la fondarea sa, anul 2001, HOSPICE Angelus a ajutat peste 15.000 de pacienţi şi familiile acestora. Toate acestea nu ar fi fost posibile fără susţinerea constantă a persoanelor şi companiilor care au înţeles că accesul la îngrijiri paliative nu este un lux, ci un drept al omului.


Republica Moldova este considerată cea mai săracă ţară din Europa, iar prin munca pe care am realizat-o de-a lungul anilor, am înţeles că mai mult de 90% dintre cei care au nevoie de îngrijiri paliative, cu alte cuvinte, beneficiarii noştri, provin dintr-un mediu social vulnerabil, aflându-se des şi în dificultăţi economice.



Economia curentă a Republicii Moldova crează dificultăţi şi în colectarea fondurilor care sunt necesare pentru serviciile noastre, şi acum avem cel mai mult nevoie de AJUTORUL VOSTRU pentru a finanţa Departamentul Pediatric Mobil timp de 12 luni.

Îngrijirile Paliative Pediatrice sunt un domeniu al medicinei specializat pentru copiii care suferă de boli grave. Se bazează pe alinarea durerii, simptomelor şi a stresului cauzat de bolile grave – indiferent de diagnoză. Scopul nostru este să ameliorăm calitatea de viaţă, atât pentru copii, cât şi pentru familiile acestora.

Costul total al departamentului: este de 30.000$/ an
Structura Departamentului: 1 Doctor, 1 soră medicală, 1 Asistent Social, mulţi voluntari şi mai mult de 100 de copii îngrijiţi pe an.

Aici la HOSPICE, credem într-o lume în care nu contează câte zile ţi-au rămas, ci cum le trăieşti. Şi atunci când suferi de o boală terminală, totul se reduce la familie, dragoste, confort, alinare şi, cel mai important, o existenţă fără durere.

"Rata de 100% de succes aparține doar morții, NU DURERII."



Cu 15$, puteţi finanţa o vizită acasă efectuată de către Unitatea Mobilă de Îngrijiri Paliative Pediatrice.

Vizitaţi pagina noastră web şi aflaţi mai multe despre HOSPICE Angelus.

************** version française **************

HOSPICE Angelus est le principal fournisseur de soins palliatifs à domicile en République de Moldavie. Depuis sa fondation en 2001, HOSPICE Angelus a pris soin de plus de 15.000 patients et de leurs familles. Tout cela n’aurait pu être possible sans le soutien et la générosité d’individus et d’organisations qui comprennent que l’accès aux soins palliatifs n’est pas un luxe mais un droit humain.

La République de Moldavie est souvent considérée comme étant le pays le plus pauvre d’Europe et au cours de nos efforts déployés durant toutes ces années nous avons remarqué que plus de 90% des personnes nécessitant des soins palliatifs proviennent d’un milieu socio-économique vulnérable.

La situation économique actuelle en Moldavie continue d’avoir un impact négatif sur la collecte de fonds au niveau local, et aujourd’hui plus que jamais NOUS AVONS BESOIN DE VOUS afin de financer notre Département mobile de soins palliatifs pédiatriques pour une durée de douze mois.

Les soins palliatifs pédiatriques sont une branche de soins spécialisés destinés aux enfants souffrant de maladies graves (mucoviscidose, dystrophie musculaire, paralysie cérébrale et autres maladies dégénératives). Ces soins se focalisent sur le contrôle des symptômes et le soulagement de la douleur et du stress d’une maladie grave - quel que soit le diagnostic. L’objectif est d’améliorer la qualité de vie à la fois de l’enfant et de sa famille.

Coût total du département : 30.000$/an.

Structure du département : 1 docteur, 1 infirmier/ère, 1 assistant(e) social(e), beaucoup de volontaires et plus de 100 enfants soignés chaque année.

A HOSPICE, nous aspirons à un monde où les gens comprennent que ce qui compte n’est pas combien de jours restent à vivre mais comment vivre pleinement chaque jour. Et lorsque l’on est en phase terminale, il n’est question que de famille, d’amour, de soin et de confort, pour une vie quotidienne sur laquelle la douleur n’a plus prise.

« Si la mort a un taux de réussite de 100%, cela ne doit pas être le cas de la douleur ».

Avec 15$, vous financez une visite à domicile de notre Département mobile de soins palliatifs pédiatriques.

Visitez notre site web pour en connaître davantage à propos d’HOSPICE Angelus.

From 2001, when it was founded, HOSPICE Angelus cared for over 15.000 terminally ill patients and their families. And this wouldn't have been possible without the support of generous people and companies that understood that access to palliative care is not a luxury but a human right.The Republic of Moldova is considered to be the poorest country in Europe and through our devoted work during the years we understood that more than 90% of our beneficiaries that are in need of palliative care come from vulnerable social and economical background.The current economical situation of the country has taken a toll on local fundraising, and now more than ever WE NEED YOUR HELP in order to finance our Pediatric Palliative Mobile Department for 12 months.Pediatric Palliative care is specialized medical care for children with serious illnesses. It focuses on providing relief from the symptoms, pain, and stress of a serious illness—whatever the diagnosis. The goal is to improve quality of life for both the child and the family.Total cost of the department : 30.000 $ / year.Department Structure : 1 Doctor, 1 Nurse, 1 Social Assistant, lots of volunteers and more than 100 children cared for yearly. Here at HOSPICE, we believe in a world where people know that it does not matter how many days you have to live but how you live every day. story:
Production Plan:

  -The lacrosse shaft we are producing is a two-stage project.  The first stage is a 2-piece outer shaft, which is being produced for us in China.  Unfortunately, we were unable to find a company in the United States that could make the outer shaft out of the material we need.  The material is a rare mixture of metals that is not found in the U.S.  This is the second most expensive part of our production line-up, with approximately $2,000-$3,000 of our funds going towards this area. 

  -The second stage is a small inner shaft that serves a dual purpose. First, it acts as a secondary support system for the strength of the stick at the connection point.  Secondly, it houses the push button release system.  This piece is being developed by a metal extrusion company based out of Youngstown, OH.  This is the most expensive part of our project.  We have searched all around for metal companies that deal with supplying small amounts to buyers.  Unfortunately, we had no such luck.  Every metal supplier we contacted deals with large amounts; for example, the company we decided to work with has a minimum order of 1,000lbs. This is where the bulk of our earning from kickstarter will go, with at least $5,000 of our funds raised going towards this part of the project.  

  -The assembly of the entire shaft will be completed by my partners in the project and I in Massachusetts.  This will be the least expensive part of production seeing that we will be the ones conducting the assemply of our product.  It will just be time consuming. 

-The remainder of the money will be distributed between setting up a website, purchasing apparel, purchasing insurance, setting up an LLC and the cost of setting up tents at various lacrosse tournaments to sell the products.

Risks and challenges

Currently, our biggest hurdle is getting this design approved by the National Federation of State High School Associations (NFHS) and the National Collegiate Athletics Association (NCAA). The two organizations have rules against shafts that they consider to be adjustable. We are currently in the process of having the rules changed, and we have submitted out proposal to the rules committee.

The two organizations have rules against shafts that they consider to be adjustable. story:
Calling All Yogis. Cool Kids. Yummy Mummies. Kale Lovers. Matcha Latte Connoisseurs. Wild Things. Handstand Addicts.

 

 Yoga Connects is the largest Yoga festival in the UK!  The essence of the festival is a platform of playful fun and connection, uniting all forms of yoga with healthy vegan /veggie food,  epic live music and sustainable living and selection of entertainment. Held annually in the UK at a spectacular location at a stately home estate.

What are we aiming to do?

In three days we aim to transform the lives of our audience for the better. The Yoga Connects festival is a plastic free zone and we will provide solutions and educate people how to live sustainably and ethically. There is a spa for holistic treatments and a lake to try Stand Up Paddle Board Yoga. 

Offering not only an excellent variety of yoga classes, gong baths, a Yoga Rave, meditations and adventures, but mainly bringing together an amazing group of yoga teachers, artists, musicians, inspirational speakers, foodies, health enthusiasts to expand this positive energy.

Our ethos 

We promote collaboration, positivity, nurturing each other and being good to others around us, as well as ourselves. It is the spirit of Karma yoga. We unite and stand up for all people helping them to feel valued, loved, nurtured, supported, connected and for all of us to enjoy the interaction in the natural beautiful outdoors setting under the stars.

Created for Yogis, by Yogis.

We are team of Yogis and our dream is to create a remarkable experience. This is a community and a platform where we can do amazing yoga of any style, meet interesting people, chat all day long, exchange ideas, dance under the stars, run, swim, sing, hug, move, enjoy delicious food, embrace free spirit, have fun, try new things, get out of the comfort zone, sit around the fire, be conscious and find extraordinary inspiration and a real zest for life. We want to transform perception, share new ideas, elevate one another and create an inspiring playground for adults and children.

The Yoga Connects Festival 2016 

14-17th July 2016

 

OUR AIM

We aim to raise £108,000 (108 is a sacred number in Buddhist teachings) The required finance is to ensure the new year with the budget in place and to tie it in with the overall planning of the 2016 Yoga Connect’s Festival. 

The breakdown of cost: Upgrading the experience, from quality wooden floor Marquees, power, electricity, quality toilets and showers, insurance) Manpower, Technical Equipment (top quality sound, lighting, camera and IT equipment to record and produce music, video and promotional material, venue hire, salaries for the Yoga Connects team, international flights for Yoga teachers from abroad, PR, marketing, Promotion and Administrative cost. 

The idea behind the concept is is to unite and connect the existing yoga scene in the UK and Worldwide. Yoga Connects is the hub of a series of events, yoga holidays and mini-festivals worldwide.

At the heart of our vision is to help people, animals and the planet. We declared it a plastic free zone. Therefore we are not using any plastic and hope to attract a wide audience and speakers to expand on this subject.

 

Yoga Connects festival 2015

The first Yoga Connects 2015 launched with a Boom!! as the first internationally acclaimed yoga festival in Stanford Hall estate near Rugby. The event attracted 400 people from around the globe. 

Sensationally, it has been voted one of the Top 20 Yoga festivals around the world by Cody App. Cody app is the most successful Yoga App based in the US selling online yoga classes around the world.

Including in the weekend ticket (3-day pass) an unlimited selection of yoga classes, a variety of activities, live music, a Shamanic opening ceremony, a Yoga Rave, dance classes, Gong baths with excellent Yoga Teachers from around the world. We created an experience for everyone to connect, exchange, network, practice yoga and above all have relax and have fun.

The line up included big name yoga teachers, Meghan Currie from Canada, YogaBeyond from Australia, Dylan Werner and Patrick Beach from the US and Celest Pereira from the UK amongst other UK based teachers, musicians, performers and speakers.

 

Yoga Connects - we aim to make the world a better place by creating a platform for connection. Our vision is collaboration and shared vibration.

TESTIMONIALS:

“Everyone was more than happy mingling with people they’d never met, chilling out with them in the sunshine on the grass, sharing food and/or a smoothie from one of the stands, or some yoga tips to help improve certain postures. Yoga does indeed connect, and that’s exactly what this festival was doing”. The festival was true success in my opinion. It brought together people from all over the world and allowed them to connect through a shared love of yoga, and the number of people there was Goldilocks for me – just the right amount. Whilst I have no doubt this event will grow to be even bigger and better in the years to come, I’m glad I went to this first one as, whilst it was grand, it still felt intimate. Dare to Move Blog

“Yoga Connects Festival is perfectly named for the atmosphere it managed to create. Everywhere you looked, people were exploring what yoga and connection meant to them. Rarely have I had the pleasure of being in the presence of so many soulful, loving, compassionate, generous and open hearted people. The festival was pure magic, fuelled by love and passion for yoga and connection that it facilitates” TRUE YOGA COLLECTIVE blog

“Yoga connects is not just a festival it’s a community where the vibration of love is strong. The festival was perfect, the vibe around the festival was super chilled but the schedule was packed out, so lots of incredible classes to choose from. There is something for everyone, from Voga to yoga on paddleboards to vinyasa flow classes. You have created something really special and I’m so excited about next year!!!” Vanessa Sadaghna

“The Yoga Connects Festival, wow what an amazing experience... Attending the festival as a new yogi I was bowled over by the vibe, I thought it was going to be full of yummy mummy's on a weekend break. Instead I was met with a whole mixture of different people, different backgrounds all connected by the common denominator of Love, the Love vibe was everywhere, whether it became the focus in your practice, people openly wanting to make a difference to their surroundings, through the daily meditations held or just chatting to people and feeling their vibes. Then there was the music a great mix of live bands and even a yoga rave.. If you wanted to chill, you could, it was a beautiful summer’s weekend the sun was shining, people not in classes just hanging out and chatting or if you wanted more serious relaxation a fully operational spa.. I mean what more could you want, Yoga was clearly the main offering but the festival had so much more to offer I can’t wait to attend next years!!!” Clair Carter 

"Yoga Connects Festival is more than a one-off event, it’s a burgeoning community featuring some of the most inspiring and interesting yogis in the world. They are a bright light in the industry, maintaining yogic principals both on and off the mat! Despite hundreds of people being there- there was virtually no plastic and scarce waste - I only saw one bin that was actually full! Can’t wait til next years- please support this growing family and join in on the fun." Jessica Long

“Yoga connects literally does exactly what it says on the Tin ! It is a brilliantly scheduled yoga festival in the UK that connects a whole group of likeminded people together under one big family roof. The vibe here was off the hook this year with people buzzing around doing yoga, making friends and a whole lot more. There is nothing not to love about this festival it literally has something for everyone and it not to be missed !” Charlotte Wellfare

“Yoga, global connection around the bonfire, ceremony, camping underneath the stars, conscious talks, soaking in hot tubs, lakes and watching people full of joy and laughter whilst underneath the open sky. From dream to reality YOGA CONNECTS FESTIVAL is truly magical!”  Marc Laws II

"SurfSUPyoga were honoured to be a part of the 2015 Yoga Connects Festival. We had an absolute blast running SUP & SUPyoga sessions at such a stunning venue, with the most perfect lake and conditions for beginners & taster sessions. The vibe was amazing, we were blessed with beautiful weather and everyone was really keen to get OmBoard to practise their asana in a class or people were able to just hire boards and paddle in total safety while chillaxing in the most serene surroundings. The organisation and smooth running of the entire festival was second to none. Really looking forward to Yoga Connects 2016 where we will have a floating dock with SUPfit session to add to the schedule" Nichola Cummiskey,  Founder of surfsupfityoga.com

There is nothing not to love about this festival it literally has something for everyone and it not to be missed !” Charlotte Wellfare“Yoga, global connection around the bonfire, ceremony, camping underneath the stars, conscious talks, soaking in hot tubs, lakes and watching people full of joy and laughter whilst underneath the open sky. From dream to reality YOGA CONNECTS FESTIVAL is truly magical!”  Marc Laws II"SurfSUPyoga were honoured to be a part of the 2015 Yoga Connects Festival. We had an absolute blast running SUP & SUPyoga sessions at such a stunning venue, with the most perfect lake and conditions for beginners & taster sessions. The vibe was amazing, we were blessed with beautiful weather and everyone was really keen to get OmBoard to practise their asana in a class or people were able to just hire boards and paddle in total safety while chillaxing in the most serene surroundings. The organisation and smooth running of the entire festival was second to none. Really looking forward to Yoga Connects 2016 where we will have a floating dock with SUPfit session to add to the schedule" Nichola Cummiskey,  Founder of surfsupfityoga.com

story:
Its very difficult for a small business to get off the ground without seed funding, but fortunately for Secretly Obvious, our products are so effective that we have been making it without these resources since March of 2015! We would like to expand our business to a wider audience and be able to offer affordable natural holistic products to the public in stores, farmers markets, and be even more accessible world wide. Currently we have to wait for orders in order to get inventory, which makes our shipping and wait times longer than necessary! Any amount of money we gain from this campaign will be used to purchase more inventory so we can sell our products in stores and Farmer's Markets.

Our hope for Secretly Obvious is that we can expand our product line  to include even more natural products to suit a wide variety of skin types and concerns. We wish to continue to provide truly natural essential oil solutions in a horribly lacking and poisonous landscape. I am so grateful for all the support and help I have received to get this business off the ground, and I'm honored to have the rewarding opportunity to provide truly effective health products to the public. 

Modern pharmacology is essentially the process of taking the active ingredients out of plants and putting them a pill, lotion, powder, or other form, along with fillers and carrier or neutral substrates. By completely bypassing that process, and using pure herbs or plant extract, essential oil and herbal users have more success and less cost. These products work because they are pure, all natural, potent, and are created using ancient wisdom that has proven effective since the dawn of time. We are all over saturated in a sea of products that either aren't good for us, or simply don't work to restore health or prevent illness. We are being ripped off in every store by nearly every product available for purchase, because they are all made in a chemical plant funded by corporate greed and agenda. The results simply aren't adding up for any of us, and we could all use the opportunity to invest in our own future and our own health. 

Though holistic and alternative medicine has a somewhat controversial history, we are now equipped as a society with the scientific understanding that there is nothing better for human beings than plants. Those who are believers in essential oils and herbs, understand that they have been used as the oldest form of medicine in the world. There is nothing new about nature. 

Essential oils are for every body capable of taking responsibility for their own health. Nature provides us with everything we need to be happy and healthy, but most stores and market places offer toxic materials that either don't work at all, or require continual purchase. Many of these products aren't good for us, and billions of dollars go into selling them to us. We are plagued with products that offer anything but a natural solution, and being that the FDA regulations are sold to the highest bidder, the ingredients on the phrasing and ingredients on labels don't even have to be truthful in the United States. 

As early as 3,500 B.C. human history shows the use of botanicals and essential oils as healing agents. The Egyptians were the first people to extensively make use of aromatherapy and aromatic herbs and included their use in religion, cosmetics as well as medicinal purposes. Essential oils were used in burial practices, embalming and mummification. One of the most enduring records of essential oil use during the Roman Empire is the New Testament. Israelites used essential oils such as frankincense, cedarwood, hyssop, fir, and spikenard to heal wounds and elevate spiritual communion.

Read More about our products here

We launched to the public in March 2015 and the enthusiastic and grateful testimonials started flowing in, we got very busy and sold out fast. To this day we have only operated by word of mouth and social media, and we have had no seed funding whatsoever! With a very small team, using only hand-me-down-machines, printers, and workstations, we currently operate in a little home office space in San Diego California. Our beginnings have been humble enough to teach us some valuable lessons about working together as husband and wife, as well as what it really takes to run a such a magical business. It's a little cramped, but I am so grateful to be able to do something I love and see people truly benefit from it.

You see, Secretly Obvious is a big beautiful love story that just keeps getting bigger and better! We decided to call the company "Secretly Obvious" because we felt the ancient answers to healing were in plain sight, and pretty common sense. We were hoping that the name of the company would inspire introspection and a multitude of additional benefits from using essential oils for spiritual communion and holistic health. We were right! Not only do we have a nearly 100% success rate at treating acne and other skin conditions including eczema, psoriasis, urticaria (hives), and fungal infections, we have personal testimonials describing the empowering aromatherapeutic effects that my pure essential oil formulas have on the mind, body, and spirit. This is because essential oils treat the whole system! 

View more testimonials here! 

Secretly Obvious has a lot of room for expansion, currently we offer a limited product selection because we haven't had the extra revenue to expand and develop more products. Thus far, we've been successful in offering only the following Skincare products in 3-6 Month supplies:

Natural Home Made Essential Oil Bar Soap (Great for shaving! Safe for babies!)

Pure Essential Oils and my Custom Formula Blends

Essential Oil Hydrating Body Blend (Great for Massage!)

All Natural SPF 25 Sunscreen 

And just recently we launched our Butters just in time for the cold winter weather!

I'd like to be able to develop the following additional products and be able to sell them in smaller, more affordable sizes:

By helping Secretly Obvious, you are helping a group of young entrepreneurs provide truly awesome products to the public. We all know how hard it is for any business in a recession and this bad economy is no exception. I'm proud and honored to have the opportunity to provide such astounding quality and results that speak for themselves, loud enough to uphold this business. 

While we are very hands on and have multiple skill sets, we need a few things in order to expand the inventory and perfect the products for public sale. 


The overall benefits are kind of, well...obvious! If Secretly Obvious expands, more people will have easier access to products that they can truly benefit from, you'll be helping create jobs and income in our country and developing countries.

If you'd like to help in other ways please email me at secretlyobviousskincare at gmail dot com. :)

Just in time for the Holiday Season! You can purchase our current inventory online! We have some great specials and as always our products are all natural, very powerful and transformative! 

SHOP HOLIDAY SALE HERE!

Maybe you'd like to spread the word? Do you know someone struggling with a skin condition? Help us help them by sending them to our website!

Follow & Share our Social Media:

Instagram: @Secretly_Obvious

Facebook.com/secretlyobvious

Email Update Sign Up

Risks & Challenges

User mistakes

Essential oils don't let us lie to ourselves. They dramatically effect the human system, and these effects are usually positive. At the end of the day, using these products correctly and following the recommendations and instructions, will yield positive results in more ways than one. Misusing the products does NOT include burns, scars, bleaching, or other toxic damage that is associated with other skincare. Ours is safe to experiment with to a certain extent, the only challenge is patience from users! 

User Patience and Honesty

If a user is allergic to plants such as flowers, trees, grasses, vegetables, or fruits, I can always create a custom formula for anyone concerned, but they must tell me! My exact formulation of ingredients is a secret but anyone with a specific allergy should know that I include a spectrum of plant oils and nothing else. If you are unsure about allergies, just get a blood panel done, you may find out more information about the causes of your skin condition this way and it can help us naturally eliminate it. 

Logistics and Red Tape

Challenges include the waiting game, searching and finding what we need for expansion, legal patenting and insuring, and other expected  logistics of "Red Tape". 

Our products sell themselves, they truly work, and the only challenge is spreading the word to responsible people who believe in the power of Nature!

Thank you once again and we will be updating you the whole way through. To sign up for email updates please click here. You'll get first access to our journey. :)

story:
Invisible Sea's mission is to clean up the air in the Salton Sea Basin, a desert area in the far southeast corner of California - the nation's winter breadbasket. The region, fed by Colorado River water, produces some 80% of our winter vegetables. It is also an extremely dusty and windy area. The population is comprised mostly of poor migrant workers and their families. The kids in the area suffer the highest asthma-related illnesses in the state - an astounding 20% of them have asthma. The local clinics are overwhelmed and underfunded. The politicians could care less as the area is not a great source of votes. Oh, and this isn't a tragedy unfolding in some far-off third-world country - this is happening right here in our US of A!

We have been working with a company that manufactures a federally - approved (EPA) environmentally friendly (see below) dust suppressant. This campaign's goal is to fund the sealing of dirt roads and fields adjacent to the schools in the region, thereby greatly reducing the inhalation of the toxic particles by the kids.



Sealing the dirt areas around the schools will greatly reduce the ability of the tiny particles from becoming airborne and lodging deep inside children's lungs, causing inflammation, asthma attacks, and a major increase in the incidence of cancer.

It costs less that $3 for a 100 square foot area (10 feet by 10 feet) to seal an emissive surface, which is peanuts compared to the medical and lifestyle costs of inaction. 


Copolymer is a topical solution that forms molecular bonds with the particulate matter, holding it in place and preventing it from becoming airborne. It is nontoxic, biodegradable, as well as approved of by the EPA and California EPA. It is safe for human and animal contact and allows vegetation to continue growing. Copolymer is easy to apply and extremely durable, only needing reapplication every few years, making it a low-maintenance project. Copolymer sealants are, in many cases, intended to seal emissive dirt roads, thus copolymer sealants are perfectly suited to mitigate the air quality issue affecting the area's schools.

 - A cross-section of soil sealed by SoilTac.




Particulate matter is the sum of all solid and liquid particles suspended in air. Particulates are emitted into the air often via wind blowing. These particulates, frequently dust and other hazardous substances, pose a great threat to human health, especially in children and the elderly. Particulate matter can cause respiratory illnesses and will greatly affect those with pre-existing heart and lung disease or asthma. In areas with high speed and frequent wind, particulate matter presents a grave threat. 

Particulate matter is divided into pm 10 and pm 2.5, pm 2.5 being the smallest particles. They are around 30 times smaller than the diameter of a human hair. Particulates can be toxic to human health, especially considering the smallest particulates can go directly to the bloodstream. Along with smoking cigarettes, pm 10 and pm 2.5 particulates are classified as Group 1 carcinogens. Particulates have been linked to elevated risks for asthma, lung cancer, leukemia, and cardiovascular diseases.


Worse, there are NO SAFE THRESHOLDS for both the pm10 the pm2.5 (fine”) particles, although the World Health Organization (WHO) and the EPA have established ostensibly “safer” thresholds.

This is a simple, easy, and inexpensive solution, a minuscule sacrifice to make for the health of the affected children. Our goal is to raise $100,000, which will be sufficient to seal the most critical areas near the schools. Obviously, more is better. It will also legitimize the procedure as we intend to pressure local, state and federal agencies to continue and expand upon our efforts.




Simple - this saves lives. If we can succeed in bringing the particulate pollution in the region down to World Health Organization (WHO) standards, we will witness an 18% decrease in mortality! According to WHO, that would represent a major health benefit.

Simple - this enhances the quality of lives. This will reduce the horrendous incidence of asthma and respiratory diseases in the region. Kids would be able to use their ballfields without coughing and choking.

Simple - you helped.



Of course, any donation is greatly appreciated, but Invisible Sea would also like to encourage supporters to share the cause with any friends and family. You can visit our website at InvisibleSea.org, or utilize the share features that Indiegogo has made available. Invisible Sea also encourages anyone who feels that they can help to reach out to the organization. Invisible Sea could use help from a variety of people (graphic designers, artists, community leaders, teachers, etc.). To contact us, use the email posted below.

The kids are deeply thankful for any and all contributions! If you have any questions or would like to contact us, email INFO@invisiblesea.org.

story:
Is hepatitis B life threatening?

Hepatitis B is a potentially life-threatening liver infection caused by the hepatitis B virus. It is a major global health problem. It can cause chronic infection and puts people at high risk of death from cirrhosis and liver cancer.


Short Summary

Hello friends 

I'm khurram from pakistan  and I'm trying to raise fund for the treatment of my dad for his problem of hepatitis B which is effecting his liver now and liver is become fatty and also increased in size which is really worry sign for me and his health I had given all of my  financial help to him but now at this stage I'm help less as I'm short on money for his treatment going to  Thailand I even end up my career just for him so that I can look after him all the time but now I need help from you guys I hope you guys will help me in raising the fund for his treatment please help me i really need funds for his urgent treatment 

Thanks

Why Doing this Fund raising  ? 

the reason is that we are having financial problem and family is going through a very bad time and just only way of income is from my Mother salary which is not enough which can help to get the treatment of my father so that why i chose that plate form to seek help and save the life of my dad and let his that problem will be treated properly i hope i will be able to get help from you all out there. and which will make my able to take my dad for treatment  once again i will thanks all to those who will make their countribution     

Please join us with $25, $50, $100 or even $500 now. and we need your help to secure it!

What is Hepatitis B?

Hepatitis B is an infectious disease caused by the hepatitis B virus (HBV) which affects the liver. It can cause both acute and chronic infections. Many people have no symptoms during the initial infection. Some develop a rapid onset of sickness with vomiting, yellow skin, feeling tired, dark urine and abdominal pain.

Is there a cure for hepatitis B?

If there is less hepatitis B virus being produced, then there is less damage being done to the liver. Sometimes these drugs can even get rid of the virus. With all of the new exciting research, there is great hope that a complete cure will be found for chronic hepatitis B in the near future.

So far Donation from Different Countires with the Graph
