story:
GET FIT.GET FOCUSED.

GETSTUMPIN'.

Conceived by Kappel LeRoy Clarke, a 27-year Sports & Fitness Training veteran, creator of FRE FLO DO, & 2-time World Record Setter & Holder of his 2.7 mile Pier 2 Pier Kettlebell Challenge (2010 & 2013 see YouTube 'A Marathon of Power'), STUMPS™ & The Dynamic Precision System aka STUMPIN'™ combine to get you Fit, Focused & Proficient in moving with Heightened Independent Body Control.

MAKE ANY SPACE

YOUR STUMPIN' GROUND

STUMPS™ are durable 3-in-1 high performance platforms with varied bases of support & bold signature markings that transform any indoor or outdoor space into a fun, challenging & mindful workout environment.

These versatile training tools come 4 per set & can accommodate a wide range of users & applications, including:





ENGAGE  EXPOSE  ENHANCE™


The Dynamic Precision System aka STUMPIN'™ is an integration of bodyweight conditioning, movement refinement & sensory response enhancement that uses STUMPS™ to introduce a new dimension to assessing, developing & enhancing:

  • Mental Focus
  • Core & Total Body Strength
  • Injury Preventative Movement Mechanics
  • Balance & Stabilization
  • Footwork
  • Quickness
  • Stamina
  • Spatial Awareness


CHECK YOUR BALANCE

RIGHT NOW.

Stand flat on one foot. How's your balance? Good? Mediocre? Poor? Now, stand on the ball & toes of that foot. How's your balance now? Probably severely compromised with noticeable amounts of twitching & excessive motion taking place at your toes, foot & ankle, not to mention swinging hips, erratic tilting of your upper body & flailing arms (a bit like a bird flying in a wind storm).

Clearly, you can feel that just because you may be able to balance yourself fairly well when standing on one leg with a flat foot, doesn't automatically mean that you can do the same when standing on the ball & toes of that foot. The disparity between these 2 types of balance is important because the first relates to static/minimal movement situations, while the latter form of balance, on the ball & toes, illuminates existing deficiencies directly related to moving dynamically from one point to another, which can potentially lead to serious short & long term problems.

PROBLEM?

What most active & inactive people who suffer from knee, hip & back pain, as well as frequent ankle sprains fail to realize is that the low strength & stabilization capacity of the foot & ankle complex, created by years of reinforced flat foot positioning during exercise or during ground contact in motion, leads to:

  • compromised ankle integrity & mobility
  • inhibited lower body shock absorbency in walking, running, & landing from jumping which stresses the joints (ankle, knee, hip & back), bones (upper/lower leg & heel) & prematurely wears down the cartilage between the bones
  • under-stimulated core muscles (abdominals, obliques, mid/lower back & glutes) which are supposed to protect the spine, yield good posture & facilitate leverage for producing power through the extremities
  • subpar movement mechanics, balance in motion, stabilization & overall body control, even in the extremely fit

    • A CREDIBLE SOLUTION!

    STUMPS™ &The Dynamic Precision System™ aka STUMPIN'™, a product of revolutionary design & a training method for game changing results, combine to: 

    • make any indoor or outdoor space a dynamic workout environment facilitating exercises that target & strengthen those weak & commonly overlooked areas key to independent body control
    • correct & improve movement mechanics for daily function, while optimizing fitness levels, athletic performance & injury prevention
    • introduce hundreds of fun, comprehensive & user-friendly bodyweight based workouts that can be done in as little as 15 minutes a day or dialed up as needed 
    • ENGAGE EXPOSE ENHANCE™ any level of user mentally & physically from Kids to seniors, Fitness Enthusiasts to Professional Athletes, or those returning from injury setbacks under the care of Sports Medicine Specialists via unique applications that demand presence of mind & improve concentration & proprioception (spatial awareness)

    FIELD TESTED & APPROVED BY PROS & FITNESS JUNKIES

    PERFORMANCE MINDED is extremely pleased with  the responses & endorsements that our patent-pending STUMPS™ & The Dynamic Precision System™ have received from the Sports & Fitness Professionals & equally appreciated Fitness Junkies, who have participated in over 2 & a half years of rigorous prototype field-testing across a wide range of applications including:

    • Individual & Group Fitness
    • Athletic Performance
    • Sports Medicine (Prehab & Rehab/Physical Therapy)
    * Notice our growing list of STUMPIN'™ enthusiasts & first Pre-Order customers below stemming from the field tests...

    We are grateful for the following people & organizations for their time, open-mindedness & willingness to field-test the prototypes & for their PRE-ORDERS of the first production run units. Your approval of STUMPS™ & The Dynamic Precision System™ aka STUMPIN'™ cannot be overstated.
    • Strength & Conditioning Coaches for UCLA's Men's Basketball team
    • Assistant Strength & Conditioning Coach for USC's Women's Soccer Team
    • UCLA NCAA National Women's Volleyball Champion player turned Pro Lauren Van Orden
    • USC NCAA Women's Soccer National Champion turned Pro Ashley Nick
    • STAY READY Physical Therapy, owner Dr. Aman Abye & the entire STAY READY Staff of Physical Therapists, Strength & Conditioning Coaches & Trainers
    • Orthopedic Surgeon & Sports Medicine Specialist, Dr. Eric Millstein of Millstein Orthopedics
    • Mizuno Long Beach Volleyball Club Owners/Directors Joy & Matt Fuerbringer
    • Peak Volleyball Academy Owner/Trainer & former Team USA Libero Alfe Reft
    • NYU Men's Volleyball Assistant Coach Karl France
    • Over a dozen Fitness Professionals (Personal Trainers, Youth Sports Coaches, Yoga, Pilates & Martial Arts Instructors)
    • The handful of youth spirited Seniors (65 years & up) who demonstrated fluidity in motion & uncanny calmness on the STUMPS™.
    • AND the 150+ Pre-Teen & Teen athletes ages 11 - 18 from Mizuno Long Beach Volleyball Club & those brave ones who train with Kappel at his  studio! (Watching you all #GetStumpin was priceless)


    DISRUPTING THE STATUS QUO OF CONVENTIONAL WISDOM

    A widely accepted practice among fitness & sports medicine professionals is instructing people to push from the heel of the foot while performing "functional exercises" selected for strengthening & toning the lower body, as well as to improve daily activities like climbing & descending stairs, walking, running & jumping. Notice the 'heel down' position, indicated by red arrows, in the following examples of the 3 most common exercises used for this purpose:  

    SQUATS

    LUNGES

    STEP UPS

    However, close observation of lower body driven motion that carries the body from point to point clearly reveals that the contact area of the foot during ground force production (the push off & acceleration), as well as ground force absorption (the landing & deceleration), actually occurs at the ball of the foot & toes...not the heel.

    In the words of a certain ‘shark in the tank’ I hope to one day meet,  STOP THE MADNESS!  Functional exercises are supposed to mimic & enhance real life function, yet the popular heel drive emphasis in lower body strength exercises practiced for decades does not accurately translate into real life function.

    In fact, any constant reinforcement of neuromuscular pathways set by repeated movement patterns, that do not translate effectively into daily life, as is the case with the HEEL DOWN drive, actually perpetuates a disconnect of the stabilizing muscles which are necessary for translating power & strength during ground force production & absorption. As a consequence, these critical muscles remain underdeveloped & lack the capacity to sufficiently safeguard the body from the risks of common avoidable injuries sustained when moving from point to point.

    Just because exercise science predetermines what many in the industry subscribe to when it comes to exercise prescription, doesn’t mean that we shouldn’t, from time to time, in any industry revisit the question of our intentions. What are we trying to achieve? Merely moving heavier weight? Or facilitating optimal performance with an adherence to injury prevention? But don't take my word for it. See for yourself. Does real life propulsion happen at the Heel they way people are taught to do conventional Squats, Lunges or Step Ups, or at the Ball of the Foot & Toes? Which do YOU see in the following real life examples?


    WALKING:

    HEEL OR BALL OF THE FOOT & TOES?


    A SPRINTER EXPLODING OUT OF THE STARTING BLOCKS:

    HEEL OR BALL OF THE FOOT & TOES?


    A SPRINTER IN TRANSITION TO TOP SPEED:

    HEEL OR BALL OF THE FOOT & TOES?


    WHAT PART OF THE FOOT ARE STARTING BLOCKS DESIGNED TO SUPPORT & WHAT OF PART OF THE FOOT DO THE ONLY SPIKES IN A SPRINTER'S TRACK SHOE APPEAR BENEATH:

    HEEL OR BALL OF THE FOOT & TOES?


    FOOTBALL LINEMEN READY TO POUNCE:

    HEEL OR BALL OF THE FOOT & TOES?


    A TENNIS PLAYER SERVING, RETURNING SERVE OR ATTACKING:

    HEEL OR BALL OF THE FOOT & TOES?


    A BASKETBALL PLAYER CUTTING DIRECTION:

    HEEL OR BALL OF THE FOOT & TOES?


    A BASKETBALL PLAYER JUMPING FOR THE SLAM:

    HEEL OR BALL OF THE FOOT & TOES?


    FIRST POINT OF GROUND CONTACT/BASKETBALL PLAYER LANDING:

    HEEL OR BALL OF THE FOOT & TOES?


    A CYCLIST PUSHING DOWN THE PEDAL:

    HEEL OR BALL OF THE FOOT & TOES?


    THE EXPLOSIVE PHASE OF AN OLYMPIC CLEAN:

    HEEL OR BALL OF THE FOOT & TOES?


    THE AREA OF THE FOOT WHICH THE A-STUMP & THE CENTERS OF THE B & C-STUMPS WERE DESIGNED TO SUPPORT & LAY TARGET FOR:

    HEEL OR BALL OF THE FOOT & TOES?


    If you answered THE BALL OF THE FOOT & TOES to all the above examples shown then you're eyes are working just fine! But more importantly, you've seen for yourself why HEEL DOWN/HEEL PUSH conventional wisdom, in this case,  falls short of the mark in fully preparing the body for the demands of moving from point to point in daily life & high level competition.

    ***This photo below illustrates one tragic consequence suffered by a professional basketball player whose body did exactly what it was trained to do. PUSH FROM THE HEEL during maximum force production. Sadly, this didn't end well for him. This player suffered a ruptured Achilles Tendon, had to get emergency surgery, endured unfathomable pain & spent a full season & off-season  recovering from his injury.

    Tragic errors like these can be avoided or at least dramatically minimized with a more thorough & deliberate unconventional approach to preparation process. A process governed by intention versus popular widely accepted practices that go unchecked.


    Make no mistake about it, STUMPIN'™ encompasses exercise science, but not at the expense of common sense. Using the STUMPS on a regular basis not only strengthens the stabilizing muscles of the foot & ankle complex for better balance, an all important physical attribute for seniors, but it increases the muscular endurance in that area enabling the body to maintain a more rigid spring structure. This stronger more resilient spring not only minimizes the risk of injury, but dramatically improves one's ability to generate the force needed to move quicker, to be more explosive, while simultaneously acting as a buffer against shock to the ankles, knees, hips & back. GET STUMPIN'!


    A REVOLUTION IN DESIGN


    "Slick", "high-tech" design & 'extra-terrestrial' are the words most frequently used to describe them at first sight. A closer look at the patent-pending STUMPS™, however, reveals design features that are not only visually compelling, but strategic in their function; further distinguishing them from any sports & fitness training product in existence.
    STUMPS™ 3-in-1 design means each FULL STUMP is compromised of 3 sub-STUMP sections. A top, B middle & C bottom.


    TARGET TOPS™  are 1 of the 3 strategic signature markings of the STUMPS™. Anyone can workout on a product & get something good out of it, but training on these high performance platforms keeps you accountable to precise hand & foot placements, which by default, keeps mental focus & body control at the forefront of your STUMPIN'™ workout experience. As discussed earlier the diameter of the A-STUMP is designed to accommodate the Ball of the Foot & Toes & for the purpose of progression, wider STUMPS are favorable when the user needs a little room for error. But across all sub-sections the 5½ inch diameter is the repeated focal point that keeps accountability to precision constant. 



    WAFFLE BOTTOMS  Bring an engineer's sensibility into the durability of the STUMPS™. Each sub-section is designed to withstand a 1,000lb load which makes it well suited for the most dynamic applications. Dynamic. Imagine that.



    BASE LEVEL LINES  Are 2 of 3 signature markings that make it very easy to spot the your STUMPS™ & detect how high or low your next hand or foot placement needs to be. A very helpful feature once your STUMPIN'™ skills progress to a quicker movement tempo & spatial awareness becomes more intuitive.


    THE NUMERICAL DOTS the third signature marking was conceptualized for universal recognition when performing drills that have the user navigate to & from assigned STUMPS™. Since they are identical in shape & size, they need to be distinguishable for users around the world. One tree, one fruit, one dot is still one in any part of the globe regardless of language. It's that simple.



    CONFIGURABLE Each of your STUMPS™ can be configured in the following 4 ways. There are hundreds of workouts that can be done & infinite ways in which you can be the architect of your own STUMPIN'™ GROUND.


    STACKABLE     Storing your STUMPS™ is simple & takes no more floor space than the footprint of an 65cm inflatable exercise ball.


    NIGHT VISION     Technically, it's not a signature marking, but an effect of the signature markings. Flip the lights & enjoy an unparalleled workout experience that stimulates the senses with its unique, luminescent, glow  in the dark Signature Markings. (Night Vision is a feature of the patent-pending STUMPS™ but has not yet been confirmed as available for the first production run)

    ABOUT THIS CAMPAIGN                                                                                          

    The patent-pending STUMPS™ prototypes have endured almost 3 years of 'real world' applications, including rigorous field-testing by top Fitness & Sports Medicine Professionals including those in Sports Medicine (a tough audience to please) as well as Athletes, Youth & Seniors. After passing all tests with flying colors, & removing any doubt about how it will be received in real world applications, the time has come to move this product into the next exciting stage. The first production run, which will make STUMPIN' accessible worldwide!

    PERFORMANCE MINDED must raise $60K which will be used to implement final design modifications which, after extensive participant testing, were deemed necessary to enhance the total STUMPIN'™ experience, from form to function. 

    We got tremendous positive feedback from all of our participants, yet as a young company we will stop at nothing to ensure that the workmanship of the product & the integrity of the training method meet the highest standards that we set for ourselves. A standard that we respect & know is expected from the esteemed professionals who have endorsed the STUMPS & the many others out there like you, who have yet to GetStumpin' firsthand.

    With a key investors lined up for the actual manufacturing, marketing, operating expenses of this start up, raising this $60K will allow PERFORMANCE MINDED to advance to the next critical step towards production AND, to retain sufficient equity which will be used strategically to attract & build an incentivized Team of dedicated professionals (some of whom are already being scouted). I personally believe in the power of multiple passionate brilliant minds, sharing in a vision, the excitement & huge undertaking of making STUMPIN' one of the most recognizable & successful brands in the history of Fitness.

    TO OUR FUTURE SUPPORTERS                                                                                         

    You've seen the product in action! What you may not know is that these patent-pending prototype STUMPS™ were made possible largely from a previous campaign hosted right here on INDIEGOGO back in 2013. At that time, people trusted me with their contributions without even seeing so much as a sketch of the product. Those supporters took my word & I took that confidence & their generosity, multiplied it with prayer, blood & good ol' fashioned sweat! 

    I'm here today showcasing what was once a burning vision in my mind that I could barely contain. It's real now because people believed in me when I had nothing but my word to give them. Today, I have my word, my track record of doing what exactly I said I would do, these cool STUMPS & droves of people who now have their own stories & experiences with the STUMPS. People who use the prototypes regularly with me, & have already written checks to Pre-Order their own sets! Imagine what I'll do this time around. 

    STUMPIN'™ is a lit fuse & your help will keep it burning. You can Pre-Order your STUMPS™ in any of the following 3 ways:

    1. FULL SET - 4 Platforms, each consisting of 3 sub-sections, 12 Platforms total; A, B & C times 4. This allows you to take full advantage of the total STUMPIN' experience from Beginner to the most Elite Competitive Athlete
    2. THE A & B SET - 4 Platforms, each consisting of 2 sub-sections/top & middle, 8 Platforms total; A & B times 4. The absence of the C-STUMPS™ (the largest bottom sub-section) in this option will limit the elevation choices of a FULL SET, but you'll be more than capable of experiencing a multitude of applications going this route.
    3. THE As - These 4 Individual Platforms are the apex of the STUMPS™. From a balance challenge & development standpoint, no part of the STUMP™ are more demanding than THE As. Within the STUMPIN' PROTOCOLS (education, programming & certification), which will be discussed in future video posts & updated content here on the campaign, THE As are the sub-sections of choice for applications under the banner of 'STUMPIN' TO GO'. The compact size of THE As makes them portable enough to take on the road, so that you'll never have to go without your daily dose of movement meditation & keeping your balance & mental focus sharp. They're deceptively versatile enough to ensure that you'll get a full workout from the bottom to the top wherever you may go! THE As will keep you honest in your training. Don't let their size fool you.
    Additionally, you can support this campaign by purchasing Tank Tops, T-Shirts & Hoodies (all available in Black with White print) which will boldly bear the STUMPIN'™ logo & let everyone know how you roll!
    Lastly, your support on Social Media & person to person word of mouth (you know how folks used to communicate) will help more than you realize! Repost & share our posts. And definitely TAG your peeps! They'll appreciate you giving them the heads up about a new movement in Sports & Fitness Training that's coming FAST!!! 
    Follow @KappelLeRoyClarke & @GetStumpin on Instagram & Twitter, & Facebook/KappelLeRoyClarke & Facebook/Stumpin. Check back here periodically for updates & surprise specials. Let's #GetStumpin Worldwide!
    Thank you in advance for your support...

MAKE ANY SPACE

Balance & Stabilization
Footwork

(Night Vision is a feature of the patent-pending STUMPS™ but has not yet been confirmed as available for the first production run)















ABOUT THIS CAMPAIGN                                                                                          
The patent-pending STUMPS™ prototypes have endured almost 3 years of 'real world' applications, including rigorous field-testing by top Fitness & Sports Medicine Professionals including those in Sports Medicine (a tough audience to please) as well as Athletes, Youth & Seniors. After passing all tests with flying colors, & removing any doubt about how it will be received in real world applications, the time has come to move this product into the next exciting stage. The first production run, which will make STUMPIN' accessible worldwide!
PERFORMANCE MINDED must raise $60K which will be used to implement final design modifications which, after extensive participant testing, were deemed necessary to enhance the total STUMPIN'™ experience, from form to function. 
We got tremendous positive feedback from all of our participants, yet as a young company we will stop at nothing to ensure that the workmanship of the product & the integrity of the training method meet the highest standards that we set for ourselves. A standard that we respect & know is expected from the esteemed professionals who have endorsed the STUMPS & the many others out there like you, who have yet to GetStumpin' firsthand.
With a key investors lined up for the actual manufacturing, marketing, operating expenses of this start up, raising this $60K will allow PERFORMANCE MINDED to advance to the next critical step towards production AND, to retain sufficient equity which will be used strategically to attract & build an incentivized Team of dedicated professionals (some of whom are already being scouted). I personally believe in the power of multiple passionate brilliant minds, sharing in a vision, the excitement & huge undertaking of making STUMPIN' one of the most recognizable & successful brands in the history of Fitness.

TO OUR FUTURE SUPPORTERS                                                                                         
You've seen the product in action! What you may not know is that these patent-pending prototype STUMPS™ were made possible largely from a previous campaign hosted right here on INDIEGOGO back in 2013. At that time, people trusted me with their contributions without even seeing so much as a sketch of the product. Those supporters took my word & I took that confidence & their generosity, multiplied it with prayer, blood & good ol' fashioned sweat! 
I'm here today showcasing what was once a burning vision in my mind that I could barely contain. It's real now because people believed in me when I had nothing but my word to give them. Today, I have my word, my track record of doing what exactly I said I would do, these cool STUMPS & droves of people who now have their own stories & experiences with the STUMPS. People who use the prototypes regularly with me, & have already written checks to Pre-Order their own sets! Imagine what I'll do this time around. 
STUMPIN'™ is a lit fuse & your help will keep it burning. You can Pre-Order your STUMPS™ in any of the following 3 ways:



FULL SET - 4 Platforms, each consisting of 3 sub-sections, 12 Platforms total; A, B & C times 4. This allows you to take full advantage of the total STUMPIN' experience from Beginner to the most Elite Competitive Athlete

THE A & B SET - 4 Platforms, each consisting of 2 sub-sections/top & middle, 8 Platforms total; A & B times 4. The absence of the C-STUMPS™ (the largest bottom sub-section) in this option will limit the elevation choices of a FULL SET, but you'll be more than capable of experiencing a multitude of applications going this route.

THE As - These 4 Individual Platforms are the apex of the STUMPS™. From a balance challenge & development standpoint, no part of the STUMP™ are more demanding than THE As. Within the STUMPIN' PROTOCOLS (education, programming & certification), which will be discussed in future video posts & updated content here on the campaign, THE As are the sub-sections of choice for applications under the banner of 'STUMPIN' TO GO'. The compact size of THE As makes them portable enough to take on the road, so that you'll never have to go without your daily dose of movement meditation & keeping your balance & mental focus sharp. They're deceptively versatile enough to ensure that you'll get a full workout from the bottom to the top wherever you may go! THE As will keep you honest in your training. Don't let their size fool you.

Additionally, you can support this campaign by purchasing Tank Tops, T-Shirts & Hoodies (all available in Black with White print) which will boldly bear the STUMPIN'™ logo & let everyone know how you roll!
Lastly, your support on Social Media & person to person word of mouth (you know how folks used to communicate) will help more than you realize! Repost & share our posts. And definitely TAG your peeps! They'll appreciate you giving them the heads up about a new movement in Sports & Fitness Training that's coming FAST!!! 
Follow @KappelLeRoyClarke & @GetStumpin on Instagram & Twitter, & Facebook/KappelLeRoyClarke & Facebook/Stumpin. Check back here periodically for updates & surprise specials. Let's #GetStumpin Worldwide!
Thank you in advance for your support...

story:
日本語

Follow-up campaign

We are grateful for all the backers in our original campaign. The following figure shows how the money raised will be spent.

The world first digital therapy platform
for seizure control

We are raising funds to develop the therapy platform


Previously reported on (click logo to read):

Sponsored by:

Impact of therapy transformation
by digital technology

What is ACRT?

ACRT is a behavioural therapy for developing control of seizures. Through interactive online sessions, a participant will develop a specific set of skills to prevent and stop seizures. Once a participant obtain these skills, the effect can last for many years. ACRT is a non-invasive, side-effect free, effective and affordable therapy.

ACRT consists of 12 sessions, each session lasting about 45 minutes. To achieve the best effect, we recommend allocating three sessions a week (e.g. Monday, Wednesday and Friday) over a 4-week period.

During each session, you will also receive instructions and practice the technique, which you will then be able to start applying in your daily life.


How does ACRT work?

The therapy embodies both physiological and psychological approaches. Our thoughts and emotions are closely linked to our bodily responses and behaviour. Events in our daily lives trigger thoughts that in turn give rise to emotions that change both our bodily stress responses and our behaviour.


Psychological treatments, such as Cognitive Behavioural Therapy (CBT), argue that psychological distress is caused by distorted thoughts (or thinking habit) that trigger negative emotions and unhelpful behaviours. CBT helps you identify these distorted thoughts and correct them so that you can have more realistic and balanced way of thinking.

ACRT extends this CBT model by also taking a more holistic account of the role of the body in the expression of emotional feelings and thoughts, and by working directly on physiological aspects of well-being.

Published research shows that more than 80% of people with epilepsy consider stress and anxiety to be a major factor in causing seizures. It is therefore very important to understand the mechanisms of how the mind, brain and body interact. Drug treatments on their own cannot give this understanding

Using ACRT, you will see how your body responds to your thinking and emotion. By receiving visual feedback about how your body reacts, you will be able to train yourself to become more sensitive to your bodily reactions and control your body’s state of alertness. Through this process, you will also learn how to stabilize your emotion.

Who will benefit?

People with epilepsy who experience brief auras are particularly good candidates for this type of therapy. However this is by no means a requirement for a successful outcome. There are people without any aura who reduce seizures by more than two thirds or more of seizures after a month of therapy. A modified set of instructions is given in the platform for those people who do not have an aura. People whose seizures occur predominantly with stress, anxiety and low mood are also good candidates. Unfortunately, clinical experience suggests that ACRT in its present form does not work as well for people who have a significant learning disability. 

Did you know?

- About one in hundred people suffer from epilepsy. 600,000 people in the UK and 50 million worldwide.
- Of these 30% are drug resistant. 180,000 people in the UK and 15 million people worldwide. 
- The cost of surgical treatment is $15,581 - $27,000 / patient (Heaney & Begley, 2002 Epilepsia). In the UK, there are about 1000 operations for epilepsy conducted every year.
- The annual cost of uncontrolled epilepsy is £3,508/ patient (Platt & Sperling, 2002 Epilepsia).
- About $ 13 billion worth of anti-epileptic drugs are prescribed every year in the world (Mackey, 2010 Nature).

Considering the above together, an effective, non-invasive, accessible and affordable behavioural therapy for epilepsy represents a worthwhile goal that will impact significantly on the lives of people who suffer from, or whose lives are otherwise affected by, epilepsy.

About Dr Yoko Nagai

Dr Yoko Nagai began her research in electrodermal biofeedback therapy for epilepsy in 1997. This research has since attracted scientific research funding of over £300,000 that has enabled clinical trials and a deeper understanding of the brain mechanisms by which the therapy can reduce the occurrence of epileptic seizures. Dr Nagai also founded the Biofeedback Clinic in 2005, in response to demand from patients at the National Hospital for Neurology and Neurosurgery, University College London.

At the clinic, she treated people with epilepsy on a private basis, enabling her to continue to pursue her university research activity. There are many advantages to face-to-face therapy, but only a few people can be treated at a time, and this can be frustrating for the majority of people who wish to access the therapy in this form. Dr Nagai is now seeking to share her expertise and treatment with people globally who are in need for this effective non-drug therapy, which is termed Autonomic Cognitive Rehabituation Training (ACRT).

Science

Dr Nagai's research started with investigations into how brain and peripheral body reactions are related each other. We think that when our brain gets excited, our body does too, but it is not always the case.

Dr Nagai measures and observes a body signal called electrodermal activity (EDA)/Galvanic Skin Response (GSR) which is very sensitive to our thoughts and emotions. You may know already that EDA is used in lie detector tests. Dr Nagai’s research has extensively investigated how changes in EDA also modulate different brain signals. To this end Dr Nagai has applied tools including electroencephalography (EEG) and functional MRI (fMRI). For people who would like to know more, the ACRT platform will have "a science box" to click, where you can get all the information in lay terms.

The results from the clinical trial.

(adapted from Nagai et al. Epilepsy and Behaviour 2004, Vol 5/2: 216-223.)

(adapted from Nagai et al. Psychosomatic Medicine 2009, 71: 84-92.)

These participants all had drug resistant epilepsy,
and had been on different types of medication for many years
(for some of them, over 20years).

The effect of the treatments over three years

(adapted from Nagai et al. Epilepsy Research 2014, 108: 149-52.)

(adapted from Nagai et al. Epilepsy Research 2014, 108: 149-52.)

Once a participant learns the skill of controlling seizures through the training sessions, the effect can last for many years.

The functional activity of distinct brain regions changes

(adapted from Nagai et al. Neuroimage 2004, 22:243-251.)

The functional activity of distinct brain regions changes over the course of the therapy. Our research shows that one month of ACRT training increases resilience of people to anxiety-related seizure attacks.

Dr Nagai is currently investigating further neural mechanisms through which ACRT helps seizure control. This project is funded by a UK major research charitable body, the Wellcome Trust.


Timeline

Why Crowd fund?

In the field of epilepsy research, most of scientific funding is directed at drug research and understanding genetic associations. Consequently, research into behavioural treatments attracts very little investment (although Dr Nagai is one of a very few lucky scientists able to maintain active research in this area funded by research grants). This fact also means that behavioural treatments do not get the same priority or attention at scientific conferences and where there are sessions on the topic, these are often poorly attended. This creates a vicious circle.

Without exposing this research to the medical community and to patients with epilepsy, this effective new therapy, which could benefit many people with epilepsy, may remain confined to scientific research. We very much feel that the time is right for us to disseminate Dr Nagai's expertise and make her treatment accessible for as many people as might need this new approach.

Crowd funding was chosen as the route to make this possible as it will facilitate bringing this therapy quickly to patients, through the investment of people directly interested in the success of this approach. Crowd-funding also presents the best opportunity to increase awareness and facilitate the implementation of this non-invasive behavioural therapy for epilepsy.

Link

story:
Step 1 : launch a brand new, swaggyswank look, and partner with Savage Apparel to help make it happen.

Step 2 : win Mid-Atlantic Regionals while looking as dope as the District gets.

Step 3 : use that partnership with Savage to get great-looking apparel at affordable prices, and team members' talents for other cool perks.

Step 4 : profit.

But not really. Because profits don't exist in this sport yet, and this club knows it as well as anyone. In one of the most expensive places in the US to live, our team is mostly comprised of young professionals who, in many ways, are sacrificing a solid income for the opportunity to help our community--whether through teaching, working with the disabled, or keeping our community healthy, our members are doing the best they can in a city that loves their support. And while the first non-profit-run team would love to use that NPO status to start launching campaigns like a kids' quidditch camp, a social sports league, and training seminars, the fact of the matter is that none of that can happen without capital and it's hard to gain capital for a sports organization without showing up to play at the big dance.

So check out what we have to offer, pick up some of our cool gear, indulge in one of our members' talents, do whatever you want, really, just know that you're helping us grow our organization and the sport while you're at it.


For more info on our team, be sure to visit us on Facebook (facebook.com/DCQuidditch) and check out our film on YouTube (https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCiPi1dyS_Ju6dk...).


*All material perks will be hand-delivered at USQ Cup 9 unless otherwise stated. All are available for shipping if you will not attend USQ Cup 9, though a small donation to our non-profit might be required to cover the cost of shipping. Email Steve Minnich at dcqc.president@gmail.com to work something out; use the header "give me my perks".

**Several of our perks have add-ons; follow directions in perk to access add-on.

***For more information on sponsorships and expanded sponsorship level offerings, email Steve Minnich at dcqc.president@gmail.com with the header "Indiegogo-- let me sponsor you".

*$*&*For the P.I.S.S. perk, view eligible team members here : https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1alDUsf_.... After purchasing the perk, fill out this form to redeem the rewards : http://goo.gl/forms/pC7B3nhyeh

$To make a tax-deductible donation directly to our 501(c)3 tax-exempt non-profit organization, visit our GoFundMe page (http://igg.me/at/miDtKyCf3M0) and/or email Steve Minnich at dcqc.president@gmail.com and use the header "Indiegogo-- let me donate".

story:
Reiki Community Health & Wellbeing is a fellowship of professionals committed to hands on healing for our communities. We provide this service at affordable cost in safe, compassionate environments.


See our announcement for a full description of our work and plans.

Our practitioners...

Have lots of experience, passion, dedication and professionalism. Click to see us on Facebook.

We have served patients of a busy doctor's office in Falmouth, Maine for the past 3 years, relieving pain and anxiety on the spot. We have recently expanded to serve people in recovery from addiction, as well as rescued animals at a local shelter.

We are especially hopeful for the addiction recovery work, as this has become a crisis in Maine and elsewhere, and programs that help are attracting broad community support.

A guest blog for Pamela Miles, world-famous Reiki Master, and a TV news story describe the clinic in the doctor's office.

We have defined our mission and values as a group, and agreed to move forward to build a cooperative ownership structure.

Our immediate need is to fund tuition to attend three workshops given by the Cooperative Design Lab over the next 9 months, the first one coming up fast on April 9 & 10.

These workshops are affordable and packed with details, given by professionals with track records in building cooperative ventures.

Ideally, we would send 2 people, for a total tuition of $1100, based on $550 per person for all three workshops.

This will position us to establish a strong business foundation for our cooperative, so that we can credibly and professionally bring the benefits of Reiki treatment to more who need it, and allow for future growth.

If we fall short of the full goal, we will either send one person or work with the workshop providers on a payment plan and fundraise again to support it, or use the InDemand feature to continue to receive donations after the 14-day period is over.

We intend to do other fundraising activities including future crowdfunding, as we further define our needs and budgets, within the framework of business planning informed by the workshops you are helping to fund here.

Benefit

Reiki practice can help those with chronic pain, anxiety or addiction issues be more calm, relaxed and balanced. When treatment is delivered professionally, accessibly and in a way that respects the boundaries of the community being served, and the cooperative is designed to support its members' ability to deliver that treatment, the cooperative can sustain and grow a strong resource for the community.


Many thanks and deep gratitude for your support. You are helping bring peace into the world, one Reiki treatment at a time!

story:
Running Canada

From mid-June to mid-July of this summer, I'm going to run 10 half marathons in 10 of Canada's largest cities, coast to coast. All in an effort to make a short, inspirational documentary about the journey, and to raise awareness about mental health issues - this campaign is in support of the Centre for Addiction and Mental Health (CAMH).

I'm someone who lives with severe anxiety and depression. In early 2015, I was in a pretty dark place. The anxiety and depression had been slowly building up to a breaking point. It felt like I was floating through my days and got to a point where I only looked forward to going to sleep at night. I was waking up in the middle of the night with panic attacks, felt completely lethargic during the days, and felt like I didn't have any purpose. Days were spent just going through the motions.

Somewhere amid a worried Google search, I read that one of the things that can help ease anxiety and depression is exercise. So I started moving. Going for walks at first. Then short jogs. Training throughout the summer and fall, I went from finding it difficult to get out of bed in the morning to being able to complete long runs with ease - using exercise as a form of medication and meditation.

Through this campaign, I'm going to share my story, the stories of others across the country, and defeat a challenge that this time last year I would have never imagined possible.

Mental health is something we are all affected by - 1 in 5 Canadians will suffer from some form of mental illness in their lives. This campaign is all about recognizing that and building a strong community that is able to face difficult challenges. Together, we are all stronger. Change starts with a discussion, and that's what making this film and going on this journey is all about.

We want you to be a part of that change.

What We Need From You

In order to document this journey and make the film, we're going to need your help.

  • We need to raise $8,500
  • The large part of everything we raise will go toward campaign expenses (cinematographer, equipment, travel, accommodations, car rental, gas, food, and running supplies)
  • We'll also be donating a portion of what we raise here to CAMH
  • We have a load of perks available for contributors - take a look on the right!

The Challenge

This campaign is all about taking on a big challenge and defeating it. I will be running a total of 211 kilometres. That's more than the distance between Ottawa and Montréal. It's just a little less than the distance between Vancouver and Seattle. And traveling between 10 different cities across the entire country, coast to coast, is just going to add to the difficulty.

It's going to be hard.

Apart from the physical demands, in order to make it happen, we to need to cover the cost of flights, gas, food, some video & audio equipment, and training supplies.

That's why we need your help to make this campaign come to life.

The Impact

This campaign is all about taking things that can be devastating to someone's life (depression, anxiety, stress... to name a few) and turn them into something inspirational. For this campaign, we have a few main goals:

  • Spread awareness about depression and anxiety
  • Inspire others to use exercise as a way to live with mental health issues
  • Raise money for the Centre for Addiction and Mental Health (CAMH), the leading research and treatment facility for this field
  • Make an inspirational film documenting the journey and telling stories of living with anxiety and depression

Who's Involved & Our Partners

We've been putting together a great team for this campaign. In addition to our Director, Paige Foskett, Cinematographer, Dakota Wotton, and Media Relations Coordinator, Brittany Farquhar, we have some other great partners:


  • We're looking to add a few more partners; if you're interested, please reach out to runningcanada2016@gmail.com

Run With Me

If you're interested in running with me in one of the cities, please do not hesitate to reach out! While we understand not everyone may be able to complete a half marathon just yet, we're encouraging people to run at least the last 5km for each stop on the journey.
The crew and I will be in the following cities:


Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't afford to toss some cash on the pile to make this happen, there are other ways you can help!

  • Share this campaign link on your Facebook, Twitter, or Instagram profiles (share tools are directly below this)
  • Talk about the campaign with your friends
  • You can also follow the journey at http://runtowellness.com
Thank you for your support!
story_txt:
Running Canada From mid-June to mid-July of this summer, I'm going to run 10 half marathons in 10 of Canada's largest cities, coast to coast. All in an effort to make a short, inspirational documentary about the journey, and to raise awareness about mental health issues - this campaign is in support of the Centre for Addiction and Mental Health (CAMH).
I'm someone who lives with severe anxiety and depression. In early 2015, I was in a pretty dark place. The anxiety and depression had been slowly building up to a breaking point. It felt like I was floating through my days and got to a point where I only looked forward to going to sleep at night. I was waking up in the middle of the night with panic attacks, felt completely lethargic during the days, and felt like I didn't have any purpose. Days were spent just going through the motions.
Somewhere amid a worried Google search, I read that one of the things that can help ease anxiety and depression is exercise. So I started moving. Going for walks at first. Then short jogs. Training throughout the summer and fall, I went from finding it difficult to get out of bed in the morning to being able to complete long runs with ease - using exercise as a form of medication and meditation.
Through this campaign, I'm going to share my story, the stories of others across the country, and defeat a challenge that this time last year I would have never imagined possible.
Mental health is something we are all affected by - 1 in 5 Canadians will suffer from some form of mental illness in their lives. This campaign is all about recognizing that and building a strong community that is able to face difficult challenges. Together, we are all stronger. Change starts with a discussion, and that's what making this film and going on this journey is all about.
We want you to be a part of that change.   What We Need From You In order to document this journey and make the film, we're going to need your help.  We need to raise $8,500

The large part of everything we raise will go toward campaign expenses (cinematographer, equipment, travel, accommodations, car rental, gas, food, and running supplies)
We'll also be donating a portion of what we raise here to CAMH We have a load of perks available for contributors - take a look on the right!


    The Challenge  This campaign is all about taking on a big challenge and defeating it. I will be running a total of 211 kilometres. That's more than the distance between Ottawa and Montréal. It's just a little less than the distance between Vancouver and Seattle. And traveling between 10 different cities across the entire country, coast to coast, is just going to add to the difficulty.
It's going to be hard.
Apart from the physical demands, in order to make it happen, we to need to cover the cost of flights, gas, food, some video & audio equipment, and training supplies.
That's why we need your help to make this campaign come to life.

Spread awareness about depression and anxiety
Inspire others to use exercise as a way to live with mental health issues
Raise money for the Centre for Addiction and Mental Health (CAMH), the leading research and treatment facility for this field
Make an inspirational film documenting the journey and telling stories of living with anxiety and depression


Who's Involved & Our Partners
We've been putting together a great team for this campaign. In addition to our Director, Paige Foskett, Cinematographer, Dakota Wotton, and Media Relations Coordinator, Brittany Farquhar, we have some other great partners:








We're looking to add a few more partners; if you're interested, please reach out to runningcanada2016@gmail.com





Run With MeIf you're interested in running with me in one of the cities, please do not hesitate to reach out! While we understand not everyone may be able to complete a half marathon just yet, we're encouraging people to run at least the last 5km for each stop on the journey.
The crew and I will be in the following cities:





Other Ways You Can Help

 If you can't afford to toss some cash on the pile to make this happen, there are other ways you can help!  Share this campaign link on your Facebook, Twitter, or Instagram profiles (share tools are directly below this)
Talk about the campaign with your friends
You can also follow the journey at http://runtowellness.com
 
Thank you for your support!

story:
My name is Adam Ryan. I am 41 years old, suffer from a condition called optic neuritis, and have peripheral neuropathy in my hands and feet. Although I have less than 5% of my visual field left, my passion is hiking. Last year, to the surprise of my doctors, family, and friends, I successfully completed 1218 miles of the Appalachian trail. I hiked from Georgia to Hamburg, Pennsylvania. It was one of the most challenging and rewarding things I've ever done. This year, I plan to hike the remainder of the trail. I'll be hiking from Hamburg, PA to Mt. Katahdin in Maine, over 900 miles. It's my goal to raise $2 per mile for The Optic Neuritis Foundation.

The Optic Neuritis Foundation, Inc. is determined to increase symptom recognition, augment public awareness, raise funds to support research and provide financial assistance to individuals receiving the diagnosis. 

The Optic Nerve is vital in our vision because it carries the images from your eyes to your brain.  Optic Neuritis is an inflammation of the optic nerve. The main cause of Optic Neuritis hasn’t been determined but some causes are listed below:

  • A viral infection, including viral encephalitis, measles, rubella, chickenpox, herpes zoster, mumps, and mononucleosis
  • An autoimmune condition including lupus, sarcoidosis, Neuromyelitis Optica and Behcet’s diease
  • Cryptococcus, a fungal infection
  • Respiratory infections, including Mycoplasma pneumonia and common upper respiratory tract infections
  • When the immune system mistakenly targets the substance (myelin) covering your optic nerve, resulting in inflammation and damage to the myelin.
  • Multiple Sclerosis
Having Optic Neuritis can make hiking difficult. Not only are you dealing with the elevation changes, weather, and mental challenge....but sometimes you're doing it with little to no sight. I'll never forget being 6000 feet up in the Smokies when an Ocular Migraine hit me. My vision closed in and I lost all of the sight in one eye. The timing could not have been worse because it had just started hailing. I stood on the side of the trail while hikers passed me and got pelted with hail for 25 minutes until my vision returned. That was one of those days where I questioned what I was doing out there. Needless to say I pushed on. 
Please consider contributing to this fundraiser. Knowing that I am raising money for this cause is going to help me push through the toughest of days and your contribution is going to help spread the word about this condition that very few people know about. 
After contributing, Please feel free to follow my progress on the social media links posted below.
P.S. I'd like to thank some of the companies that have been generous enough to help me out with products for my hike. Without these companies, this fundraiser wouldn't be possible. 
Thank you Altra Running, Big Tree Farms, Simple Squares, Vitchelo, Dr. Bronners, Raw Revolution, Four Sigmatic, and the countless companies that requested to remain anonymous.  This fund raiser is possible because of your generosity.

story:
Our noble leader, Joachim “Abby” Franke, learned all about the importance of eating healthy as an athlete on the German Olympic Team, and those lessons changed his life.

 

After overcoming a horrific family tragedy, he fulfilled his dream of becoming a Master Baker and coming to America to share his unique, healthy, and European-Style gourmet cookies and artisan breads with everyone! ‘Healthy’ and ‘Delicious’ are words that should go together!

 

From the Women’s Shelter and Children’s Hospital to the Veterans groups we donate baked goods to; to local families looking for healthy fare; to Hollywood celebrities who crave our unique recipes; Abby and the whole Abby’s Millstone team believes in building bridges within our community and  to making the world a healthier, kinder place.

 

With your help, we can afford to buy a new oven, complete the daunting mountains of regulatory paperwork standing in our way, and deliver our mouthwatering Coconut Macaroons and Florentine Lace cookies, our heavenly Challah and incomparable Old Country Sourdough, and our unbelievable Banana and energy-popping Power-seed Paleo breads to a neighborhood store near you!

 

But, we can’t do it without you! Please help us take on the Big Boys and give you and your discerning, health-conscious family the tasty and healthy alternatives you deserve!

story:
Preface

I am Dr.Jihad Mahmoud Hasanain from Rafah . 
I am  working  at European Gaza  Hospital , Khan Younis  " on the South of Gaza city 
In addition to “ Tal-Alsultan UNRWA Primary health care center “ Rafah 
I lived the three wars on Gaza within 2008,2012,2014 
and  I started my voluntary work during last war (2014) , it was started to support children in their shelters and to reach the out-of access children where they live in poor and unhealthy no sanitized conditions
I did a successful Project last year which was " The Multi-Mini Clinics In Gaza"
witch provide Free Medical Services to more than 2 thousand poor people in Far Areas 
and this Project Still providing it's Services till now and will be forever 

 

with simple words :

1.  I Finished the First Aid Training Program in Far and poor Areas of southern Gaza, mainly in Rafah Refugees Camps “ Al Shapoora , Al Shouka   and Khusa'a  camps  , to provide the Simple roles and steps to save lives in case of any expected or un expected  wars ,,
that includes
multiple lectures of  " Theoretical and practical " techniques  that used
 world wide in case of trauma
theses lectures prepared in simple way to reach all people in different IQ levels to be easy for every one to understand it and do it without any hesitation or worry
theses lectures done in deferent places " actually it done in people's homes
we collect people and make them in groups
then the lectures done   
 in addition to education and awareness of our right to live
and our right if this Land " Palestine "

Why it is needed ?

1- Three Gaza wars (Dec2008, Nov2012, Jul2014) Brought Gaza life to hell, buildings down, no infrastructure, no clean water, no enough medical and health services

2- According to PCHR Statistics about the 50-day war 2014, 2191 Palestinians were killed and more than 527 of them were children, about 3306 children were wounded and had temporary or permanent disabilities.

Because of theses Studies and Biostatistics it was necessary to know that
Many of those Martyrs and injured Palestinians were had a chance to be a live  and between their families
many of Martyrs had a fatal injuries before their death
but because the deficiency and the lack of the " A.B.C " of First Aid
services they bled till death !
so we it was necessary for us to create this Program for Ordinary peoples
in Hot Areas to teach them how to deal with different Types of Injuries
until the Ambulance came and transport them to Hospital for full medical services

This Project have tow steps

the First One was done  which it
teach people the The First Aid Mechanisms and Roles
and this step has been done
second Step which is
distributing A First Aid Bag to those people and for this propose I Launched
this Campaign

Cost of this Project will be as follow :

Medical Bags of First Aid tools

Every Bag will contain

1- Gauze
2- Crepe Bandages
3-Needles and Syringes
4-O2 Mask
5- Blasters
6-Torniquret
7- Sutures and Needle Holders
8- scissors and knifes " Medical ones "
9- gloves " Disposable and sterile
10 –Canulas or Branulas
11- two types of Fluids
12 –neck Collar

every bag will cost about 90 $

we need to distribute more than 60 bags
to cover most of hot areas of Fire

so 90 * 60 = 5500 U.S.D

this Project Will save more than 100 Palestinian souls

please Donate and support us

if you consider any assistance or ask for more details please refer to my accounts on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/jihad.hasanain.3 or you can send me message via
 e-mail : dr.jihad90@gmail.com

You can help me by Donating to this online fundraising campaign and share the link widely with your friends, family and everyone who can contribute.

story:
Imagine a program that provides athletes with knowledge that I've gained over the years of my career that they can use as a vehicle to accomplish their goals in life. The program will help athletes build strong character and realize their full potential as a responsible citizens and role models of the world.  

3T needs help to provide our student athletes who excel off and on the court with funding (ex. $500 scholarship towards books), official website ,training equipment, resources (such as motivational speakers,  nutritionist ), gym rentals and 3T apparel for our athletes and the community to purchase. 

ABOUT ME:

My name is Tayron Thomas born and raised from Bristol, Pa . I had one dream of playing professional basketball to travel the world. With hard work and dedication I was able to focus on earning a full scholarship to Philadelphia University. After four years I was able to leave the school with a degree in business management. I had a great career in basketball at my university which I was blessed to play in 9 different countries over ten years. Now with me wanting to spend more time with my four year old I decided to pursue my next passion which is training athletes to be successful in life.

PRODUCT/SERVICE

3T obviously will first provide skill development in 1 on 1 personal training up to entire team sessions to all ages but mainly for student athletes who have at least 2.0 or higher GPA which is required to participate in any 3T activities. In a focus of business growth and longevity we promote train the trainees sessions where individuals can use what they have learned to position themselves as a trainer in their own community as well support the growth of our brand through replication and franchising

MARKET

The Delaware Valley is an ideal market place for 3T . We will have relationships with schools, fitness gyms as well coaches to ensure a consistent flow of clientele. There are major urban markets in each directions all with in reasonable distance. Can be functional in a different city every day in Philadelphia, Newark, Trenton, Baltimore, and New York. Access to urban cities is significant because there is a slight increase in participation for organized sports in urban areas as children get older and specific to basketball the interest is greater in these areas.

story:
Moving Forward Together:

Our goal is to raise $50,000 CAD to help connect the technical 'back end' of our app to the snazzy, user-friendly 'front end' that will enable a fun, fluid experience every time you sign in.  

Your financial support will be instrumental in the continued development of our app. Here's a breakdown of what is achievable with your help, and exactly how we'll use your contributions to scale up our progress:

$5,000 - Complete Limited Version of App in time for January 17th

$7,500 - Pre-Launch Digital Marketing Consulting

$10,000 - App and Web Graphic Design Fine Tune in time for January 17th

$15,000 - Include Customized V1 Audio experience for January 17th

$25,000 - Optimize current website with integrated video

$50,000 - Complete Video and Audio Input into App

$75,000 - National add campaign budget for January 17th Launch

$100,000 - Complete post launch advertising campaign budget

 

Our rewards are as diverse and dynamic as our investors. They include:

·         High fives

·         Tickets to our launch party in Vancouver

·         The opportunity to become a testing subject

·         The opportunity to be a model in future MOVR photoshoots

·         Lifetime MOVR membership

·         The MOVR Movement Package

·         In-person personal training

·         “Face of the Brand” – an all-access pass to meeting the MOVR development team and share your insights on building the most usable movement app in the world

If our funding goal isn't realized, we will re-organize our launch strategy and keep on pushin'.  We not only want you to have MOVR in your pocket – we want you to love using it every day!

 

What is MOVR?

MOVR's philosophy is about taking a systematic, personalized approach to exercise so that each individual can experience meaningful success at every level. We customize every workout based on the user’s input and feedback, ensuring that every single sweat meets their needs and supports their movement goals in life and at play.

People want to feel good in their own bodies and need the accountability and the mentorship of someone (or something) that knows how to get them there. But we’re all busy, gyms can be intimidating and personal trainers are expensive. With the creation of MOVR, we want to offer free technology that adapts to each user and enables anybody with access to a phone or computer the ability to move, as they are, at any given moment. When it comes to physical fitness, our goal is not to reinvent the wheel; but to teach people how to drive their own experience.

 

The Impact

By offering an app that is constantly adapting and delivering customized workouts based on user input and feedback, we will have the ability to identify exciting new trends.  This app is built to help get people moving - regardless of age, sex, fitness level or personal circumstance. Our vision is to build a large dataset of health profiles so that we can apply machine learning techniques to tease out successful patterns and continue to inform the MOVR custom-generated workouts for each individual.

Combining this innovative concept with the individual expertise of each member of our team, we have the working parts to create something previously unseen in the app world. With MOVR, we’re using technology to bring personal fitness out of the dark ages and change the way the world views exercise.  

 

Risks & Challenges

We have surrounded ourselves with people who are experts in the fields of exercise science, app development, social media, branding, photography, and videography to ensure we do this right.

Your thoughtful input, feedback and financial contributions are the final piece of the puzzle. With your assistance, we know we can make this app a household name you'll be proud to tell your friends you helped get off the ground. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If contributing financially is out of your realm but this project seems interesting to you, we ask you share this with as many people as you can via email or on your social media accounts.  We want to make some noise and we need your help!

For more information and to learn more on becoming a MOVR check out our site at www.moveasyouare.com

 

We look forward to moving and grooving with you,

 

Aaron and the MOVR team

Our vision is to build a large dataset of health profiles so that we can apply machine learning techniques to tease out successful patterns and continue to inform the MOVR custom-generated workouts for each individual.
Combining this innovative concept with the individual expertise of each member of our team, we have the working parts to create something previously unseen in the app world. With MOVR, we’re using technology to bring personal fitness out of the dark ages and change the way the world views exercise.  
 
Risks & Challenges
We have surrounded ourselves with people who are experts in the fields of exercise science, app development, social media, branding, photography, and videography to ensure we do this right.
Your thoughtful input, feedback and financial contributions are the final piece of the puzzle. With your assistance, we know we can make this app a household name you'll be proud to tell your friends you helped get off the ground. 
 
Other Ways You Can Help
If contributing financially is out of your realm but this project seems interesting to you, we ask you share this with as many people as you can via email or on your social media accounts.  We want to make some noise and we need your help!
For more information and to learn more on becoming a MOVR check out our site at www.moveasyouare.com
 
We look forward to moving and grooving with you,
 
Aaron and the MOVR team

story:
www.aqualone.net



  1er prize-Innovation-Los Angeles Irrigation Show 2015

  1er prize-Geneva Innovation Show




What is Aqualone ?

Aqualone is a totally autonomous watering control system, it works without any energy.

One ‘’home version’’ Aqualone controller is able to manage for example up to 250 X4 ltrs/hr drippers, or 20 X 50 ltrs/hr micro sprinklers, and Aqualone ‘’pro’’ is able to control any size of hydraulic valve!

Knowing that about 80% of fresh water available on earth is used for to crops, the widespread use of this system could contribute to solving the shortages facing our planet.

The price of Aqualone is incredibly competitive for a system that performs very complex functions naturally.


In a nutshell !

With Aqualone everything is done automatically and naturally
taking into account the water level in the reservoir.
 Watering starts when the level is low and stops when the level is high.
 On hot days, the irrigation system will water, on cooler days Aqualone will reduce the watering without you needing to take any action.
 Everything happens on its own!



There are multiple advantages : 

UP TO 50% WATER SAVING**
*See details on the website:  www.aqualone.net

A PERFECT IRRIGATION CONTROL SYSTEM
Starts the irrigation depending on the plants’ needs.

PLUG AND PLAY SYSTEM
Installation is simple and quick. 

LOW COST
The price of Aqualone is incredibly competitive
for a system that performs very complex functions naturally.
Lasting SAVINGS on PURCHASE, INSTALLATION, 
MAINTENANCE and WATER CONSUMPTION.

NO ENERGY, NO BATTERY
 Absence of batteries and electronic components
make Aqualone a sustainable product.

AUTONOMOUS ZONING SYSTEM
 Aqualone can definitely be installed in any remote place, it just needs pressurized water.



How does it work ?


Aqualone fills all these functions without any tuning or tedious programming.
Aqualone does not require any energy!  No battery, no wiring, no electronics, no migraine inducing users manuals.

Aqualone includes a magnetic bistable pilot valve able to activate any sort and size of hydraulic valves, using simple tubing/ a simple hose. 

The excess water drained from the reference pot is collected at the bottom of the holding chamber, forcing the magnetic float to rise and stop the watering cycle.

As the system’s water evaporation rate is the same as that of the concerned soil, a new irrigation cycle will only begin when the soil is in drying-out phase. 




GARDEN & CROPS



---------------------------------- STEP 1 – IRRIGATION ----------------------------------

Aqualone consists of a reference pot and a dripper.
The system stores the water of the irrigation (or the rain!)
in its holding chamber.
Once the water source is connected to Aqualone, the dripper starts to work. 
The water seeps into the soil, reproducing our soil’s demand for water.



------------------ STEP 2 – SATURATION / IRRIGATION STOP ------------------

As soon as the water needs are satisfied, a magnetic valve 
automatically stops the irrigation.
The water will then evaporate, more or less quickly depending on the weather conditions. 



------------------------- STEP 3 – A NEW CYCLE BEGINS -------------------------

As soon as the water level is low, the irrigation starts again.
It is a made to measure system.



WATCH VIDEO "HOW IT WORKS"


EASY TO INSTALL
For your garden & crops



TIMELINE



REWARDS

Delivery cost is all inclusive to your door step ! 


Aqualone needs to become more than a prototype reserved
for the lucky few, so that everyone can use it and find it in their cities
and garden centres everywhere in the world.
With you, thanks to you we can help protect the most
precious of all our ressources all over the world, water.
Join us, we're counting on you !




FAQ


How will the Indiegogo kitty be used?

- The amount collected will allow us to finance the industrial manufacturing of Aqualone, and to distribute this simple and effective way to save water around theworld!

When will I receive my order?

- The large scale production is scheduled for September, so you'll be the first to enjoy Aqualone in November.

Who are we?

- The Aqualone team consists of four enthusiasts:
Bernard is a fluid engineer and the inventor of Aqualone.
Bertrand and Franck work on business development and strategy.
Frédéric is in charge of legal matters and patents.


Questions / Answers about Aqualone “home”

What is Aqualone?

- Aqualone is an irrigation controller. It is installed exactly like an electronic programmer and autonomously handles the watering cycles.

How to install with its starter kit?

- Once Aqualone is in place, connect the garden hose into the controller output, and install irrigation equipment (drippers, sprinklers, etc.) near your plants.

How many plants can Aqualone water?

- Aqualone integrated valve allows a flow of 1000 liters/hour. So for instance you may install four 250 liters/hour drippers, or twenty 50 liters/hour micro sprinklers, or 2 garden sprinklers for your lawn. 

What is the use of the reference pot placed on Aqualone?

- The terracotta pot gives useful information to Aqualone for a perfect watering: temperature, wind, sun, rain ...

How to choose the planter?

- The pot is a very common item: it is in clay, with a top diameter between 14 and 18 cm to fit into its location on the Aqualone controller.

Does Aqualone work without a pot?

- The ceramic pot is the heart of the system. Without it Aqualone will not be connected to the current climate.

How long does a watering cycle last?

- The integrated dripper supplied with Aqualone has a flow rate of 2 liters/hour. The run time is approximately 10 minutes.

Is it possible to change the watering duration?

- It is possible to replace the integrated dripper with an adjustable flow dripper! So you can change the cycle duration according to your own needs. For example, if the dripper is closed, the cycle will be permanent (until the rain stops it!). If the dripper is widely open, the duration of watering may be reduced to under a minute.

What about maintenance?

- Approximately twice a year, it is necessary to remove the cover and the float and rinse the system with pressurized water. The filter in the water inlet connection of the system must also be removed and cleaned.

How to install Aqualone in a vegetable garden, an orchard?

- Aqualone is installed horizontally, close to the crops and in the same climatic conditions (rain, sun) 


Questions / Answers about aqualone "pro"

How to install Aqualone on an existing network using a timer and a solenoid valve?

- Replace the solenoid valve by our hydraulic control valve (remove all electrical wiring!) and connect the Aqualone hydraulic valve using the 6mm pilot tubing supplied.

How can Aqualone handle zoning?

- Hydraulic valves are equipped with an autonomous zoning module which prohibits all other sectors when a sector is being watered.

How many Aqualone controllers should I buy for 5 sectors?

- It is necessary to install as many controllers and valves as zones. So every Aqualone controller will be able to adjust watering depending on the specific need of each plantation.

What is the maximum distance allowed between two zones?

- The valves installed on a shared water network may be distant from each other by several kilometers! Zoning modules are linked and communicate. They identify the pressure drop caused by a running zone.

In a public place, can we prevent watering during the day?

- It is necessary in this case to install a Master Valve upstream. This valve is controlled by a clock managing watering time slots.

In a sports field or a public lawn, how can we hide Aqualone?

- In its professional version, Aqualone can be supplied with a stainless steel case to store the controller into a garden box, covered with a layer of grass. A detailed explanation is available on our website.



www.aqualone.net

story:
We would like to help others that suffer from pain and discomfort realize relief with Thera-Cush as we have.  We need your help to be able to offer this pain relief to others. 


We have built a basic website for now (www.theracush.com) for ordering and to give our potential customers the knowledge of the benefits of hot/cold therapy an how our unique design holds the therapy pack in place. We would like to create social media ads to advertise our business and test the market for interest. We have created several different patterns to appeal to different types of potential clients.  Whether they would want to use it in the comfort of their own home, office, car/truck, hunters in their tree stands / blinds, parents attending their children's team sport's events, fans at their favorite sporting events, and the list is endless. We have customization options available as embroidery on the pocket that holds the thera-pack in place.  There is an additional fee for the embroidery, but it gives the thera-cush a personal touch to those who would perhaps like the military branch they served in on their cushion, their favorite sport's team, monograms, etc. We would also like to create some outdoor options for boats and kayaks.


We feel that this product is needed by people with injuries to help alleviate their pain and give them comfort while they recover from an injury and/or to cope with on going back pain and discomfort.  Thera-Cush allows hot/cold therapy packs to directly alleviate pain and discomfort, without getting displaced on the floor or in your chair. This helps increase the individuals productivity as well.  Our website at www.theracush.com gives customers an entire page of how hot/cold therapy is benefecial for healing.

story:
CoRE (Community Recovery Evolution) is a fitness program designed for special populations, including children and adolescents hospitalized and/or receiving treatment for mental illness. We are currently blessed with the opportunity to reach out to individuals who need our help and might otherwise never be able to participate in a program that helps them to improve their physical and mental health and we want to reach more patients and others at risk but we need more equipment and a place to offer our services!

Please post, re-post, tweet, e-mail, call or just talk about our campaign and please contribute if you can!!!

As with any project involving people there is always the risk of failure but we are firm believers that failure is just a set-up for success. We have individually and as a group, faced serious challenges and set-backs in our personal and professional lives, however they have only been that, set-backs. CoRE will succeed! It means too much to too many people, so while we may face the challenges and may have a slower than predicted start, we will definitely succeed in reaching more people and offering more strength,both physical and mental to those we help!

We have individually and as a group, faced serious challenges and set-backs in our personal and professional lives, however they have only been that, set-backs. CoRE will succeed! It means too much to too many people, so while we may face the challenges and may have a slower than predicted start, we will definitely succeed in reaching more people and offering more strength,both physical and mental to those we help!

story:
My mother Rosemary currently in transitional care at the nursing home and we are trying to raise money for equipment and home health care so she can come back home where she belongs. She currently needs 24 hour care and really wants to come home but we just can't afford it. Medicare will only pay for someone to help for about 4 hours a week...

Mom has been diagnosed with stage 3 lung cancer, it has moved to the lymph nodes and the current course of treatment is radiation and chemo. They also found a separate cancerous tumor in her kidney. The fact that it's a different type than the lung cancer is actually good news because it's slow growing and can be removed if the lung treatments go well.


Mom's actually been ill for quite some time, before the cancer she was diagnosed with COPD and emphysema. This allowed her to get disability through her work for quite some time but Mom just turned 65 so she no longer receives her benefits such as, health insurance, life insurance, and monthly disability insurance payments which helped her get through from month to month.

Now she has had 5 stays in the hospital for a total of over 30 days just in the last 2 1/2 months. Not to mention the ambulance rides and all the tests, she is drowning in debt.

story:
The funds will be used for campaigning and the production of campaign videos (and informational mini documentary-style videos depending on campaign success) against this bad deal in hopes the American people can be more informed about what Israeli Prime Minister  Benjamin Netanyahu calls a "mistake of historic proportions."

Polls show most Americans are apposed to this bad deal. Let's keep in mind Iran is run by radicals, not your typical democratic country. We should never settle when negotiating with terrorists.

Iran is known for being the leading sponsor of terror. We should never play poker with those that "lie and cheat."

The choice shouldn't be "Accept a bad deal OR Iran goes nuclear".

 The choice should be between fighting for a better deal with heavier sanctions OR enforcing the promises made by crossing a red line.

Help fund a better deal that guarantee's the safety of America and her Allies.

Here is what VIP's had to say about this deal...

US Ambassador John Bolten goes on to describe this deal as "the worst appeasement since Hitler"

This deal will "legitimize this terrorist regime which has been the largest financer of terrorism for the past 35 years."

"A deal that's supposed to stop a middle east arms race will actually trigger a middle east arms race"

"Iran can keep the deal, or cheat on the deal.. either way, the deal gives Iran a path to a nuclear bomb. A difficult path to one or two bombs today, and a easier path to hundreds of bombs tomorrow"

"it's our common future. we have to protect ourselves against the number one terror organization"

"when Arabs and Israeli's overwhelmingly agree, I think it's time to pay attention" Benjamin Netanyahu.

Those who are willing to accept a nuclear Iran should  also be willing to accept the next nuclear 9/11.

Photo by Nicolas Raymond from www.freestock.ca. Licensor is not affiliated with this campaign. Creative commons license can be found here https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/2.0/leg...
