story:
Summary
 
Humming saved my life and I want to share it with the world 
During low times where I experienced depression and homelessness I found refuge in the soothing sounds of humming. I connected with myself through sounds. Four years later I used humming to connect with my body following a diagnosis of prostate cancer. No one knew it that I established a relationship with the robot machine producing a high pitch sound during radiotherapy. 
 
Polyphonic Humming is my invention and requires a sense of presence, aural training, intention and a skill that can be taught using technology, hence this campaign. By doing so we can develop a sense of ourselves and the others by creating a new space in between. This technique is different from a talking therapy as it tackles on a primal sense of communication and the ability to hum which is inherent in any human being in this planet. 
 
 

Sound is vibration and energy. I am  composer, music teacher for autism and pianist also known as the Humming Man. I am passionate about how the power of a simple communal harmonic humming technique I created over the years to help many people to beat isolation, to empower themselves  and deal with mental health and emotional problems in a supportive environment. 

Mind and Body connection We are the results of our thoughts. I am passionate about the connection between mind and body for recovery and wellness. My approach is social and creative looking at preventive mental health by exploring creativity, empathy and resilience as part of the healing process especially when dealing with emotional wellbeing associated with long term conditions such as cancer or other chronic conditions as well as mild mental health problems such as stress, anxiety, depression related to modern lifestyle. 

I am passionate about music and wellbeing, social prescription and non pharmaceutical approach to illness is the future. Communal music helps to bond people together especially when we are active creators and active listeners.  We need systems to support  and care for each other, to shift from the victim state to activism mindset, as we are social and creative beings with ups and downs.   

An app alone is not the solution Humming mindfulness  is a hybrid model. It relies on face to face social interactions and interconnection between people thanks to the power of vocal sounds, a primal resource available to every person in this world. This app will encourage people to connect in real life, face to face - ear to ear - building meaningful connections as an add on. 

Watch old pitch here 

https://youtu.be/qHqEDyKkjs0

Are you a Spanish speaker? No problem you can check this video with subtitles too 

https://youtu.be/InhPPi5wjPA

 

 

I can't make it without you!  For the last four years I have been working on the ground in all sorts of environments from offices, caves, under water, conferences, private homes and so on with people of all ages and backgrounds on a part-time basis receiving winning awards and recognition on innovation from Ealing Council in London, Southbank centre and most importantly, the encouragement received from participants in the mindful Humming in Harmony experiences is the best motivator to carry on as you can see on this testimonial video. 

 
Why a HUM app and why now?
It is time to move on to the next stage of development. The technique is simple and it cuts language and social barriers. In order to reach out a wider audience I need to develop a mindfulness training app and launch it to the market.
 
I am not doing it alone  I wouldn't start a crowdfunding campaign without a development company on board such as Hyper. Being part of an accelerator programme is a guarantee of success to enable the idea to be launched successfully to the marketplace by September 2019. 
 
The focus of this app is on aural vocal meditation with the use of the voice as an individual or as a communal experience. This app is for everyone but will be an add on for professionals working in healthcare, education, self development, music therapy, holistic therapies yoga and more.
 
HUM app content preview
  • Listening exercises (sounds and environment)
  • Breathing and sound techniques (vibration, intensity, resonance)
  • Body check up (monitoring your data)
  • Aural training exercises ( pitch, frequency, harmony)
  • Humming improvisation ( the creative you)
  • Empathy Practise (sound and emotion)
  • Community (connecting with other hummers)

App development process 

Problem 1  We are disempowered The system of care and health charities are undermining the inner power of the individual to choose to give and take as part of their healing process. As individuals we need to make  lifestyle changes, nutrition and learn other techniques and so on.

What we know There is a full body of research showing scientific evidence about the positive effect of mindfulness, meditation and  singing together helping the release of endorphins in the brain. With Humming we are connecting the dots and moving a bit further. 

Problem 2 Lack of empathy as a model of care The power of the mind is underrated. The current systems doesn't value peer to peer empathy and interdependence. What if the patient becomes the doctor? 

My personal experience I have personal experience of multiple distresses ( financial, emotional, self esteem, depression, homelessness problems) but thanks to humming practise  I was able to move forward in life. My natural instinct was to share it with others. I started my recovery process when I felt useful to others, It is as simple as that.  You can experience it as well

Cancer as an opportunity to grow Last October I was diagnosed with prostate cancer. However I was told I couldn't help others with my skills - and I mean as a volunteer - because  there are policies in place by cancer support charities which prevents a cancer patient to share skills with other patients as a volunteer. 

I wrote this blog with my story and shared it on LinkedIn as a result I received positive feedback including nurses with cancer diagnosis who wanted to change the system.

The solution

A sustainable business model with the user at the centre
The individuals and hummers community aren't passive patients but active contributors as performers within  a global community. Once the app is up and running and training completed for quality assurance you will enable to join in the community of 'hummers' to share and add diversity to the audio content available for all. Registered users will receive a reward in form of royalties for their group creations with other registered users. 
 
A shared value journey You become a co-creator of new music as well as a contributor of audio content to be used by other users. Under current copyright law, we need to work country by country over the next 10 years to make this happen as we grow . The content created by you or a in a group will generate revenue and a percentage of those equally shared royalties from revenue sales will be give to you as creator as well as being invested in our ongoing innovation and research projects to add more value providing ethical and transparent accountability open to all along the way. You will have access to where the money comes and go.   

 

Other ways you can help Part of my healing process involved drawing and I am now selling my art online to support my project as I am fully dedicated to develop this app. My full time job now is humming mindfulness to build a social enterprise so I am looking for alternative income streams as I do so which also includes...

Wellbeing interactive concerts I will be delivering wellbeing concert performances to engage audiences to hum and co-create music starting with 24 pieces of classical music repertoire. You can follow me on twitter @creativepiano and using the #OneBigHum and will be able to follow me and purchase music online. Our facebook page is www.facebook.com/humminginharmony

Sound archive This is an example of  HUM (home) an orchestral improvised piece using the humming sequence which will be available on the app. If you are curious about previous sound recordings, you can find them here or www.humminginharmony.com 

This is not just about the money Sharing content and links can help us to build up a community of supporters. Your financial contribution will enable us to finally design and develop the best app experience with your feedback from the stage of app development prior to launch to market.  Do not hesitate to contact me at any moment.

Finally an open call for those experiencing cancer at any stage of their lives. It would be great if you could join in as a big part of this app and community of care will be focused on people like you and me.

Thanks

Sergio
story_txt:
Summary Humming saved my life and I want to share it with the world During low times where I experienced depression and homelessness I found refuge in the soothing sounds of humming. I connected with myself through sounds. Four years later I used humming to connect with my body following a diagnosis of prostate cancer. No one knew it that I established a relationship with the robot machine producing a high pitch sound during radiotherapy.  
Polyphonic Humming is my invention and requires a sense of presence, aural training, intention and a skill that can be taught using technology, hence this campaign. By doing so we can develop a sense of ourselves and the others by creating a new space in between. This technique is different from a talking therapy as it tackles on a primal sense of communication and the ability to hum which is inherent in any human being in this planet.   Sound is vibration and energy. I am  composer, music teacher for autism and pianist also known as the Humming Man. I am passionate about how the power of a simple communal harmonic humming technique I created over the years to help many people to beat isolation, to empower themselves  and deal with mental health and emotional problems in a supportive environment. Mind and Body connection We are the results of our thoughts. I am passionate about the connection between mind and body for recovery and wellness. My approach is social and creative looking at preventive mental health by exploring creativity, empathy and resilience as part of the healing process especially when dealing with emotional wellbeing associated with long term conditions such as cancer or other chronic conditions as well as mild mental health problems such as stress, anxiety, depression related to modern lifestyle. I am passionate about music and wellbeing, social prescription and non pharmaceutical approach to illness is the future. Communal music helps to bond people together especially when we are active creators and active listeners.  We need systems to support  and care for each other, to shift from the victim state to activism mindset, as we are social and creative beings with ups and downs.   An app alone is not the solution Humming mindfulness  is a hybrid model. It relies on face to face social interactions and interconnection between people thanks to the power of vocal sounds, a primal resource available to every person in this world. This app will encourage people to connect in real life, face to face - ear to ear - building meaningful connections as an add on. Watch old pitch here https://youtu.be/qHqEDyKkjs0Are you a Spanish speaker? No problem you can check this video with subtitles too https://youtu.be/InhPPi5wjPA

 
 I can't make it without you!  For the last four years I have been working on the ground in all sorts of environments from offices, caves, under water, conferences, private homes and so on with people of all ages and backgrounds on a part-time basis receiving winning awards and recognition on innovation from Ealing Council in London, Southbank centre and most importantly, the encouragement received from participants in the mindful Humming in Harmony experiences is the best motivator to carry on as you can see on this testimonial video.  Why a HUM app and why now?It is time to move on to the next stage of development. The technique is simple and it cuts language and social barriers. In order to reach out a wider audience I need to develop a mindfulness training app and launch it to the market. 
I am not doing it alone  I wouldn't start a crowdfunding campaign without a development company on board such as Hyper. Being part of an accelerator programme is a guarantee of success to enable the idea to be launched successfully to the marketplace by September 2019.  The focus of this app is on aural vocal meditation with the use of the voice as an individual or as a communal experience. This app is for everyone but will be an add on for professionals working in healthcare, education, self development, music therapy, holistic therapies yoga and more. HUM app content preview
Listening exercises (sounds and environment)
Breathing and sound techniques (vibration, intensity, resonance)
Body check up (monitoring your data)
Aural training exercises ( pitch, frequency, harmony)
Humming improvisation ( the creative you)
Empathy Practise (sound and emotion)
Community (connecting with other hummers)
App development process 
Problem 1  We are disempowered The system of care and health charities are undermining the inner power of the individual to choose to give and take as part of their healing process. As individuals we need to make  lifestyle changes, nutrition and learn other techniques and so on.
What we know There is a full body of research showing scientific evidence about the positive effect of mindfulness, meditation and  singing together helping the release of endorphins in the brain. With Humming we are connecting the dots and moving a bit further. 
Problem 2 Lack of empathy as a model of care The power of the mind is underrated. The current systems doesn't value peer to peer empathy and interdependence. What if the patient becomes the doctor? 
My personal experience I have personal experience of multiple distresses ( financial, emotional, self esteem, depression, homelessness problems) but thanks to humming practise  I was able to move forward in life. My natural instinct was to share it with others. I started my recovery process when I felt useful to others, It is as simple as that.  You can experience it as well
Cancer as an opportunity to grow Last October I was diagnosed with prostate cancer. However I was told I couldn't help others with my skills - and I mean as a volunteer - because  there are policies in place by cancer support charities which prevents a cancer patient to share skills with other patients as a volunteer. 
I wrote this blog with my story and shared it on LinkedIn as a result I received positive feedback including nurses with cancer diagnosis who wanted to change the system.
The solution
A sustainable business model with the user at the centre
The individuals and hummers community aren't passive patients but active contributors as performers within  a global community. Once the app is up and running and training completed for quality assurance you will enable to join in the community of 'hummers' to share and add diversity to the audio content available for all. Registered users will receive a reward in form of royalties for their group creations with other registered users.  
A shared value journey You become a co-creator of new music as well as a contributor of audio content to be used by other users. Under current copyright law, we need to work country by country over the next 10 years to make this happen as we grow . The content created by you or a in a group will generate revenue and a percentage of those equally shared royalties from revenue sales will be give to you as creator as well as being invested in our ongoing innovation and research projects to add more value providing ethical and transparent accountability open to all along the way. You will have access to where the money comes and go.    Other ways you can help Part of my healing process involved drawing and I am now selling my art online to support my project as I am fully dedicated to develop this app. My full time job now is humming mindfulness to build a social enterprise so I am looking for alternative income streams as I do so which also includes...Wellbeing interactive concerts I will be delivering wellbeing concert performances to engage audiences to hum and co-create music starting with 24 pieces of classical music repertoire. You can follow me on twitter @creativepiano and using the #OneBigHum and will be able to follow me and purchase music online. Our facebook page is www.facebook.com/humminginharmonySound archive This is an example of  HUM (home) an orchestral improvised piece using the humming sequence which will be available on the app. If you are curious about previous sound recordings, you can find them here or www.humminginharmony.com This is not just about the money Sharing content and links can help us to build up a community of supporters. Your financial contribution will enable us to finally design and develop the best app experience with your feedback from the stage of app development prior to launch to market.  Do not hesitate to contact me at any moment.Finally an open call for those experiencing cancer at any stage of their lives. It would be great if you could join in as a big part of this app and community of care will be focused on people like you and me.ThanksSergio

story:
My name is Christopher Torres and I am the founder and owner of the soon to open N-FLUX Training center in Washington D.C..  I have taught Martial Arts and fitness in DC for nearly 15 years now.  My Practice includes Krav Maga, No-Gi Jiu Jitsu, Kickboxing, Boxing, Wrestling, MMA, Budokon, Parkour, Calisthenics and Yoga.  The training schedule at my new facility will reflect the eclectic nature of my training and the training I want for my students.  We strive to be a community of well rounded movers who seek to traverse our environment efficiently, access our bodies full mobility potential, move heavy objects without risk of injury and defend ourselves & loved ones from would be attackers if necessary.

We have nearly everything we need to get started.  I, however, want to do more.  There are a few odds and ends that would make our opening perfect like slightly better mats, more heavy bags, kettlebells, sandbags, yoga mats and parallettes.  I want our opening to be as close to perfect as it can be.  So, please help us raise these funds to gets us to our perfect opening so that we can provide the kind of training that you will want to come and experience first hand.   I thank you in advance for your help

story:
Many medical facilities around the world in poor communities lack the basic supplies needed to provide adequate medical care to their patients—and people are suffering as a result. These communities rely on international donations for medical equipment, some receiving 80% of what they need from these donations. 

That's where StethoHope comes in. With the introduction of our new Clara Cardiology stethoscope, we will continue to redistribute the proceeds from sales to provide medical providers worldwide with stethoscopes and other primary medical supplies. When a medical practitioner purchases a stethoscope we put one into the hands of a fellow practitioner who may not otherwise have access to one. We see this transaction not only as a gift of imperative equipment but of hope for medical care providers and their patients in the future.

When you contribute to this campaign you will become a member of this special caring community making a positive impact on the lives of medical providers and patients in need around the world.

This new model is inspired by Clara Barton, the nurse who is best known for founding the American Red Cross in the late 19th Century. We chose to honor Clara for the extensive humanitarian efforts she made in spite of the barriers she faced as a woman. Her accomplishments serve as a reminder that the opportunity to help others in need is always possible regardless of the obstacles.

The stethoscope is the mascot of the medical community, a timeless symbol that embodies the trust and hope that medical professionals aspire to create in their relationships with patients. We pride ourselves on the mission to provide premium stethoscopes with quality features at a value to medical professionals. Each model is precisely designed for patient comfort and exceptional high-frequency response—in addition, each stethoscope is inspired by a leader who embodies hope, leaving a positive impact on the world of healthcare.

Features:

  • High quality, dual-head stainless steel stethoscope.
  • PVC tubing provides enhanced acoustic response.
  • "FlexiSoft" silicone ear-tips for added comfort.
  • Non-Chill bell and diaphragm retaining rims for patient comfort.
  • Ultra-sensitive diaphragm for greater amplification and crisper high-frequency response.

Take a culinary exploration around the globe with this cookbook made up of home-made recipes. All the countries included have medical communities that StethoHope has supported with medical equipment over the years. 

Wear your lapel pin with pride knowing that because of your support, Stethohope is able to provide medical supplies to healthcare workers in need. Faith, hope, and trust the pillars of our mission. 

Inspired by Clara Barton, the nurse best known for founding the American Red Cross. We chose to honor Clara for the extensive humanitarian efforts she made and she reminds us that we can help others in need no matter the obstacles.

We crafted this high quality, dual-head stainless steel stethoscope to honor James McCune Smith who was the first African-American physician.

Join us in Kingston, Jamaica where the idea of StethoHope was born. Enjoy 3 days/2 nights with lodging included, breakfast and lunch every day, and an amazing experience volunteering with the Jamaica Cancer Society!

StethoHope is raising $15,000 to be able to provide twice as many critical basic supplies to medical communities in need by doubling our proceeds this coming year. Your support is pivotal in meeting this goal.

So far we've successfully donated over 300 stethoscopes and other supplies to medical providers in seven developing countries, including Jamaica, Cuba, Vietnam, Haiti, and Ghana. All in just eight months! If this is what we've accomplished with even the slightest support, imagine what's possible with even more financial resources.

We understand that not everyone can make a financial contribution to our campaign. There are other ways you can help us reach our goal! Use the Indiegogo share tools to post about us on your social media and create a buzz about the work we are doing!

Ken, a second-generation Jamaican-American, personally experienced the devastating effects of a lack of health care resources that is all too common in underserved communities. When his grandfather passed away in a hospital in Spanish Town, Jamaica, Ken felt the lack of hope that exists in these medical facilities in need. Many times basic supplies are reused because there just are not enough. One stethoscope may be shared among healthcare professionals on an entire floor. Ken was inspired to do something—and so StethoHope was born.

Regarding risks and challenges, it is possible that the factory manufacturing our new Clara Cardiology stethoscope could experience delays. We have worked with this factory before on two production runs and were very happy with their timeline. If this unforeseen issue happens, we will be sure to communicate any changes with you and provide updates every step of the way. We appreciate your support!

story:
VITALITY Campaign

Extreme sports demand extreme performance and VENDISI PERFORMANCE LLC exists to bring you just that. Every sports supplement or energy drink has one ingredient that's their claim to fame; with VITALITY you get them all, because extreme performance is about much more than just energy or just hydration. You wouldn't settle for 2nd place, so don't settle for 2nd when choosing your sports supplement. Choose the best, choose VITALITY. 

With your support we will bring VITALITY to market, a premium comprehensive training formula designed specifically for extreme sport athletes. In every serving of VITALITY you will find proven ingredients with effective dosages to support the demands of extreme sports. This is not a high end pre-workout for the gym - it's better, and the proof is on the label.

By supporting this campaign you will help bring VITALITY to market and be one of the very first to receive a bottle at 20-40% off. Funds go directly towards the first production run. The formula has been created, tested, perfected, and manufacturing is ready to go at receipt of payment.

Energy drink and leading supplement providers are focused on the margins and rely on good marketing, resulting in you paying more more for less because the brand looks cool. With VENDISI that's not the focus - sure we need to make a profit but the goal is to provide the ALL of the best ingredients at a fair price, even if our margins suffer. A better product means better business - it's that simple. See how we stack up against the competition.

 

Risks & Challenges

I write to you as the owner of VENDISI PERFORMANCE LLC. and at this point in the product development, there is little risk or challenge ahead. Below is a list of what has been completed in order to bring VITALITY to market, and what remains. This product WILL make it to market, but we need your support to get it there. Don't miss out on your chance to get it first and at a discount, let's send it.

Completed:

  • Formula creation and testing
  • Company logo and product label design
  • LLC filing and acceptance
  • Website / media outlets up and operational
  • Manufacturing on standby
  • Fulfillment plan solidified, partnering with Amazon to bring the best service to the customer
  • Crowdfunding campaign created

Remaining:

  • Fund the first production run (that's where you're help comes in)
  • Fulfill your orders!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Spread the word! If you know someone that loves to send it, VITALITY will take them to the next level. Any additional funds or exposure will help bring this product to market. No amount of help is insignificant, let's get this done together.

story:
The Founders 

      

Randy & Amanda Jordan, the founders of the Go Hard, Finish Strong fitness mobile platform decided to build this platform because they believe living a healthy life is so much more then how you look, how strong you are, how fast or far you can run, or what you eat. They believe being healthy is about moderation, motivation and finding a balance that allows you to live a strong life.

The Go Hard, Finish Strong Team

 

OUR PLAN WAS TO LAUNCH BY OCTOBER OF THIS YEAR, WE HAVE PUSHED THIS DATE BACK TO MAY OF 2020 IN ORDER TO ASSURE OUR PLATFORM ONCE LAUNCHED, IS SECURE AND WORKS PROPERLY.

The Importance Of this Platform

View the below video to see why we have chosen to build a better fitness solution!

 

Why believe in Go Hard, Finish Strong?

We will change the perception of individuals self-pride and provide them with the motivation needed to live a healthy life.

 

TO ACCOMPLISH THIS, WE NEED YOUR HELP!

To see Go Hard, Finish Strong reach its full potential, we are asking you to help us raise $35,000. Your investment will help move operations forward and build a solid brand name you can be proud of. 

If we are able to raise the $35,000, we will invest every cent into the business to accomplish the following things:

  • $10,000 will be spent on securing the platform to protect your personal identity and provide you with the privacy needed to share information easily, accurately and securely with your friends and family.
    • The $10,000 we raise here will allow for the application builders to add better security and to conduct routine maintenance on the platform.
    • NOTE: According to Formotus.com the price range for developing an mobile app is most often from $100,000 to $500,000, see the link below for details:

https://www.formotus.com/blog/figuring-the-costs-of-custom-mobile-business-app-development

  • $10,000 will be spent on the design and production of our unique exclusive fitness apparel . (Only to be sold via the platform to members) (members will be able to use points earned for discounts and/or purchases of merchandise)
    • ​To date, the founders of Go Hard, Finish Strong has secured a designer to design the sample items seen below.
    • In order to move to production, we need to have Tech Packs created for each item to send to the manufacturer so they will know the proper measurements and design of each item. Tech packs cost on average $50 to $400 each piece, each size. 
    • For details on the cost of Tech Packs please visit the link below: 

https://fashioninsiders.co/toolkit/how-to/sample-development-cost/

  • $15,000 will be spent on marketing and operations in order to move the platform forward.
    • If raised, these funds will be spent primarily on marketing, creating advertisement products, attending events to promote the platform and other day to day operations.

The $35,000 we are looking to raise will help us get one step closer to the platform being a global change towards improving health and fitness in everyday life. However, it is not our overall goal to raise just $35,000, we are attempting to raise in total $200,000 which would allow the founders to push the platform through the Five Stage business model they have designed. 

To date we are currently in Stage 2 of our growth plan, we are hoping you can help us make it to Stage 3. 

 

To reach our goal we have designed limited edition challenge coins which will only, only be offered this one time. 

A challenge  coin is a small coin or medallion, bearing an organization's insignia or emblem and carried by the organization's members. Traditionally, they might be given to prove membership when challenged and to enhance morale. In addition, they are also collected by service members and law enforcement personnel.

Our founders being in law enforcement, decided to create these coins because in their line of work, challenge coins represent the concept of camaraderie, strength, respect and over all the chance to be a part of something more then yourself.

We are offering four coins, each coin will provide a contributor with different perks and each coin will come with a certificate of authenticity.

There will be 1,000 coins total, 250 of each of the four coin. Each coin will offer in the beginning discounts on apparel, points towards your total points once you download the platform and other incentives to be identified through the maturity and growth of the platform.

          

 

         

If we are unable to reach our full goal of raising $35,000, we will continue to push and use any funds raised to move the business to market. 

 

THE IMPACT WE PLAN TO MAKE

Our platform will provide the services and information needed for individuals to build a healthy lifestyle for themselves and their loved ones.


We are building this platform for the following reasons:

  •  to bring awareness to the benefits of fitness
  • to help individuals obtain and maintain fitness
  • to help individuals find motivation to participate in fitness activities 
  •  to give individuals a safe, comfortable fitness based platform where they can push themselves and the people they love towards a healthier lifestyle

Its Time For A Change!

 

Risks & Challenges

Fact, risk is a part of launching any startup, Go Hard, Finish Strong understand this and knows putting your hard earn money in a start-up is taking a leap of faith. However, with anything of greatness, there is risk, risk that comes with minimal control, risk you can only guard against. When you put your trust in a startup, you make a choice to believe this company will adhere to doing the things they said they will do.

Well for Go Hard, Finish Strong, we will change the perception of how individuals view their self-pride in the world of health and fitness. We will help you and your loved ones find the motivation needed to live a healthier lifestyle. The saying goes with great risk comes great reward, well taking a chance on Go Hard, Finish Strong is not a risk, it’s a sure thing, its not a matter of if it will succeed, but when it will succeed. How will we do this:

WITH OUR KEYS TO SUCCESS
 

  • Build a user friendly platform that is dynamic and secure.
  • Provide unique products and services at a reasonable price.
  • Focus on customer service.
  • Build a solid management team and employee workforce who believes in the business.
  • Manage the company with integrity, compassion, and fairness while holding everyone accountable for their actions.
  • Constantly striving to grow and change, offering unique fitness services.

 

The Go Hard Finish Strong Platform Design

  • We are using PHP Laravel Framework version 5.8 with vue.js for user interface for the admin panel along with the use of MYSQL for the database version 8.
  •  For the user mobile platform, we are using REACT Native Platform for both IOS and Android Applications along with the APIs developed on Laravel Version 5.8.
  • We are also using multiple video compression algorithms similar to whatsapp in order to optimize the application and the video uploads.

The below videos show a prototype of our platform:

Apple Test Flight Application Testing Platform

(used to test application prior to production)

 
Platform Design v1.1.1
 

 

Platform Design v1.1.9

 

The Go Hard Finish Strong Platform Layout

 

Home Page

 

Charity Funding Page

 

Fitness Challenge Page

 

  • The platform will provide unique services individuals can use to build their fitness.
  • The platform will give members access to exclusive apparel and offer the opportunity to win prizes.
  • Individuals who register and use the platform will be able to build, test and improve their fitness without hassle, without braking the bank and without worrying about where, how and when to workout.
  • All exercises for the platform will be comprised only of:  Bodyweight, Elastic Band & Dumbbell exercises.

 

For additional details on the services which will be available after launch of the platform in May 2020 click the link below: 

https://www.dropbox.com/s/kv0ts7oijxr8h2t/Go%20Hard%2C%20Finish%20Strong%20Services%20Overview.pdf?dl=0

 

For additional details on the services which we will be looking to launch on the platform later in the future see the below link: 

https://www.dropbox.com/s/3j3fw1os3dwiqlb/Plann...

Our Unique fitness apparel 

Go Hard Finish Strong has acquired an apparel designer currently based in Barcelona, Spain. Johanna Regardh has previously worked in the fashion industry, but now she dedicates herself to be a freelance multidisciplinary designer. See more about Johanna at her Instagram page: https://instagram.com/johannaregardh?igshid=6jjuir5zvqes

To date we are in the first stages of design for our fitness apparel, below is a few examples created by Johanna we are looking to launch on the platform. Our goal is to push the boundaries on fitness apparel by creating items that are comfortable yet strong, flexible yet fashionable and exclusive as we will not be producing a massive amount of any item. We plan to only produce small numbers of every item, this providing members with the exclusiveness of be a few to own a piece. Please see some of our designs below:

T-Shirt Designs (Women T-Shirts will be created in the same colors)

 

 

Men Tights Designs

 

Women Tights Designs

Men Sweatshirts Designs (Women Sweatshirts will be created in the same colors)

Women Short Designs (Men shorts will be created in the same colors)

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to assist with helping us reach our goal, we are asking you to please share the word of our amazing platform we are bringing to market. We want to thank you for the time to review our campaign and we hope to have you as a member of our application once it is launched.
story_txt:
The Founders 
      
Randy & Amanda Jordan, the founders of the Go Hard, Finish Strong fitness mobile platform decided to build this platform because they believe living a healthy life is so much more then how you look, how strong you are, how fast or far you can run, or what you eat. They believe being healthy is about moderation, motivation and finding a balance that allows you to live a strong life.
The Go Hard, Finish Strong Team

 
OUR PLAN WAS TO LAUNCH BY OCTOBER OF THIS YEAR, WE HAVE PUSHED THIS DATE BACK TO MAY OF 2020 IN ORDER TO ASSURE OUR PLATFORM ONCE LAUNCHED, IS SECURE AND WORKS PROPERLY.
The Importance Of this Platform
View the below video to see why we have chosen to build a better fitness solution!


 

Why believe in Go Hard, Finish Strong?
We will change the perception of individuals self-pride and provide them with the motivation needed to live a healthy life.
 
TO ACCOMPLISH THIS, WE NEED YOUR HELP!
To see Go Hard, Finish Strong reach its full potential, we are asking you to help us raise $35,000. Your investment will help move operations forward and build a solid brand name you can be proud of. 
If we are able to raise the $35,000, we will invest every cent into the business to accomplish the following things:

$10,000 will be spent on securing the platform to protect your personal identity and provide you with the privacy needed to share information easily, accurately and securely with your friends and family.
The $10,000 we raise here will allow for the application builders to add better security and to conduct routine maintenance on the platform.

NOTE: According to Formotus.com the price range for developing an mobile app is most often from $100,000 to $500,000, see the link below for details:


https://www.formotus.com/blog/figuring-the-costs-of-custom-mobile-business-app-development

$10,000 will be spent on the design and production of our unique exclusive fitness apparel . (Only to be sold via the platform to members) (members will be able to use points earned for discounts and/or purchases of merchandise)
​To date, the founders of Go Hard, Finish Strong has secured a designer to design the sample items seen below. 
In order to move to production, we need to have Tech Packs created for each item to send to the manufacturer so they will know the proper measurements and design of each item. Tech packs cost on average $50 to $400 each piece, each size. 
For details on the cost of Tech Packs please visit the link below: 


https://fashioninsiders.co/toolkit/how-to/sample-development-cost/
$15,000 will be spent on marketing and operations in order to move the platform forward.If raised, these funds will be spent primarily on marketing, creating advertisement products, attending events to promote the platform and other day to day operations.

The $35,000 we are looking to raise will help us get one step closer to the platform being a global change towards improving health and fitness in everyday life. However, it is not our overall goal to raise just $35,000, we are attempting to raise in total $200,000 which would allow the founders to push the platform through the Five Stage business model they have designed. 

To date we are currently in Stage 2 of our growth plan, we are hoping you can help us make it to Stage 3. 
 
To reach our goal we have designed limited edition challenge coins which will only, only be offered this one time. 
A challenge  coin is a small coin or medallion, bearing an organization's insignia or emblem and carried by the organization's members. Traditionally, they might be given to prove membership when challenged and to enhance morale. In addition, they are also collected by service members and law enforcement personnel.
Our founders being in law enforcement, decided to create these coins because in their line of work, challenge coins represent the concept of camaraderie, strength, respect and over all the chance to be a part of something more then yourself.
We are offering four coins, each coin will provide a contributor with different perks and each coin will come with a certificate of authenticity.
There will be 1,000 coins total, 250 of each of the four coin. Each coin will offer in the beginning discounts on apparel, points towards your total points once you download the platform and other incentives to be identified through the maturity and growth of the platform.
          
 
         
If we are unable to reach our full goal of raising $35,000, we will continue to push and use any funds raised to move the business to market. 
 
THE IMPACT WE PLAN TO MAKE
Our platform will provide the services and information needed for individuals to build a healthy lifestyle for themselves and their loved ones.
We are building this platform for the following reasons:

 to bring awareness to the benefits of fitness
to help individuals obtain and maintain fitness
to help individuals find motivation to participate in fitness activities 
 to give individuals a safe, comfortable fitness based platform where they can push themselves and the people they love towards a healthier lifestyle

Its Time For A Change!

 

Risks & Challenges
Fact, risk is a part of launching any startup, Go Hard, Finish Strong understand this and knows putting your hard earn money in a start-up is taking a leap of faith. However, with anything of greatness, there is risk, risk that comes with minimal control, risk you can only guard against. When you put your trust in a startup, you make a choice to believe this company will adhere to doing the things they said they will do.
Well for Go Hard, Finish Strong, we will change the perception of how individuals view their self-pride in the world of health and fitness. We will help you and your loved ones find the motivation needed to live a healthier lifestyle. The saying goes with great risk comes great reward, well taking a chance on Go Hard, Finish Strong is not a risk, it’s a sure thing, its not a matter of if it will succeed, but when it will succeed. How will we do this:
WITH OUR KEYS TO SUCCESS 

Build a user friendly platform that is dynamic and secure.
Provide unique products and services at a reasonable price.
Focus on customer service.
Build a solid management team and employee workforce who believes in the business.
Manage the company with integrity, compassion, and fairness while holding everyone accountable for their actions.
Constantly striving to grow and change, offering unique fitness services.

 
The Go Hard Finish Strong Platform Design

We are using PHP Laravel Framework version 5.8 with vue.js for user interface for the admin panel along with the use of MYSQL for the database version 8.
 For the user mobile platform, we are using REACT Native Platform for both IOS and Android Applications along with the APIs developed on Laravel Version 5.8.
We are also using multiple video compression algorithms similar to whatsapp in order to optimize the application and the video uploads.

The below videos show a prototype of our platform:
Apple Test Flight Application Testing Platform
(used to test application prior to production)

 
Platform Design v1.1.1
 


 
Platform Design v1.1.9

 

The Go Hard Finish Strong Platform Layout
 
Home Page

 
Charity Funding Page

 
Fitness Challenge Page

 

The platform will provide unique services individuals can use to build their fitness.
The platform will give members access to exclusive apparel and offer the opportunity to win prizes.
Individuals who register and use the platform will be able to build, test and improve their fitness without hassle, without braking the bank and without worrying about where, how and when to workout.
All exercises for the platform will be comprised only of:  Bodyweight, Elastic Band & Dumbbell exercises.

Go Hard Finish Strong has acquired an apparel designer currently based in Barcelona, Spain. Johanna Regardh has previously worked in the fashion industry, but now she dedicates herself to be a freelance multidisciplinary designer. See more about Johanna at her Instagram page: https://instagram.com/johannaregardh?igshid=6jjuir5zvqes
To date we are in the first stages of design for our fitness apparel, below is a few examples created by Johanna we are looking to launch on the platform. Our goal is to push the boundaries on fitness apparel by creating items that are comfortable yet strong, flexible yet fashionable and exclusive as we will not be producing a massive amount of any item. We plan to only produce small numbers of every item, this providing members with the exclusiveness of be a few to own a piece. Please see some of our designs below:
T-Shirt Designs (Women T-Shirts will be created in the same colors)

 

 
Men Tights Designs

 
Women Tights Designs



Men Sweatshirts Designs (Women Sweatshirts will be created in the same colors)



Women Short Designs (Men shorts will be created in the same colors)

Other Ways You Can Help
If you are unable to assist with helping us reach our goal, we are asking you to please share the word of our amazing platform we are bringing to market. We want to thank you for the time to review our campaign and we hope to have you as a member of our application once it is launched.

story:
Just a Kidney

 

Our Store is Live!

Do good while you're looking good!

Here is the link: https://shop.justakidney.com

 

Driven by first hand experience, CEO Marcelle Chaffin understands Waitlisted Kidney Transplant Recipients' needs and the current barriers that result in long wait times for kidney transplants – less than 20% of the waitlist, annually, find a match and undergo a kidney transplant. Chaffin is passionate about making the process better and the pool of Living Kidney Donor resources greater as she has been going through the process herself.

Her husband Ed has been waiting for 4 years for a kidney transplant and together they have been inside the system experiencing the impact that 4 years of his dialysis treatment has had on their family – physically, mentally and financially. 

Her Just a Kidney concept brings a new solution to the process of connecting Living Kidney Donors and Waitlisted Kidney Transplant Recipients by providing a social networking platform dedicated to finding potential matches through a qualified community.

 

GET YOUR FREE MASK!

The first 100 backers receive this custom Just a Kidney mask when you donate $150 or more to this great cause!

 

* * * WEB APP COMING SOON * * * 

 

SAVING LIVES BY CONNECTING PEOPLE!

The goal for Just a Kidney is to raise awareness of the need for more Living Kidney Donors and a platform for Waitlisted Kidney Transplant Recipients to tell their story! Just a Kidney will facilitate connections, not matches, with the intent of offering an ample pool of potential resources in one easy to use friendly place to foster greater matching potential.

The search criteria will be similar to social media platforms that use personal "likes" and locations (e.g., where someone currently resides, hometowns, high schools, and Alma Maters) versus providing medical profiles. After a connection is made, Members will move forward with external professional medical testing to determine if they are a viable match. Within the Just a Kidney community, Members seek each other out through common interests and experiences simplifying the search process for a match, and making it more natural and relatable.

 

Other ways you can help!

Please spread the word and make some noise about our campaign! We need to raise awareness for this great cause! Please share with Family and Friends! You only need one! Be a living donor!

story:
The Geo Lung is the first mask to separate the breather from the filter. This unique design means that users inhale and exhale through different parts of the mask, which is different from all other emergency respiratory mask. We are looking to raise at least $70,00 for the necessary funding needed to conduct a Large manufacturing run and get the Geo Lung on the market.

The filters on the mask are on both the front and sides. Cotton filters are for dust and biomaterial, carbon filters for smog, and hepa filters for the oils in smoke during fire emergencies. The filters last between two and three days, compared to just 15 to 20 minutes in traditional masks. Filters are easy to switch out and replace.

The Geo Lung fits snugly over the nose, and as it is one size fits all mask it is comfortable for any user.

User can also attach special filter on the side ports to allow user to clean the oxygen around them. Not only are you breathing cleaner, but you clean the surround environment around you.

That is a big step on helping the ozone later in your local community.

 

 

Geo Lung is the only respiratory mask that allows you to breathe without breathing back into the filter. This means that you can get the best possible breath thru just utilizing the mask for yourself. The patented design allows for users to separate both breathing airflow and filter.

The center wall allows the mask to function as a 2 channel mask apparatus.
 

During inhale response, user's breath opens a first air valve causing air flow through replaceable filter through a chamber to a mouth piece disposed in a user's mouth.

During exhale response, user's breath closes first valve causing one or more exhaust valves to open.

The Geo lung will allow you to get your best breath possible from everyday walking, jogging, bicycling or simple or in an emergency like the CA Wildfires and smog.
 

The left bar represents the central wall within the Geo Lung that dictates and separates airflow traffic within the mask ventilation system. The left arrows represent air flow as you are inhaling. 

During inhale response, user's breath opens a first air valve causing air flow through replaceable filter through a chamber to a mouth piece disposed in a user's mouth.

Filter types - Carbon, Hepa, Cotton filters are used for filtration.
 

The left bar represents the central wall within the Geo Lung that dictates and separates airflow traffic within the mask ventilation system. The right arrows represent air flow as you are breathing out of the mask.

During exhale response, user's breath closes first valve causing one or more exhaust valves to open. Which allows you to never breathe back into the filter or mask apparatus causing more damage.

With the Geo Lung you can clean the air around you as you breathe out.
 

 

Whether it is an emergency situation or you are simply running, jogging, bicycling, painting, welding and any other commercial use, the Geo Lung is ideal for various applications.
 
In case of a fire emergency
 
In a heavy smog environment
 
Walking, running or jogging
 
incase your bicycling
 
Even for commercial use like painting and welding
 
 

Noise Piece, Mouth Piece, Front Plates with Filters, Side Ports, Side Filters. Each element on the geo lung is easibly replacement. Filters are meant to last 2-3 days, in some case a week.

Front Plate

The front plate on the mask comes on and off with ease, From here you can install you hepa, cotton and carbon filters. Filters are estimated to last 2-3 days, in some case a week.

Inside Wall

The inside wall is what allows the Geo Lung to have its own unique and patented functionality. As you breathe in and out. the diaphragms open and closes allowing you to breathe in thru the front plates and breathe out only thru the side vents.

Side Ports

The side ports allow you to breath out of the Geo Lung without breathing into the filter. If you install carbon filters you can clean your environment as you breathe out.
 

Noise Piece

The noise piece is easy to take off and put on as it has a seal that connects onto the mask. One size fits all piece and is easily replaceable if need be.
 

Mouth Piece

Snorkel like mouth piece sits at a 45-degree angle and fits perfectly into your mouth. Easy to take off and put back on. 

 
 
 
Showcase Products, design work, muptile files, showcase patent as well
 
Sorted Design Colors of the GeoLung:
 
Blue Finish
 
Lime Finish
 
Camo Finish
 
Glossy Silver FInish
 
Black Finish
 
We are aiming to provide different color assortment after the successful completion of these campaign.  We also welcome different color suggestion from our backers and supporters!

 

Geo Lung Patents

US Trademark Granted
Utility Patent Granted
https://patents.google.com/patent/US9084905?oq=...
 

After getting frustrated from what mask was currently on the market. A partner and I decided to create our own ventilation device out of pvc pipes. With some mutiple redesign work and some extensive testing we  later on came up with the Geo Lung.

Fast forward seem years.

Now at my age almost 60, I only cycle with the Geo Lung

 

Production Timeline:

The Team

Cecil Monford - Founder, President

Kevin Butler - Vice President of Marketing

 

Thank you for supporting the Geo Lung Campaign On Indiegogo!  Feel free to share with friends and family members.

story:
From the initial design to product, the AccelerU has come a long way and is also Arrow Certified.

 

We're a team of engineers and designers who have worked extensively across research, product development and Industry and are now launching our own products.

With experience in ergonomics and solving problems with physical limiations, we began working with a collection of neurophysiologists and physical sports therapists to understand movements and also their impacts.

With physical excellence also crossing over directly with health problems, injury and disability and it affecting our families directly, we wanted to create a product that could help therapists abd patients across the spectrum of ability from Elite Athletes to patients requiringmedical care.

Our challenge was to make it affordable, aso so many of these areas lack funding when it comes to products, and also to make it adaptable in order to work across a variety of areas.

So we have created a product that can be worn or embedded into another product to help to tailor the readings for a specific use.

Often physical movements, impacts and speed are judged by eye — meaning that a level of experience required to judge whether a movement is within a normal range, showing signs of a problem, has improved, worsened or remained the same as a result of treatment, exercise or lack of any action.

Our wearable device provides solid data for movement analysis, with simultaneous readings from the accelerometer, gyroscope and magnetometer.

Movement isn't just about intention—it is also about movements that go undetected; either as subtle injuries from repetitive stretching or even down to the minute movements such as tremors in medical cases like parkinsons. Whilst this is not a medical specific device, it does enable a lot of insight for those looking at the speed of decline in patients but also the speed of recovery, whether that's post-op or injury or simply after a physio or training session.

Detection and accurate readings of the direction, range and speed motion helps to create a clear understanding of cause and effect for injuries and treatments; give a deeper understanding of new conditions; as well as provide sufficient data from which new treatment protocols can be created and implemented, either for an athlete's training regime or for specific areas such as cervical spine treatment.

 

The AccelerU is so small, lightweight and discrete that you wont even know you're wearing it. As it won't restrict movement, it's perfect for sports training and action, but also for patients of almost any phsyical therapy and training as it doesn't feel invasive, and isn't of a size or weight that would exaggerate or counter any movements for initial analysis on range and ability of joints

 

Whether you're an athlete, team manager or product developer, using our unenclosed system gives you the ideal way to tailor to your needs. Make bespoke SMART skiboots or if you want to understand how much force is going into the neck on impact for your team of ice hockey players, you can create your own custom solution with the benefit of access to our basic apps, which you can also develop to suit your specific application.

 

 

 

See real-time data on our App for Android, IoS and desktop

 

 

Tested with elite athletes from Ice Hockey and Skeleton

 

ONE DEVICE - MULTIPLE APPLICATIONS

Unlike many movement tracking devices, the AccelerU can be worn all over the body. Its designed to adapt to your application. So you can measure and analyse your golf swing, or the force your exert in a rugby tackle, or the distance of rotation and speed when turning your neck.

The data is then used to show what angles / movements offer the best results, whether thats for training in sport or for treatments for injury and rehabilitation. Meaning, whether your goal is to become faster, or to help patients recover quicker, you can make decisions based of objective measurements not just how something looks or feels.

To suit your application, whether its a particular sport, or measuring movement in a clinic, you can change the scales of the sensors to tailor to what you want to see.

 

 

 

Developed with Neurophysiologists and Sport Science Experts

Make bespoke SMART skiboots or if you want to understand how much force is going into the neck on impact for your team of ice hockey players, you can create your own custom solution with the benefit of access to our basic apps, which you can also develop to suit your specific application.   See real-time data on our App for Android, IoS and desktop   Tested with elite athletes from Ice Hockey and Skeleton

 
ONE DEVICE - MULTIPLE APPLICATIONS
Unlike many movement tracking devices, the AccelerU can be worn all over the body. Its designed to adapt to your application. So you can measure and analyse your golf swing, or the force your exert in a rugby tackle, or the distance of rotation and speed when turning your neck.
The data is then used to show what angles / movements offer the best results, whether thats for training in sport or for treatments for injury and rehabilitation. Meaning, whether your goal is to become faster, or to help patients recover quicker, you can make decisions based of objective measurements not just how something looks or feels.
To suit your application, whether its a particular sport, or measuring movement in a clinic, you can change the scales of the sensors to tailor to what you want to see.

 
 
 
Developed with Neurophysiologists and Sport Science Experts

story:
Tremors are often associated with Parkinson’s disease, but they are actually heavily influential across several diseases such as Essential Tremor (ET) and Multiple Sclerosis. The fact that more than 10 million people suffer from ET speaks for itself that this issue is both urgent and pressing. Tremor patients struggle on a daily basis with everyday tasks such as eating, drinking, and writing, and they lose out on a portion of their life. Furthermore, these patients suffer psychologically from the idea that the life they are accustomed to living is slowly deteriorating. Current methods for tremor suppression lack the ability to provide user comfortability. While many of these methods are able to successfully reduce or suppress a tremor, they also act as a hindrance to the lives of many tremor patients. Apollo NeuroTech seeks to give hope to this group through TremorWear; we believe that tremors should not be a barrier to one’s everyday life. 

That's where TremorWear comes in.

 

Here at Apollo NeuroTech...

 

We're two passionate young innovators located near Princeton, New Jersey looking to revolutionize the tremor orthosis market with this software. We want to be able to make a tangible impact on the millions of people suffering from tremors on a daily basis, and to create an interim solution between when a neurological cure is found to diseases such as Parkinson's, and the current situation we face today.

We're all about creating innovative biomedical solutions. For the past year, we've been developing, hypothesizing, and advancing our first public project, TremorWear. TremorWear offers a variety of technological advancements that have the potential to revolutionize the tremor suppression market:

TremorWear is a device-independent tremor-suppression library designed to add smart-suppression features to wearable tremor orthosis. In the current market for tremor-suppression, products tend to burden patients because they constantly apply an excessive amount of force to suppress their users’ tremors. TremorWear dissolves this issue for any wearable tremor device by determining the necessary force for them. The groundbreaking software can ultimately revolutionize the tremor market by helping contemporary products know where and how a tremor will arise. TremorWear interfaces smoothly with smart-locking mechanisms, or mechanisms which can alter the force they apply on a patient’s wrist. The system itself is not meant to be sold to consumers; its purpose is to be licensed to other firms. Currently, there is no system on the market that can accurately determine the minimum amount of force needed to suppress a tremor in real-time and adapt to any tremor orthosis device, making TremorWear a piece of revolutionary technology. With patented technology and innovative use of neural networks, TremorWear can predict where and how a tremor will arise.

 

Why Do We Need Funding?

TremorWear is a software with a variety of functions, but we need your help. We've already been able to separate tremor induced motion from voluntary motion, and we can take a step further in the right direction with your support. 

  • To create concrete, reliable prototypes
  • To transform a revolutionary idea into a full-fledged product
  • To cover transportation costs for broadening the applicability of TremorWear
  • Allow us to take risks in adding new portions to our software

We've already been able to achieve up to 90% accuracy for tremor motion, but with your support, we can conduct large scale testing to push that number above 95%.If we don't gain the entirety of our goal, the funding we gain can still go toward our early prototypes and partnerships with other firms; we intend to make use of all the support we can get and put it towards making our tremor suppression software compatible with contemporary products.

What Can You Gain?

We've got a lot of great perks that you can take advantage of if you support our project!

  • Join our family and get frequent updates on our progress!
  • Free Apollo NeuroTech Merchandise and other goodies!

TremorWear needs funding for transportation and early prototype testing, as the innovation is on the verge of creating a real solution for tremor suppression, but we need your help.

Where We Are Now

TremorWear has already made its mark on the international stage. TremorWear will be featured on...

We want you to join the Apollo NeuroTech family through your support with TremorWear. This  biomedical product has the potential to greatly impact those living in the U.S., but we want to make TremorWear universal. The patented technology that TremorWear brings to the orthopedics market provides a new method to predict tremors without restricting volunteer motion. Through the use of neural networks and revolutionary technology, TremorWear can send tremor modern products to the next level by allowing for a device that can fully suppress a tremor.

 

TremorWear Capabilities

Since TremorWear is device independent, it is compatible with any delay a device may have, making it diverse and highly versatile. Part of our patented neural network process is shown below:

TremorWear operates through a fluid integration system with actuators to directly suppress a tremor. By determining the exact necessary force to counteract a tremor and accounting for any delays an actuator may have, TremorWear is an integral part of creating a working tremor orthosis device.

Risks & Challenges

Apollo NeuroTech is seeking support to develop better and more advanced prototypes for TremorWear, and we intend to obtain a patent for this revolutionary technology. We hope that the technology can gain enough funding so that it can be publicized to a great extent, ultimately resulting in a noticeable impact for those suffering from tremors. We intend to overcome any budgeting issues through meticulous planning and various input sources from our innovators and supporters. Some potential barriers:

  • Lack of funding
  • Lack of publicity
  • Failure to meet reasonable deadlines

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Share the word about TremorWear: if you're unable to donate but you know someone willing to support a potential solution for tremor orthotics, let them know!
  • Post on social media platforms to get TremorWear out there, we want to be able to reach as many people as possible to make this innovative concept a marketed reality!

story:
Nothing contained in this website is medical advice or diagnosis nor should any information on this website be construed as such. While the results shown on this site are typical, they are not guaranteed. Individual results, amount and time duration will vary.

 

 

 


 



Source: Harvard Health Publishing
 

 

 



Over the past three years, we validated Bello’s ability to measure fat at  Seoul National University Bundang Hospital. 

Belly fat medical-grade measurement requires a person to be exposed to radiation from 10 to 30 minutes and trained specialists to work on analyzing the results.

A  technology validation study was conducted and Bello measurements were confirmed to be strongly correlated with the Computed Tomography (CT) Scan for subcutaneous and visceral fat.

Bello provides a better measurement of belly fat that is associated with metabolic disease when compared to Body Mass Index (BMI).

BMI (Body Mass Index) is widely used as a measure of weight, but it is not strongly correlated with abdomen fat as shown in the graph above.  Weight doesn't tell you how much belly fat you have. As a critical indicator of chronic diseases, belly fat should be closely monitored and managed for your metabolic health.

This clinical trial was conducted with CT (Computerized Tomography) as a reference.  Please click here for more details about the study. 

 

​

Bello's proprietary DMW-NIRS (Discrete Multi-Wavelengths Near-Infrared Spectroscopy) technology scans the belly area for an accurate belly fat analysis while other body fat scales utilize BIA (Bioelectrical Impedance Analysis). Both BIA and NIR instruments can provide accuracy equal to the Gold Standard hydrostatic weighing technique for determining percent body fat.

BIA has more restrictions in use due to its sensitivity to the hydration level of a body
while NIR provides accurate and consistent measurement without those restrictions.

 

 

Near-infrared technology behind Bello measures lipid, water, oxygenated and deoxygenated hemoglobin. Bello is the first and only portable device that can directly quantify lipid underneath the skin and provide the most accurate measurement of belly fat, anytime anywhere.

 

 

 

 



EARN CASH REWARDS FOR SHARING 

Click on the image to earn 3% cash of contributions from your own referral link.



 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We are able to ship worldwide except for the following countries due to difficult shipping conditions: Russia, China, Vietnam, Indonesia, Brazil, and Mexico. GST, equivalent taxes and duties are not included and backers are responsible for any applicable GST/customs duty/VAT for their shipments. Please see reward details for the shipping cost that applies to you.

We plan to ship starting in June 2020. We will keep you up to date on our progress and the expected delivery date of your order.

*Actual ship dates may vary. We will keep you notified of your product ship date.

By backing now, you’ll get to own one of the very first products off of the line, plus exclusive access to provide valuable feedback that will shape future generations of the product.

 

 

 

Like what you're seeing? Want to help? Just 30 seconds of your time could make the difference in growing the community. Hit one of the buttons below and tag a friend or coworker who needs this!

The more people who know about us, the larger our community will become! And the larger the community, the better we'll be able to make the product! We can't do this without you.

story:
It is important for me to create an old fashioned book. Something that has a real, feely, touchy, lasting potential. 

Something that can be passed on to your children and grandchildren. It can be shared with friends. You can write in it, highlight it, get it full of sand or chocolate smudged fingers, coffee and chai stains. It tells a story, not only of what is written on the pages, but of the books physical life. From its life before you and after you. 

After 15-years of publishing new media products myself, like DVDs, CDs, Video on Demand and the 1st ever Ashtanga Yoga App for the iPhone, I wanted to do  something more old school. In this exploding era of social media, everything is so short lived. Nothing lasts!

I wanted to create something that has the traditional juice of the ancient teachings of yoga. Something that lasts. So that the true heart of the teaching can be preserved and maintained. Just as they have been for thousands of years. The only way you could learn was from a Guru or Master, or from books. 

This is what and why we are creating!

 

Our Remaining Steps

By collaborating on this book you are supporting our production, publishing and distribution plan for a high quality, full-color, highly photographic, 250+ pages book. The book is fully written! Hundreds of photographs have already been shot, edited and incorporated into design. This book design is in the final stage. We only need to shoot a few more stylised photographs and do one final round of editing to wrap it up. 

We have set an initial target of US$ 29,000.
And anything beyond this will allow us to increase the quantity of the initial print run, making the book available to more people around the world. 

 

Amazing Perks

The creative perks we are offering are all completely in line with the book at hand. They are all based around Gannon's teachings.

In addition to limited edition, personally signed books, we are offering:

- Spaces in Michael Gannon Yoga Teacher Trainings in Mexico.

- Spaces in Gannon Yoga Retreats on Holbox Island or Bacalar Bay, both in Mexico.

- Private Classes with Gannon; in person at Yogaloft, virtually live over Skype or for your own  private group in your own home, anywhere on the planet. 

-Different Book Bundle Perks to choose from that include; Gannon's Signature Yoga Mat or Signature Yoga Mala, both by Yoga Dealer, Gannon Yoga Video on Demand or Discounted Membership at Yogaloft Playa del Carmen, Gannon's school in Mexico. 

- A Gannon Yoga Workshop weekend at your yoga school or community.

- Personalised thank you written within the book credits.

- We even have a perk that allows you the title of Co-Publisher of this Book!

 

Minimal Risk

We have a strong pre-launch campaign response and fully expect to reach our target. If we do not, it simply means we will be able to print less books in this first run. Which is all the reason NOT to wait till the book is actually on the shelves. Better to guarantee your copy by collaborating with this crowdfunding campaign now :)

I have had lots of experience producing and publishing projects like this including 4 DVDs, CDs, Posters, Video on Demand and the first ever Ashtanga Yoga App for the iPhone. 

 

Michael Gannon, TheYoga Dealer

 

Yoga found Michael after 10 years of chaotic deal making in the American advertising and music business. Through his yoga practice he was awakened to incredible balancing benefits that would gradually change his life path. Gannon spent 10 years studying with the late Sri. K. Pattabhi Jois, learning the 1st, 2nd and 3rd series of the traditional Ashtanga Vinyasa system. He was authorized directly by Jois in 2001 to teach, and Gannon then spent the next 15 years travelling and teaching Ashtanga in over 40 countries on 5 continents. 

Michael’s unique teaching style makes Yoga’s transformational powers — physical, mental and spiritual — available to all. He has imparted both of these styles by training over 350 teachers worldwide in his Teacher Trainings since 2002.  

Michael founded the Yoga Dealer brand in 2005. He has also created the instructional breathing audio program, Awaken Your Life Force and Quiet Your Mind, three DVDs; Opening Your Lotus — Elements of Sitting, Opening Your Heart — Elements of Backbending, From Earth to Heaven, and three Yoga practice posters used by practitioners around the world. 2011 brought Ashtanga Yoga with Michael Gannon, the first Ashtanga Yoga app for the iPhone / iPad / iPod Touch and Android. When The Yoga Dealer is not traveling, he spends time at the feet of his three most powerful Gurus, on their home beach in Mexico — his daughter and two sons.

Oh yeah, and in 2013, Gannon shocked the yoga world by designing and building one of the most beautiful new yoga schools on the planet, Yogaloft Playa del Carmen (yogaloftplaya.com ).

 

Spread the Love

Please do share our story and plan with your personal friends and social media community. Everybody knows somebody that will want to benefit from what this book has to offer. Hit up all the Indiegogo share tools included here.

story:
fb: /pearlfertilityapp            ig: @pearlfertility               t: @pearlfertility  

Download our Press Kit here!

Check out this video review of the contents of the first generation Pearl Kits:

Disclaimer: The Pearl Fertility System is NOT FOR CONTRACEPTIVE USE.

Ovulation testing is not an exact science make sure you understand the basic principles, find here a helpful guide from the FDA on ovulation tests in general. The FSH tests and LH tests provided in the Pearl Kits have an accuracy of 99% in detecting positive presence of hormones in urine.  The readout with the Pearl Fertility App has been demonstrated in clinical settings consult the publication here.

One Kit contains 15 FSH tests and 15 LH tests, one Activation Code to access the Pearl App measuring features, and one Urine Catcher. Progesterone (PdG) tests will be shipped separately to all backers for free if the campaign goal is reached.

Please also be aware that your user's data you provide to receive your perk will be part of the contribution to the campaign in addition to the money contributed. We treat personal data privacy very strictly and will never share it with third parties beyond the campaign purposes.

Pearl is a registered trademark of Colorimetrix, Inc. The Pearl Fertility App is a listed medical device under FDA (O.N. 1005943, class code: LHD) and it is classified as an In-Vitro Diagnostic Device for self-testing under the EU legislation and CE certification drafted (No. V9 005315). The Pearl Fertility App works in combination with the Pearl Fertility Kit containing urine tests for FSH and LH also known as ovulation tests. These tests can be use alone or in combination for ovulation date calculation or estimation of the most fertile days.  When seeking to conceive, please consult a physician. The information presented here for informational purposes only, it is not medical advice, you should consult a physician for advice if you are trying to get pregnant.
