story:
Be Inspired To Get Up In the Morning

The first 15 minutes of the morning often sets the tone for the rest of our day. Whether we are in a rush to get out the door or have ample time, we all practice regular bathroom routines that help us prepare for the day ahead.

For example, brushing our teeth and bathing are essential tasks that maintain our overall health and wellness. Many of us also like to prepare for a day by reviewing our schedule and checking the weather and traffic reports to avoid the unexpected. All in all, we spend a fixed amount of time on a daily basis maintaining our health and mentally preparing for the upcoming day.

Wavee has developed the W-1 - the world’s first electric toothbrush speaker system - to enhance the everyday bathroom experience with an innovative concept that blends our commitment to effective oral care with modern technology. 

The W-1 works double duty in the bathroom through a seamless integration of two devices that perform important functions within a person’s daily routine. The first is an electric toothbrush built with leading technology to provide effective teeth cleaning through a powerful 3-speed motor and sonic wave brush head - the second is an accompanying water-resistant speaker with a built in charging base for the brush. Wavee’s speaker delivers full and rich-sounding audio, allowing users to consume their favourite content - music, podcasts, audiobooks and more - while they are getting ready in the bathroom. 

Through technology and innovative design, the Wavee team has fused these two functions together to create the market’s first electric toothbrush and integrated speaker product - creating an entirely new and unique user experience. The W-1 is the missing piece that will help transform the common bathroom space into a secluded haven, maximizing the time (sometimes up to 60 minutes/day or more) users spend before taking on the day.   

To kickoff 2020, Wavee officially unveiled the W-1 to the public at the Consumer Electronics Show in Las Vegas. To our appreciation, the feedback and response from the media, attendees and follow exhibitor was overwhelmingly positive. The event served as a platform for us to capture user feedback in real-time, expand our network and forge new connections that will ultimately help drive the Wavee brand forward. After 4 days of fun and hard work, the team is even more excited to deliver this product in March 2020.

 

 

 

From its lightweight design to its custom toothbrush Wavee pattern grip and wall mount option, W-1 is designed with an attention to detail that makes it easy to use in any bathroom setting. It’s taken us 18 months of prototyping and testing to develop this breakthrough technology.

Wall Mount

 
 

Save precious real estate on your bathroom vanity by mounting Wavee on your wall, mirror or any flat surface. 

 

The bathroom is a sacred place for many people. It’s where we go to prepare ourselves for the world, make sure we look our best, and often times it serves as a quiet place to take a breath during a busy day. On a daily basis, time spent in the bathroom feels fairly insignificant, but a new survey out of the United Kingdom finds that the average adult will spend well more than a year of their lives in the bathroom.

According to a survey of 2,000 British adults - men will spend 373 days, or 23 minutes per day; and women will spend 456 days, or 29 minutes per day. 

Taking the chore out of oral hygiene

Everyday oral care is considered an essential preventative measure against bacteria, disease, inflammation and other systemic health concerns that can affect not only our mouths, but our entire body. Wavee’s dentist-recommended electric toothbrush provides powerful and quiet cleaning in three separate modes (each with a convenient two-minute timer) and a long-lasting lithium ion battery lasts up to 25 days on one charge. Dental research evidently shows that electric toothbrushes improve oral heath by as much as 10x when used twice a day. But the W-1 toothbrush is only the tip of the iceberg. 

Wavee truly believes that the key to improving oral care is to make it a habit instead of a chore.

To do that, Wavee wants to put the best tools in your hands and create a bathroom experience unlike ever before. 

We put our prototype in the hands of Jorge Nunez Jr. (Wavee's Director of Dental Relations) and a focus group of New York City-based dentists and dental hygienists - collectively boasting over 50 years of experience - and we were blown away by the feedback from these industry experts... 

 

 

What's up Doc? Here is what dental professionals had to say about the W-1:     

Three Brushing Modes  

Three different brushing modes are controlled through the illuminated power button, ranging from Standard (41,000 RPM), White (48,000 RPM) and Sensitive (33,000 RPM) - all using the sonic wave movement.

Two-minute timer with 30-second intervals

Dentists recommend that you brush your teeth for two minutes to ensure a sufficient clean for all areas of your mouth, and we have a built-in timer that automatically shuts the brush off when time is up.

Charge lasts up to 25 days

The brush is powered by a long lasting Lithium Ion battery which can last up to 240 minutes (Sensitive mode), so don’t worry about losing power when you bring your brush along when travelling. The electric toothbrush is inductively charged by the speaker unit through magnets when placed in the designated charging area. 

48,000 RPM motor

When building the W-1 electric toothbrush, we were determined to build a brush that not only looks innovative on the outside, but can also perform with the industry's best. The unique outer design is backed by a powerful 48,000 RPM motor that provides your teeth with a dentist-like clean.  

Studies show that listening to music has numerous benefits - including improving your overall mood, lowered stress levels, increased productivity and strengthening brain skills like learning and memory. Some consider music as the original 'miracle drug' and the W-1 is cleverly positioned to help users maximize every minute of the day. Kick your day off with the right playlist; get ready for a night out with some bumping beats; and wind down for the evening with some toned-down tracks. Wavee is there to help set the mood. 

Wavee injects life into your bathroom and eliminates your boring daily routine.

  • No more under-powered cell phone speakers
  • No more hassle of bringing a speaker in and out of the bathroom 
  • No more worrying about water damage to your speaker or phone 

The W-1 speaker unit was designed with one sole purpose: perform in the bathroom environment. We made sure to go through every different user scenario in the bathroom to make sure that Wavee is ready for anything your throw at it.

IPX 5 WATER RESISTANT 

Designed and engineered for the bathroom environment, the W-1's speaker boasts an IPX 5 rating, providing exceptional resistance to water splashes, low-pressure jet sprays and moisture from shower steam. 

Bluetooth 5.0 Connectivity

The W-1 Speaker boasts Bluetooth 5.0 connectivity, the latest iteration of Bluetooth wireless technology. It offers improved data transfer speed (twice as fast as its predecessor, 4.2), increased connectivity range (800 feet or four times the range) and larger data transfer size (8 times).

Amazon Alexa Compatible 

 

The W-1 can make multi-tasking in the morning a breeze. With Amazon Alexa, your personal virtual assistant, use your voice to initiate your music player, create a to-do list, set an alarm, stream a podcast, play audiobooks, report on the weather, traffic, sports and news. Alexa can also control other smart devices using itself as a home automation system. Wavee will be sent to Amazon factories in February 2019 for official Alexa certification. 

Lithium Ion Battery Charge

The Lithium Ion battery inside of the speaker provides 8 hours of continuous audio playback and 240 minutes of brush time. When its time to charge the speaker, conveniently connect via the provided USB-C cable. 

Rich, Omni-Directional Sound

Enjoy your favorite audio content streamed from your phone or music service through full, deep bass and clear and defined tones. The W-1's custom driver design utilizes the latest passive radiator technology to produce a surround sound experience that radiates through your entire bathroom.

Clean Sleeve

Each W-1 unit comes packed with a detachable clean sleeve that acts as a mounting cradle for your brush and a protective layer between the charging pad and brush. The sleeve is detachable for cleaning, ensuring your unit is looking great at all times.  

Choose your weapon of choice! The W-1 will be available in Pearl White/Rose Gold and Cool Grey/Rose Gold for both the toothbrush and the speaker components. 

We believe the W-1 is in a league of its own simply because there is no single product on the market to make a direct comparison. Those hoping to build a similar package with separate components (brush + speaker) are going to 'break the bank' - but with the W-1 you get both products that are engineered to work in sync at a very reasonable price. Since Wavee is direct-to-consumer, we cut out the middle man and invest more into features. Not only do we care about giving you a premium product, The W-1 is hands-down the best BANG FOR THE BUCK. 

 

No one gets it right on the first try and neither did we. From initial sketches and countless prototype revisions to working with multiple design firms to ensure our vision was met, the journey up this point has anything but smooth. Our perseverance allowed us to learn from these experiences and pushed us to stay on track and get better each step of the way. Each feature and detail has been designed and engineered with your everyday lives in mind and we are ecstatic to enhance your every day!

 

It has been quite a journey to get to this point and we are excited to see Wavee grow into the global brand that we envisioned from Day 1. We recently surpassed a milestone in our company by initiating the tooling process for mass production and have partnered with industry-leading manufacturers to help deliver on our promise. You will have a high-quality product delivered to your doorstep by March 2020, count on it.      

 

With over a decade working in demanding careers, the non-stop pace took a noticeable toll on our health. Unfortunately, it got to a point where It was common to feel sluggish and burnt out on a daily basis, causing a significant loss of motivation to get up in the morning. Taking a step back was the fix we needed - to examine our lifestyle and see where we could tweak things. It was evident that our morning routines played a huge role in setting the tone for the day. From that moment, we set out to create an enhanced bathroom experience that uniquely incorporates oral care that will help improve lives around the world.

story:
Jself combines the best relaxing technology with an all-natural latex pillow designed to make you sleep like a baby. The built-in infrared warmth and pulsating massager relax your sore neck after work, before falling asleep with soft music playing through the built-in speaker. Best of all, when you fall asleep, the pillow will automatically switch off all the electronics in 30 minutes, turning Jself into the pillow of your dreams, literally.

Reviewed by Chigz Tech

 

 

Many of us wake up with a sore neck and back, and by using our computer all day, we'll make sure we're coming home feeling even worse.

Jself helps relieve this by providing three solutions in one great pillow. The massager and infrared therapy help you relax tense muscles in your neck when you come home from work. 

When it’s time to sleep, the contoured, soft but supporting natural latex will help you fall asleep fast and wake up refreshed without neck or back pain.

 

Throughout our lifetime, we spend an enormous 26 years asleep. Surprisingly, we also spend 7 years trying to get to sleep. That's 33 years or 12,045 days spent in bed.

So a premium pillow is not really a luxury as it plays an important role in your sleep. Why don't you get a fantastic pillow which can help relieve your sore muscles after work? And how much are you willing to pay for a sound sleep?


We’ve integrated an infrared therapy and massaging unit into the pillow, delivering soothing warmth and relaxing vibrations after a long day at work. They can be used together or individually, and different modes give you a customized experience for optimal relaxation.

The pillow is designed to release tension in your neck, relaxing and recharging you, whether you’re resting, or recharging for a night-shift.

Don’t worry about falling asleep with the infrared or massager still turned on, Jself will stop working in 30 minutes when you fall asleep and turns off all the electronics.

 

Take a deep breath and relax with the built-in pulsating massager. Just close your eyes and imagine the gentle touch of a masseur rubbing your neck. If rough is what you're into, that's fine, we won't judge, our pillow comes with three different modes.

 

Jself has built-in speakers, that’s fancy talk for a new type of speaker that only you can hear, not the people next to you. The pillow comes with its own set of snooze-inducing tunes, but you can also connect your phone to play your favorite white noise and music.

Listen to our beautiful built-in music, or wirelessly connect your phone. You can even stream the audio of your favorite shows through the pillow if you're watching Netflix in bed and don't want to disturb the person next to you.

 

The Jself pillow is entirely made out of natural latex, responsibly derived from trees. Not only does it offer great support for your back and neck, it is naturally hypoallergenic. It's how mother nature wants you to sleep.

 

 

So what makes the Jself pillow so great at its job of relaxing you? Every feature we've added to the pillow has been researched extensively. From the right temperature of the infrared heat to the most relaxing frequency of the massager. Below you'll find a bit more about the science behind the Jself pillow. 

 

We've tried different pillow fabrics before ultimately settling on graphene. This luxury material which is very soft to the touch and conducts heat extremely well, which helps with the infrared heating option. Different people, different preferences so we designed three different heating modes to choose from. It's luxury meeting science at its finest.

Whether you’re a side- or back sleeper, Jself gives great support to your back and neck with its ergonomic design. Jself is not just some massage gadget, your chiropractor would be proud of you for sleeping on it because it offers great support throughout the night. The latex core has air holes to keep you cool, so you won’t wake up in a sweat.

 

The air holes are designed to make Jself even more breathable and dry, sleep better at a pleasant temperature.

 

Teamwork makes the dream work, literally. 
The incredible sleep scientists at our R&D center have had many sleepless nights to ensure you can, well, sleep! Our company Shuixing Textile is the biggest pillow and duvet company in China, or as we like to call it, the dream factory.
Our team is in charge of developing the technology that goes into Jself, as well as extensively testing the pillow for comfort, safety, and durability. 


 


 

Why crowdfunding?
You might think, ‘why do some of China’s best and brightest companies need my support on Indiegogo?’ Well, to be honest, we’re ambitious, and we want to share the best of China with the whole world, but launching overseas isn’t always easy. We know how to manufacture and ship a product like no other, but there’s more to building a brand, and developing a community of happy customers like you.
We really appreciate your support, and thrive on your feedback to make our products even better. Crowdfunding allows us to talk with you directly, rather than going through distributors and stores. And that’s why we want to hear from you! What do you like? What can we do better? Please tell us, we can’t wait to hear what you think.

 

As the coronavirus spreads across China, medical masks, protective suits are urgently needed at present in China.

Shuixing is using their assembly lines to pump out more protective suits and other medical supplies to help support the front-line medical workers. We are now producing 2,000 protective suits a day for the medical workers, believe that we can finally win the war with all the efforts of the society.

 

We won't rest until you do, so please, help us help you by supporting our campaign. Together we can make the world a more well-rested and relaxed place, one Jself at a time.

Thank you, and please reach out to us with any questions you might have, we're very well rested and here to help.

If you need any additional information, please see our specifications and FAQ below.

Sleep tight!

story:
Finally, there’s an innovative, specially-designed product for men who want fuller and longer beards..

Introducing the most powerful and best designed beard brush on the market:

 

It also just happens to work like a charm on head hair too.
If your beard is coarse, unruly, scraggly, dry or tangled, you need Barbossa in your life today. No matter your beard type, Barbossa gives you that perfect look every time.

SOFTEN, STRAIGHTEN & SMARTEN
ANY BEARD

"The Barbossa Beard Behaviour straightener is designed for today’s man"

You want to look your best. That means a straight, soft and smart beard. A few minutes with the Barbossa straightener and your beard will be totally on point.

STRAIGHTENS YOU BEARD & YOUR HAIR

 You can also use it to straighten your hair, for that super-smart look 

WHY BARBOSSA IS DIFFERENT

IT'S FOR EVERY MEN

" The Barbossa beard straightener is for any man who cares about looking better. It is suitable for any kind of beard and hair, from smooth to frizzy and short to long. It livens up all dry, itchy and rough beards. "

FAST, LONG LASTING AND PERFECT FINISHING

With its anti-static coating and advanced ionic conditioning, Barbossa ‘Beard Behaviour’ glides easily through even the unruliest facial hair. It eliminates frizz and snagging, giving you instant results that last all day. It only takes one run with Barbossa to straighten and brush your beard.

PORTABLE AND SIMPLE TO USE

Now you can look after your beard wherever you are. The Barbossa Beard Behaviour straightener is compact and totally portable. With its temperature switcher and grab handle, it couldn’t be easier to use. Plus, Barbossa turns itself off after 30 minutes, so you know it’s safe. If you’ve got a few minutes before a date or big meeting, you’ve got time to smarten up your beard!

ERGONOMICALLY-CRAFTED HANDLE FOR
EASY GLIDING

Barbossa Beard Behaviour fits perfectly in your hand, for ultimate control as you give your beard that perfect look. We’ve spent a long time testing Barbossa, making sure everything is perfect.

SAVES YOU TIME & MONEY

Before the Barbossa Beard Behaviour straightener came along, to get results like these, you had to go to a barbershop.
That takes time and costs money.
Now you can make your beard and hair look ‘barbershop fresh’ in the comfort of your own home.
Use it every day for maximum effect.
What will you do with the time you save?
What will you spend that extra money on?

THE FULL KIT

Want to really take your beard game to the next level? We’ve created a kit that does exactly that. Everything you need to make sure your beard stand out from the crowd. It’s the ultimate accessory for the man who takes pride in his beard.

Bamboo and Nylon Brush: It’s designed to improve the texture of your hair, while massaging your scalp, stimulating the skin under your hair, as well as the hair follicle.

Bamboo comb:  Built to last with two sides. One side has fine teeth which are designed to thoroughly comb and unknit your beard. The other side has standard size teeth, more suitable for styling your beard. 

Scissors: We developed these precision scissors to give you more manoeuvrability and control when cutting. The handle is ergonomic and its super-sharp blade allows perfect control. 

Sandalwood Beard oil: Is perfect for all types of beards. The oil nourishes and deeply moisturizes your beard hair as well as the skin underneath. It helps make your beard more supple, softer, brighter and stronger.

Shampoo:  Nourish and condition your beard hair, helping to protect the skin underneath and reduce that itching you feel as your beard begins to grow.

Sandalwood Beard balm:  Perfect finishing touch to shape and hold any beard.

HOW IT WORKS

To use the Barbossa straightener, simply plug it in and turn it on by pressing the power button for 2 seconds. Choose your heating level by pressing the temperature button (170°C/190°C/210°C). Once the indicator light stops flashing, you can start to brush your beard or hair slowly from the roots to the tips. To get better results, you can apply a small amount of beard balm to get a shiny finish.

REVIEWS

PRODUCT UNBOXING

TECHNICAL SPECS

PRICING

PRODUCTION

UPDATE: DELIVERIES IN PROGRESS

TIMELINE

story:
About the Project:

Did you know that every single person on this planet poops? Yes, you know. Well, did you know that most Americans are doing it completely wrong? Yes, wrong! Well, the time has come to say "No more!" Let's get clean, let's change culture, and let's help our world and our environment.

Introducing: TUSHY, a modern bidet attachment that turns your average toilet into a tushy-cleaning, personal hygiene wonderland!

So, you're probably asking: "A bidet? Isn't that those fancy things in Europe that look like toilets but aren't actually toilets?"

No! Well, sort of yes. TUSHY is a simple to install attachment that connects to your existing toilet and water supply and runs without the use of electricity! 

   


Since the dawn of time, humans have found creative ways to clean up after pooping: coconuts, snow, moss, hay, and leaves to name a few. The majority of Americans, right now, use toilet paper. And my goodness do we use a lot of it! Each American (that includes you!) produces 50 lbs of toilet paper waste each year. It takes 37 gallons of water, 1.3 KWh of electricity, and 1.5 pounds of wood to make a single roll of toilet paper! Americans use about 36.5 billion rolls of toilet paper every year which requires the pulping of about 15 million trees, 473,587,500,000 gallons of water, and 253,000 tons of chlorine for bleaching!  

Installing Your Tushy

   


Well let’s say no more! Let’s shed that weight! Let’s save some trees! Let’s save some green. Are you ready? Let’s change culture together. 



What Do We Need?

TUSHY is a female led startup that is looking to do some good. Our team is lead by Miki (founder extraordinaire!), Emmy, and MJ. Based in Brooklyn, New York, TUSHY is doing this campaign in order to make our manufacturing deadline and to spread the word. In order to keep manufacturing in the US we need to make our minimum of $20,000 before June 15th. Making it past this hurdle will allow us to keep our manufacturing, build our team, and begin our partnership with Toilet Hackers. Following this mark, 5% of each TUSHY purchase will go toward bringing toilets to areas of the world without plumbing.


Your support will be the catalyst for our startup to keep moving forward. We want to stay in the US! We want to decrease waste! And you can help us do it. Why? Because all of you deserves to be clean. Let's save money (less toilet paper = less green= more serene), let's save trees  (less green= more serene), and let's change culture.

Why Are We Doing This?

Miki Agrawal, Founder

"I am half-Japanese and I grew up knowing about bidets my whole life and dreaming of having my own one day. I finally got a bidet attachment 4 years ago as a Valentine's Day present (he knew of my obsession with bidets, what a guy!)  and it transformed my entire bathroom experience. A once messy, wasteful, time consuming, not so clean experience was replaced with a precise, short burst of refreshing water that gave me peace of mind and a clean feeling that I had never felt before. 

I also realized how wasteful producing a single role of toilet paper was. 37 gallons of water and bleach to produce one single roll!? What!? I couldn't believe that Americans go through 57 sheets of toilet paper per day! -Versus using a single pint of water for every time you use a bidet sounded way more environmental too! 

The final reason why I am passionate about this project is because not only am I half-Japanese but I am half-Indian too (Dad is from India)! I have been to India many times, to Africa three times and discovered the huge sanitation crisis around the world. 40% of the world doesn't have proper sanitation nor a place to go to the bathroom. We're talking about human beings. So, by partnering with Toilet Hackers, I feel like we are taking part in a real solution for our fellow earthlings around the world."


                                                                                                           

                                                                     MJ Batson, TUSHY Extraordinaire! & Co-Owner

"Before becoming a part of TUSHY, I didn't know a lot about bidets. So I decided to do some research. I found out that not only are bidets better from a hygienic standpoint, but I also saw a lot of opportunities for good. Yes, we can make the environment better but I'm also concerned with other ways to make a difference. During my research, I read a testimony from a person whose spouse was diagnosed with ALS. Following the installation of a bidet attachment, her spouse was able to gain back some independence that he had not had for a while. It's a simple act, going to the restroom, but for some it's way more than that. Our partnership with Toilet Hackers is another example of how TUSHY can be a part of something extraordinary. As an American, I understand that I live a privileged life. We have toilets. So being able to help an elderly lady feel young for a second, a mom have less of burden doing laundry with her sons, or something as grand as bringing toilets to an area that didn't have the means is a cause I am happy to be a part of. I'm a strong believer in the purpose driven life and I give my time when a difference can be made (big or small) and TUSHY has the potential to make some noise. And I'm happy to help bring the sound to as many as I possibly can. I have a holistic approach to life and finding the harmony in all areas is a constant goal. So why TUSHY? Because all of you and me and everyone deserves to be clean."  xxMJ

Emmy Bush, TUSHY Extraordinaire! & Co-Owner

"The aspect of TUSHY I was drawn to was the eco-conscious side.  Ever since I was little my family recycled, carried reusable grocery bags, composted, and rejected plastic water bottles, just to name a few.  So TUSHY for me was another thing I could do on a daily basis to make a difference.  27,000 trees are cut down daily just to make toilet paper!  That number is alarming to me.  The consumption of toilet paper in America is alarming to me, and I want to change that." 

Hey Good Looking. Perk up!

So, we all know Indiegogo campaigns have great incentives, right? Here are our perks (besides supporting a new business and contributing to a better world!):

#1 E-tastic Thank You Card! - $10

Hey you! We appreciate you. If you're not ready or able to take the Tushy plunge but still want to show your support then please do! We'll send you updates and a personal electronic Thank You card!

#2 Early Bird Special! - $59

#3 For People Who Poop - $75

#4 Two Tushy Households! $140

#5 Tushy + VIP Empire State Building - $350

 +  

#6 Triple Threat - $200

 x 3


#7 Quad Up - $250

 x4


#8 Tushy & Miki Dinner @ Wild- $500

+  

Other Ways You Can Help:

Whether or not you decided to support our campaign we appreciate your taking the time to stop by and take a look. We would love for you to share the word by sharing the link to our campaign via email, word of mouth, Facebook, Twitter, Google +, etc. We appreciate your support! 

Lastly, The Fine Print:

  • Does not ship to PO boxes/AK/HI/Canada/Puerto Rico.
  • 18 month warranty

FAQs

Q: Does your system warm the water?

A: No, it doesn't.

Q. Will TUSHY only install on the left side (facing the toilet)?

A: Yes, this item can only install on the left (facing) side.

Q: Does TUSHY also dry?

A: No, it does not.

Q: Does TUSHY require power?

A: No power source is needed.

Q: Can I attach and remove TUSHY easily?

A: Yes! Removal and installation is simple.

story:
Version en Anglais / English part

Welcome to our new International partners. Be part of this amazing iCRAME new security services in your country.

 



iCRAME

Qu’est-ce que c’est ?


Une association unique entre un réseau d’entraide communautaire de proximité et des équipements de vidéosurveillance performants et connectés.

Ce qui fait l’originalité d’iCRAME, c’est avant tout l’association unique d’un réseau d’entraide communautaire de proximité - fédéré autour d’une Application mobile - et de matériels de vidéo surveillance performant livré et paramétré chez vous ou dans votre entreprise par nos techniciens. Cette approche qui allie lien social et technologie permet de mettre en relation les membres de la communauté afin de lever un doute et d’assister les membres de la communauté en cas d’intrusion, de dégâts matériels ou d’atteinte à la personne, dans vos locaux professionnels ou dans votre habitation.

Reposant sur la notion de communauté, iCRAME fédère les particuliers et professionnels qui ne veulent pas se contenter d’être simplement alertés par une société de télésurveillance en cas d’intrusion ou de dégâts matériels et qui, au contraire, souhaitent disposer d’une assistance sur place, le tout sans coût caché et en toute confiance.

Grâce à iCRAME et son réseau local d’entraide, les membres de la communauté peuvent, très rapidement, lever le doute (s’il n’existe aucun risque) ou être assistés en cas de réel problème, en particulier lorsqu’ils sont éloignés de leur domicile, de leur résidence de vacances ou de leurs locaux professionnels.


Les membres de la communauté sont en contact direct via l’App mobile iCRAME et s’assistent pour valider et accélérer :

  • L’intervention des forces de l’ordre
  • Attendre le serrurier
  • Vérifier s’il y a des dégâts après un orage ou une fuite d’eau

Le tout en toute confiance grâce aux caméras dont sont équipés tous les membres de la communauté iCRAME, un outil indispensable qui permet de valider le bien-fondé d’une intervention.

Comment ça marche ?

Chaque membre de la communauté (ou iCRAMeur) s’équipe d’au moins une caméra - gage de sa bonne foi et pierre angulaire de la confiance entre membres de la communauté – et télécharge l’App Mobile ICRAME sur laquelle il s’inscrit afin d’adhérer à la communauté.

Malheureusement cela vous est arrivé ! Vous avez été cambriolé alors que vous n’étiez pas à votre domicile… Votre caméra iCRAME vous a alerté mais que faire ?


En cas d’intrusion, de dégâts matériels ou d’atteinte à la personne, le membre de la communauté est alerté sur son smartphone de la situation et vérifie le bien-fondé d’une intervention, grâce à la caméra de télésurveillance.


Il géolocalise ensuite, toujours grâce à son application mobile, les membres de la communauté qui sont disponibles pour intervenir sur site. Après avoir validé avec un « Helpeur » (personne qui intervient pour aider un membre de la communauté) qu’il peut intervenir, il lui explique comment intervenir puis est tenu informé en temps réel de la situation.

À partir de l'application, le Helpeur peut commencer son rapport en suivant une shake list en fonction de l'intervention, en y ajoutant les photos à l'appui. Ce rapport pourra être utilisé pour compléter la déclaration à l'assurance et aussi pour le dépôt de plainte.


Une fois l’intervention terminée, le « Demandeur » (personne qui fait appel à un membre de la communauté) remercie le Helpeur en lui offrant des crédits cadeaux, qu'il pourra utiliser sur les sites de nos partenaires affiliés.


Prenons un exemple :

David reçoit une alerte lui signalant une intrusion dans son commerce alors qu’il est en vacances à 300 kms de là.

> David commence par vérifier, grâce à la caméra de surveillance, qu’il y a bien eu intrusion. Il cherche via l’application mobile, un Helpeur disponible pour attendre la police

> Véronique est disponible.

> Il la contacte et lui donne toutes les instructions.

> Véronique se rend sur place et attend l’arrivée des forces de l’ordre qui ont été contactés par David ou/et Véronique. Elle est présente pour les assister dans leur travail et rendre compte, en temps réel, à David de la situation avec des photos à l’appui.

David très satisfait de l’aide de Véronique lui offre un cadeau via l’application iCRAME.

Pourquoi iCRAME ?

La télésurveillance est devenue un outil de plus en plus utilisé par les particuliers comme par les professionnels pour assurer la surveillance des habitations et locaux commerciaux.

Bien que le principe soit séduisant sur le papier, dans les faits, le déplacement des entreprises de sécurité sur place est souvent plus complexe à mettre en œuvre et le traitement en lui-même du problème rencontré, n’est que rarement pris en charge par la société de sécurité (ou moyennant des frais importants et souvent cachés).

Grâce à iCRAME et son réseau solidaire, les membres de la communauté sont sûrs d’avoir un relais local de confiance pour assister les professionnels (tout en étant en relation avec le Demandeur) qui devront intervenir dans l’habitation ou le local commercial.

L’iCRAMeur peut ainsi avoir l’assurance que quelqu’un peut lui rendre compte, en temps réel, de ce qui se passe, et surtout permettre de réduire les temps d’intervention des équipes de professionnels (préalablement référencés)

Pour qui ?

iCRAME est une solution qui s’adresse aux particuliers comme aux professionnels qui souhaitent bénéficier de la puissance des technologies de vidéo surveillance tout en s’assurant qu’une personne de confiance peut sur place, les aider à accélérer les démarches et les interventions des professionnels (serruriers, pompiers, forces de police, etc.).

Cela concerne aussi bien les résidences principales que les résidences de vacances ou encore les locaux professionnels.

Qu’est-ce que ça m’apporte ?

iCRAME des services indispensables

L'offre

L’offre iCRAME s’articule autour de deux éléments indissociables qui font de cette approche une solution fiable, simple et économique



ICRAME App

La plate-forme de mise en relation des membres de la communauté
iCRAME APP est la plate-forme technologique permettant aux iCRAMeurs d’entrer en contact et de s’entraider. Elle met en relation l’ensemble des membres de la communauté et géolocalise les Helpeurs disponibles. Téléchargeable à partir de l’Apple Store et de Google Android, iCRAME APP est le complément indispensable de l’équipement de vidéo surveillance iCRAME Camera. La souscription au réseau d’entraide iCRAME et l’utilisation de la plate-forme sont incluses dans le contrat de location de la (ou des) iCRAME caméra(s).



ICRAME Caméras

Les solutions technologiques de télésurveillance

iCRAME propose plusieurs modèles de caméras, qui ont toutes en commun, d’être capables d’aller plus loin que de simples caméras.

Premier objet connecté, la caméra permet à la fois de surveiller et d’obtenir des images mais aussi d’échanger (écouter et parler), de détecter des individus, de partager de bons moments à distance…

Toutes nos caméras proposent :

  • Simplicité d’installation et de paramétrage,
  • Sauvegarde des images des caméras intérieures sur cate SD 32gb
  • Caméra intérieure pilotable à distance via PC, Smartphone et tablette
  • Un design irréprochable,
  • Des fonctionnalités et des modèles différents en fonction de leur utilisation (gamme Professionnels et gamme Particuliers, modèle intérieur et extérieur),
  • Des alertes en temps réel sur votre smartphone,
  • Un excellent rapport qualité/prix.

Caméras pour les particuliers



Les iCRAMeurs peuvent s’équiper d’une ou plusieurs caméras en fonction de leurs besoins. Les caméras sont proposées à un tarif de location particulièrement économique qui comprend la maintenance et l’échange standard en cas de panne.


Caméras pour les entreprises




Les services associés

Nous proposons à nos clients, selon la formule proposée :

  • Un service d’installation et de paramétrage sur place partout en France
  • L’expédition et l’assistance téléphonique pour les iCRAMeurs
    qui souhaitent installer eux-mêmes leur(s) caméras
  • Un service maintenance permettant un échange rapide de l’équipement
    en cas de panne

Les contreparties


Pour disposer de l’ensemble des fonctionnalités offertes par les caméras et l’application mobile d’entraide, nous vous proposons un abonnement sous forme de location tout compris qui vous offre souplesse et garantie de disposer des dernières versions de l’App et d’un échange standard en cas de panne.

L’offre iCRAME et IndieGoGo vous offrent les frais de mise en service de la caméra, la 2ème année d’abonnement et même l’abonnement à vie *

Cette offre de lancement est réservée aux contributeurs IndieGoGo qui souhaitent soutenir notre projet et passer dès maintenant leurs réservations.



Particuliers

Le tarif de location pour 12 mois et payé en une seule fois dès la commande.

Tarif pour l’installation de prises électriques :
  • 17€ TTC par prise non encastrée
  • 7€ TTC le mètre de câble électrique

Installation complexe sur devis.


Entreprises

Tarif pour l’installation de prises électriques :

  • 17€ HT par prise non encastrée
  • 7€ HT le mètre linéaire de câble

Installation complexe sur devis.

Le projet


Juin 2014, suite à de nombreuses alarmes dans nos locaux et le plus souvent intempestives, nous devions, pour lever le doute, nous déplacer systématiquement et faire 15 kms aller/retour à chaque alerte. C’est à ce moment que l’idée d’un réseau social de proximité associé à des caméras de vidéosurveillance prit forme.

En août 2014, nos locaux sont fermés durant les congés et nous recevons une alerte nous signalant un problème dans nos locaux. Nous constatons, grâce à nos caméras, une fuite d’eau, mais impossible d’intervenir rapidement.

Nous devions faire rapidement intervenir quelqu’un mais que ce soit le plombier ou le serrurier, il fallait une personne qui soit physiquement présente pour l’accueillir. Appeler les pompiers risquait de laisser nos locaux non sécurisés après leur départ. Heureusement, un de nos amis a pu intervenir 3 heures après que l’alerte a été donnée.
La création d’iCRAME était alors évidente : pourquoi ne pas constituer un réseau d’entraide communauté de proximité, qui permettrait d’être assisté en cas d’intrusion ou de dégâts lorsque l’on est absent de chez soi ou de ses locaux professionnels.
En équipant les membres du réseau avec des caméras, nous avions l’assurance de ne pas les faire se déplacer pour rien grâce à la télésurveillance. La technologie et les applications mobiles ont fait le reste, nous avions déjà une bonne connaissance du marché du matériel de télésurveillance.


Il ne restait qu’à coupler un très bon matériel avec une application sociale simple et efficace.

De septembre 2014 à décembre 2014, nous développons notre concept et commençons à tester l’idée autour de nous

Juin/Juillet 2015, nous lançons notre produit via la plate-forme de financement participatif Indiegogo afin de tester l’impact de notre offre et enregistrer les premières commandes.

Nous serons en mesure de livrer les premières précommandes et lancer le début de la communauté active dès Octobre 2015. Au fur et à mesure des commentaires de nos contributeurs, nous implémenterons de nouvelles fonctionnalités dans l’application iCRAME.

Pourquoi le financement participatif ?

Nous croyons fortement dans notre concept et nous souhaitons, grâce à votre soutien, analyser rapidement l’impact et la pertinence de notre solution iCRAME tout en démarrant rapidement la mise en place du réseau communautaire.

En effet, il est important pour nous de fédérer dès maintenant une communauté solidaire autour de ce projet via la plate-forme IndieGoGo, car travailler directement avec vous nous permettra également d’améliorer notre solution et d’en faire un outil incontournable.


Comment nous aider ?

Si notre projet iCRAME vous a séduit, vous pouvez nous aider soit en participant au financement du projet soit en passant vos précommandes ou contreparties sur IndieGoGO.


Précommandez : Un tarif spécial pour nos contributeurs qui souhaitent faire partie du réseau iCRAME

Nous avons fait le choix de proposer aux contributeurs qui souhaitent nous soutenir de bénéficier d’un tarif spécial de lancement afin de passer très rapidement des précommandes (contreparties) et fédérer notre réseau communautaire. Grâce à vous, nous développons notre réseau communautaire, vous bénéficiez rapidement de tous les avantages de notre solution et participez à son développement technique et commercial.


Financez : Un soutien plus classique

Vous pouvez également nous soutenir avec un versement minimum de 2 euros. Vous serez informé régulièrement de notre déploiement et des avancées de notre projet. Le montant versé pourra également être déduit de votre future commande si vous souhaitez, vous aussi, faire partie de la communauté iCRAME.

Nous nous adressons aujourd’hui au territoire français mais envisageons très rapidement de nous déployer dans d’autre pays européens. Nos pays cibles à 6 mois sont : l’Espagne, le Portugal, le Royaume-Uni, la Suisse, la Belgique, l’Allemagne, l’Italie, l’Autriche, les Pays-Bas, USA, Brésil. Dès à présent, vous pouvez nous apporter votre soutien pour chacun de ces pays avec une contribution à partir de 2€.

Nous vous informerons en avant-première de notre déploiement à l’international et votre contribution sera alors déduite de votre futur abonnement lors de notre implantation dans votre pays.


Partagez : faites connaitre notre projet sur les réseaux sociaux

Et surtout n’hésitez pas à partager cette page et toutes les publications que nous proposons sur notre site web via les réseaux sociaux.


Mieux que cela, d’ici quelques mois, la solution iCRAME intègrera une solution innovante qui permettra, dans certains cas, de fournir des informations aux forces de l’ordre pour mener leur enquête et identifier le coupable. Ce dont nous avons tous envie lorsqu’on a été victime d’un cambriolage.


FAQ


Consulter



(*) Voir conditions sur notre site web www.icrame.com



ENGLISH PART


Seeking international partnerships

iCRAME decided to expand its network on an international scale via various partners, and is now seeking motivated investors with or without experience in security. If you have genuine skills as a developer and are inspired by the new revolution represented by participatory economics, why not join us and show us your motivation through an initial contribution?

 We only accept one partner per country and per state (for example, in the USA). To find out if a country is available, send us an email before making your contribution contact@icrame.com.



How can you help us?

If you find our iCRAME appealing, you can help us as regards future deployment in your country.

We are now focusing on France, but we are considering deploying our services rapidly in other countries. Our target countries in the next six months are Spain, Portugal, the UK, Switzerland, Belgium, Germany, Italy, Austria,the Netherlands. USA and Brazil. From now you can provide support for each of these countries and more with a contribution starting at 2€.

We will inform you well in advance of our deployment on the international stage, and your contribution will then be deducted from your future subscription when we have established ourselves in your country. If your country of residence is not mentioned, feel free to support us all the same, because that will be a further reason for us to set up our solution.


Share: spread the word about our project on the social networks And above all, feel free to share this page and all the publications we put on our website via the social networks.

What is iCRAME?


A unique combination combining a local community mutual aid network and highly efficient connected video monitoring equipment.

What makes ’iCRAME so original is that it is first and foremost the unique combination of a local community mutual aid network (united through a mobile Apps) and efficient remote monitoring equipment delivered to and configured at your home or company by our technicians. This approach combining a social link with technology puts members of the community in contact with each other, in order to assuage any doubts and assist other members in the event of an intrusion, physical damage or harm to an individual, at your professional premises or your home.

Based on the idea of community, iCRAME brings together private individuals and professionals who want more than mere alerts sent by a remote monitoring firm in the event of an intrusion or physical damage, and seek actual assistance on site – all with no hidden costs and the assurance of total trust. Thanks to iCRAME and its local mutual aid network, members of the community can rapidly set their minds at rest (if no risk exists) or receive assistance if there is a real problem, particularly when they are far from their home, holiday home or professional premises.


The members of the community are in direct contact via the iCRAME mobile App and can help each other out:

  • confirming and speeding up the intervention of the police
  • waiting for a locksmith
  • checking if any damage has occurred after a storm

The whole system is reliable, thanks to the cameras that all members of the iCRAME community are equipped with: an essential tool that makes it possible to confirm whether action is necessary.

How does it work?

Each member of the community (or iCRAMer) acquires at least one camera – a gauge of their good faith, and the cornerstone of trust between the community members – and downloads the ICRAME Mobile App, which they obtain in order to join the community.

In the event of intrusion, physical damage or harm to an individual, the community member receives an alert about the situation on their smartphone and checks whether action is needed, thanks to the remote monitoring camera.



Still using their mobile app, he or she then geolocates community members available to take action on site. After checking with a "Helper"(a person who helps another member) that they can take action, the member explains what to do, and is then kept informed of the situation in real time.

From the application the Helper can start the report following a shake list according to the procedure by adding photos to support. This report will be able to be used to complete the statement to the insurance and also for filing a complaint.



Once the action has been completed, the "Applicant" (the person who calls on a community member) thank the Helpeur by offering him gifts credit that it can use on our affiliate partners web sites.

For example:

David receives an alert about a break-in at his shop while he is on holiday 300 km away.

> David starts out by checking that there really has been a break-in by means of the surveillance camera.Then, using the mobile app, he seeks out an available Helper to wait for the police.

> Véronique is available.

> He contacts her and gives her comprehensive instructions.

 > Véronique goes to the shop and waits for the police, who have been contacted by David and/or Véronique. She is present to help them in their work, and reports back to David in real time with photos to illustrate what is happening.

David is very satisfied with Véronique's help, and gives her a gift via the iCRAME app.

Why iCRAME?

Remote monitoring has become a tool increasingly used by both private individuals and professionals to carry out remote surveillance on homes and commercial premises.

Although the principle looks attractive on paper, when it comes to the practical side, it is sometimes complex for security firms to travel to a site, and the actual problem is only rarely dealt with by the security firm itself (or only at considerable cost, which is often hidden).

Thanks to iCRAME and its mutual assistance network, the members of the community are certain to have a local, trustworthy contact person to assist the professionals (while keeping in touch with the Applicant) who need to take action at the house or commercial premises.

iCRAMers thus have the assurance that someone can report to them in real time about what is going on, and above all make it possible to shorten the intervention period of professional teams (who have been previously approved).


Who is iCRAME intended for?

iCRAME is a solution designed for private individuals and professionals alike, who wish to make use of powerful video monitoring technologies while ensuring that someone trustworthy is present on site, who can help to speed up procedures and interventions by professionals (locksmiths, firemen, police, etc.).

This applies to principal homes, holiday residences and professional premises alike.


What advantages does it bring me?

iCRAME means essential services


The icrame offer

The iCRAME offer is based on two inseparable elements which make this approach a reliable, simple and economic solution.

ICRAME App

The platform for putting community members in touch
The iCRAME App is a technical technological platform enabling iCRAMErs to get in touch with and mutually help each other. It puts all the members of the community in contact with each other and geo-locates available Helpers.
The iCRAME App can be downloaded from the Apple and Google Android stores, and is the essential complement to the iCRAME Camera video monitoring equipment. Membership of the iCRAME mutual aid network and the use of the platform are included in the rental contract of the iCRAME camera(s).



ICRAME Cameras

Technological remote monitoring solutions

iCRAME offers several camera models, which are all far more sophisticated than simple cameras.

The first connected object, the camera not only monitors and obtains images but also makes it possible to exchange (listen and speak), detect individuals and share happy moments at a distance.

All our cameras have the following features:

  • Simple installation and configuration
  • Recording of indoor camera images on a 32 GB SD card
  • Indoor cameras that can be remotely piloted
  • An impeccable design
  • Different functions and models depending on their use (a professional range and a private individual range, indoor and outdoor models),
  • Alerts in real time on your smartphone,
  • Excellent value for money.

Our cameras for private individuals 

iCRAMers' cameras are on offer at a particularly economical rental rate which includes maintenance and standard exchange in the event of a breakdown.


Our cameras for professionals





Associated services

Depending on the formula proposed, we offer our clients:

  • An installation and configuration service on site everywhere in France, and shortly in every country where we have branches.
  • Shipping and a telephone helpline for iCRAMErs who wish to install the cameras themselves
  • A maintenance service enabling rapid replacement of equipment in the event of a breakdown

Why crowdfunding?

We believe strongly in our concept and thanks to your support, we wish to rapidly analyse the impact and relevance of our iCRAME solution while starting the rapid set-up of the community network.

This is because it is important for us to federate a mutually beneficial international community around this project via the platform IndieGoGo, because working directly with you will also enable us to improve our solution and make it a truly indispensable tool.




Share and spread the word about our project on the social networks

And above all, please share this page and all the publications we provide on our website via the social networks.



FAQ

Read

Mise en page Solène Curtius / Graphiste Webdesigner
story_txt:
Version en Anglais / English part
Welcome to our new International partners. Be part of this amazing iCRAME new security services in your country.

 

iCRAME
Qu’est-ce que c’est ?

Une association unique entre un réseau d’entraide communautaire de proximité et des équipements de vidéosurveillance performants et connectés.
Ce qui fait l’originalité d’iCRAME, c’est avant tout l’association unique d’un réseau d’entraide communautaire de proximité - fédéré autour d’une Application mobile - et de matériels de vidéo surveillance performant livré et paramétré chez vous ou dans votre entreprise par nos techniciens. 
Cette approche qui allie lien social et technologie permet de mettre en relation les membres de la communauté afin de lever un doute et d’assister les membres de la communauté en cas d’intrusion, de dégâts matériels ou d’atteinte à la personne, dans vos locaux professionnels ou dans votre habitation.
Reposant sur la notion de communauté, iCRAME fédère les particuliers et professionnels qui ne veulent pas se contenter d’être simplement alertés par une société de télésurveillance en cas d’intrusion ou de dégâts matériels et qui, au contraire, souhaitent disposer d’une assistance sur place, le tout sans coût caché et en toute confiance.


Grâce à iCRAME et son réseau local d’entraide, les membres de la communauté peuvent, très rapidement, lever le doute (s’il n’existe aucun risque) ou être assistés en cas de réel problème, en particulier lorsqu’ils sont éloignés de leur domicile, de leur résidence de vacances ou de leurs locaux professionnels.
Les membres de la communauté sont en contact direct via l’App mobile iCRAME et s’assistent pour valider et accélérer :

L’intervention des forces de l’ordre
Attendre le serrurier
Vérifier s’il y a des dégâts après un orage ou une fuite d’eau


Le tout en toute confiance grâce aux caméras dont sont équipés tous les membres de la communauté iCRAME, un outil indispensable qui permet de valider le bien-fondé d’une intervention.

Comment ça marche ?

Chaque membre de la communauté  (ou iCRAMeur) s’équipe d’au moins une caméra - gage de sa bonne foi et pierre angulaire de la confiance entre membres de la communauté – et télécharge l’App Mobile ICRAME sur laquelle il s’inscrit afin d’adhérer à la communauté.
Malheureusement cela vous est arrivé ! Vous avez été
cambriolé alors que vous n’étiez pas à votre domicile… Votre caméra iCRAME vous
a alerté mais que faire ?


En cas d’intrusion, de dégâts matériels ou d’atteinte à la personne, le membre de la communauté est alerté sur son smartphone de la situation et vérifie le bien-fondé d’une intervention, grâce à la caméra de télésurveillance.


Il géolocalise ensuite, toujours grâce à son application mobile, les membres de la communauté qui sont disponibles pour intervenir sur site. Après avoir validé avec un « Helpeur » (personne qui intervient pour aider un membre de la communauté) qu’il peut intervenir, il lui explique comment intervenir puis est tenu informé en temps réel de la situation.
À partir de l'application, le Helpeur peut commencer son rapport en suivant une shake list en fonction de l'intervention, en y ajoutant les photos à l'appui. Ce rapport pourra être utilisé pour compléter la déclaration à l'assurance et aussi pour le dépôt de plainte. 

Une fois l’intervention terminée, le « Demandeur » (personne qui fait appel à un membre de la communauté) remercie le Helpeur en lui offrant des crédits cadeaux, qu'il pourra utiliser sur les sites de nos partenaires affiliés. 

Prenons un exemple :
David reçoit une alerte lui signalant une intrusion dans son commerce alors qu’il est en vacances à 300 kms de là.> David commence par vérifier, grâce à la caméra de surveillance, qu’il y a bien eu intrusion. Il cherche via l’application mobile, un Helpeur disponible pour attendre la police
> Véronique est disponible.

> Il la
contacte et lui donne toutes les instructions.


> Véronique se rend sur place et attend l’arrivée des forces de l’ordre qui ont été contactés par David ou/et Véronique. Elle est présente pour les assister dans leur travail et rendre compte, en temps réel, à David de la situation avec des photos à l’appui.


David très satisfait de l’aide de Véronique lui offre un cadeau via l’application iCRAME.



Pourquoi iCRAME ?
La télésurveillance est devenue un outil de plus en plus utilisé par les particuliers comme par les professionnels pour assurer la surveillance des habitations et locaux commerciaux.
Bien que le principe soit séduisant sur le papier, dans les faits, le déplacement des entreprises de sécurité sur place est souvent plus complexe à mettre en œuvre et le traitement en lui-même du problème rencontré, n’est que rarement pris en charge par la société de sécurité (ou moyennant des frais importants et souvent cachés).
Grâce à iCRAME et son réseau solidaire, les membres de la communauté sont sûrs d’avoir un relais local de confiance pour assister les professionnels (tout en étant en relation avec le Demandeur) qui devront intervenir dans l’habitation ou le local commercial.
L’iCRAMeur peut ainsi avoir l’assurance que quelqu’un peut lui rendre compte, en temps réel, de ce qui se passe, et surtout permettre de réduire les temps d’intervention des équipes de professionnels (préalablement référencés) 


Pour qui ?
iCRAME est une solution qui s’adresse aux particuliers comme aux professionnels qui souhaitent bénéficier de la puissance des technologies de vidéo surveillance  tout en s’assurant qu’une personne de confiance peut sur place, les aider à accélérer les démarches et les interventions des professionnels (serruriers, pompiers, forces de police, etc.).
Cela concerne aussi bien les résidences principales que les résidences de vacances ou encore les locaux professionnels.


Qu’est-ce que ça m’apporte ?
iCRAME des services indispensables



L'offre
L’offre iCRAME s’articule autour de deux éléments indissociables qui font de cette approche une solution fiable, simple et économique







ICRAME App
La plate-forme de mise en relation des membres de la communautéiCRAME APP est la plate-forme technologique permettant aux iCRAMeurs d’entrer en contact et de s’entraider. Elle met en relation l’ensemble des membres de la communauté et géolocalise les Helpeurs disponibles.
Téléchargeable à partir de l’Apple Store et de Google Android, iCRAME APP est le complément indispensable de l’équipement de vidéo surveillance iCRAME Camera. La souscription au réseau d’entraide iCRAME et l’utilisation de la plate-forme sont incluses dans le contrat de location de la (ou des) iCRAME caméra(s).

ICRAME Caméras
Les solutions technologiques de télésurveillance

Premier objet connecté, la caméra permet à la fois de surveiller et d’obtenir des images mais aussi d’échanger (écouter et parler), de détecter des individus, de partager de bons moments à distance…


Toutes nos
caméras proposent :

Simplicité d’installation et de paramétrage,
Sauvegarde des images des caméras intérieures sur cate SD 32gb
Caméra intérieure pilotable à distance via PC, Smartphone et tablette

Un design irréprochable,
Des fonctionnalités et des modèles différents en fonction de leur utilisation (gamme Professionnels et gamme Particuliers, modèle intérieur et extérieur),
Des alertes en temps réel sur votre smartphone,
Un excellent rapport qualité/prix.

de leurs besoins.
Les caméras sont proposées à un tarif de location particulièrement 
économique qui comprend la maintenance et l’échange standard en cas de 
panne.

souhaitent nous soutenir de bénéficier d’un tarif spécial de lancement afin de
passer très rapidement des précommandes (contreparties) et fédérer notre réseau
communautaire. Grâce à vous, nous développons notre réseau communautaire, vous
bénéficiez rapidement de tous les avantages de notre solution et participez à
son développement technique et commercial.



Financez : Un soutien plus classique


Vous pouvez également nous soutenir avec un versement
minimum de 2 euros. Vous serez informé régulièrement de notre déploiement et
des avancées de notre projet. Le montant versé pourra également être déduit de
votre future commande si vous souhaitez, vous aussi, faire partie de la
communauté iCRAME.


Nous nous adressons aujourd’hui au territoire
français mais envisageons très rapidement de nous déployer dans d’autre pays
européens. Nos pays cibles à 6 mois sont : l’Espagne, le Portugal, le
Royaume-Uni, la Suisse, la Belgique, l’Allemagne, l’Italie, l’Autriche, les
Pays-Bas, USA, Brésil. Dès à présent, vous pouvez nous apporter votre soutien pour chacun de
ces pays avec une contribution à partir de 2€.
Nous vous informerons en avant-première de
notre déploiement à l’international et
votre contribution sera alors déduite de votre futur abonnement lors de notre
implantation dans votre pays.



Partagez : faites connaitre notre projet sur les réseaux sociaux


Et surtout n’hésitez pas à partager cette page et toutes les
publications que nous proposons sur notre site web via les réseaux sociaux.




Mieux que cela, d’ici quelques mois, la solution iCRAME
intègrera une solution innovante qui permettra, dans certains cas, de fournir
des informations aux forces de l’ordre pour mener leur enquête et identifier le
coupable. Ce dont nous avons tous envie lorsqu’on a été victime d’un
cambriolage.

FAQ

Consulter 




(*) Voir conditions sur notre site web  www.icrame.com




ENGLISH PART

Seeking international partnerships

iCRAME decided to expand its network on an international scale via various partners, and is now seeking motivated investors with or without experience in security. If you have genuine skills as a developer and are inspired by the new revolution represented by participatory economics, why not join us and show us your motivation through an initial contribution? We only accept one partner per country and per state (for example, in the USA). To find out if a country is available, send us an email before making your contribution contact@icrame.com. 
How can you help us?
If you find our iCRAME appealing, you can help us as regards future deployment in your country.

We are now focusing on France, but we are considering deploying our 
services rapidly in other countries. Our target countries in 
the next six months are Spain, Portugal, the UK, Switzerland, Belgium, 
Germany, Italy, Austria,the Netherlands. USA and Brazil. From now you can 
provide support for each of these countries and more with a contribution starting
 at 2€. 

We will inform you well in advance of our deployment on the 
international stage, and your contribution will then be deducted from 
your future subscription when we have established ourselves in your 
country. 
If your country of residence is not mentioned, feel free to support us 
all the same, because that will be a further reason for us to set up our
 solution. 
 Share: spread the word about our project on the social networks
And above all, feel free to share this page and all the publications we put on our website via the social networks.  



What is iCRAME?

A unique combination combining a local community mutual aid network and highly efficient connected video monitoring equipment.

What makes ’iCRAME so original is that it is first and foremost the unique combination of a local community mutual aid network (united through a mobile Apps) and efficient remote monitoring equipment delivered to and configured at your home or company by our technicians. 
This approach combining a social link with technology puts members of the community in contact with each other, in order to assuage any doubts and assist other members in the event of an intrusion, physical damage or harm to an individual, at your professional premises or your home.


Based on the idea of community, iCRAME brings together private individuals and professionals who want more than mere alerts sent by a remote monitoring firm in the event of an intrusion or physical damage, and seek actual assistance on site – all with no hidden costs and the assurance of total trust.
Thanks to iCRAME and its local mutual aid network, members of the community can rapidly set their minds at rest (if no risk exists) or receive assistance if there is a real problem, particularly when they are far from their home, holiday home or professional premises.


The members of the community are in direct contact via the iCRAME mobile App and can help each other out:
confirming and speeding up the intervention of the police
waiting for a locksmith
checking if any damage has occurred after a storm



The whole system is reliable, thanks to the cameras that all members of the iCRAME community are equipped with: an essential tool that makes it possible to confirm whether action is necessary.
How does it work?

Each member of the community (or iCRAMer) acquires at least one camera – a gauge of their good faith, and the cornerstone of trust between the community members – and downloads the ICRAME Mobile App, which they obtain in order to join the community.

In the event of intrusion, physical damage or harm to an individual, the community member receives an alert about the situation on their smartphone and checks whether action is needed, thanks to the remote monitoring camera.
Still using their mobile app, he or she then geolocates community members available to take action on site. After checking with a "Helper"(a person who helps another member) that they can take action, the member explains what to do, and is then kept informed of the situation in real time.From the application the Helper can start the report following a shake list according to the procedure by adding photos to support. This report will be able to be used to complete the statement to the insurance and also for filing a complaint.
Once the action has been completed, the "Applicant" (the person who calls on a community member) thank the Helpeur by offering him gifts credit that it can use on our affiliate partners web sites.For example: 
David receives an alert about a break-in at his shop while he is on holiday 300 km away.> David starts out by checking that there really has been a break-in by means of the surveillance camera.Then, using the mobile app, he seeks out an available Helper to wait for the police.
> Véronique is available.
> He contacts her and gives her comprehensive instructions. > Véronique goes to the shop and waits for the police, who have been contacted by David and/or Véronique. She is present to help them in their work, and reports back to David in real time with photos to illustrate what is happening.David is very satisfied with Véronique's help, and gives her a gift via the iCRAME app.

Why iCRAME?
Remote monitoring has become a tool increasingly used by both private individuals and professionals to carry out remote surveillance on homes and commercial premises.
Although the principle looks attractive on paper, when it comes to the practical side, it is sometimes complex for security firms to travel to a site, and the actual problem is only rarely dealt with by the security firm itself (or only at considerable cost, which is often hidden). 
Thanks to iCRAME and its mutual assistance network, the members of the community are certain to have a local, trustworthy contact person to assist the professionals (while keeping in touch with the Applicant) who need to take action at the house or commercial premises.
iCRAMers thus have the assurance that someone can report to them in real time about what is going on, and above all make it possible to shorten the intervention period of professional teams (who have been previously approved). 


Who is iCRAME intended for?
iCRAME is a solution designed for private individuals and professionals alike, who wish to make use of powerful video monitoring technologies while ensuring that someone trustworthy is present on site, who can help to speed up procedures and interventions by professionals (locksmiths, firemen, police, etc.).
This applies to principal homes, holiday residences and professional premises alike.

What advantages does it bring me?
 iCRAME means essential services 

The icrame offer
The iCRAME offer is based on two inseparable elements which make this approach a reliable, simple and economic solution.





ICRAME App
The platform for putting community members in touchThe iCRAME App is a technical technological platform enabling iCRAMErs to get in touch with and mutually help each other. It puts all the members of the community in contact with each other and geo-locates available Helpers.
The iCRAME App can be downloaded from the Apple and Google Android stores, and is the essential complement to the iCRAME Camera video monitoring equipment. Membership of the iCRAME mutual aid network and the use of the platform are included in the rental contract of the iCRAME camera(s).  


ICRAME Cameras
Technological remote monitoring solutions

iCRAME offers several camera models, which are all far more sophisticated than simple cameras.
The first connected object, the camera not only monitors and obtains images but also makes it possible to exchange (listen and speak), detect individuals and share happy moments at a distance.


All our cameras have the following features:

Simple installation and configuration
Recording of indoor camera images on a 32 GB SD card
Indoor cameras that can be remotely piloted  

An impeccable design 
Different functions and models depending on their use (a professional range and a private individual range, indoor and outdoor models),
Alerts in real time on your smartphone,
Excellent value for money.


Our cameras for private
individuals  




iCRAMers' cameras are on offer at a particularly economical rental rate 
which includes maintenance and standard exchange in the event of a 
breakdown.
Our cameras for
professionals




Associated
services 


Depending
on the formula proposed, we offer our clients:



An
installation and configuration service on site everywhere in France, and shortly
in every country where we have branches.

Shipping and a telephone helpline for iCRAMErs who wish to install the cameras themselves
A maintenance service enabling rapid replacement of equipment in the event of a breakdown




Why crowdfunding?
We believe strongly in our concept and thanks to your support, we wish to rapidly analyse the impact and relevance of our iCRAME solution while starting the rapid set-up of the community network.

This is because it is important for us to federate a mutually beneficial international community around this project via the platform IndieGoGo, because working directly with you will also enable us to improve our solution and make it a truly indispensable tool.

Share and spread the word about our project on the social networks
And above all, please share this page and all the publications we provide on our website via the social networks.


FAQ
Read 


Mise en page Solène Curtius / Graphiste Webdesigner

story:
What is Camp Ilan

Every year, ILAN volunteers organize summer camps for physically challenged children in rural surroundings all over the country. This project offers entertainment during the long summer vacation to several hundreds of children and youth every year.

Various communities volunteer to host the children for a whole week of sleep-in camps, with full accommodation, all inclusive. During this week, the children have the rare opportunity to enjoy a wide variety of activities, such as sports, swimming pool, horseback riding and more, all accessible to the disabled. In addition, they are offered different activities like shows, workshops and trips.

These camps provide these children opportunities to socialize with their peers and to experience new encounters with young people. Even more importantly, a whole week of managing outside the family units is a significant contribution to their self confidence. Finally, not only the children look forward to these summer camps; their parents also eagerly anticipate the prospect of a short break from a daily demanding care.

What is Camp Ilan, Oranit

Camp Ilan, Oranit has been active for seven consecutive years. This will be our eighth year. The camp is run exclusively by volunteer high school students from our community in Oranit. As organizers of the camp, we are also responsible for raising the money to fund the camp.

What is our goal?

Our only goal is to make these children smile!

Who are we?

We are Israeli high school students from Oranit, who volunteer in the summer months to be counselors to both organize and run the summer camp. During this week, we bond with these children and maintain a long and lasting relationship with them beyond the summer experience. As counselors we take charge of all necessities, including, feeding, bathing and providing entertainment.

We would appreciate your help in funding us so we can make these wonderful and physically challenged children's dreams come true. 

We need your help make this camp happen.

story:
East Bay Blues Sevens Rugby Club


While competing against the best rugby clubs in USA Rugby, we are striving to win a national championship and give local East Bay athletes a stage to impress USA Eagles 7s selectors as they build a strong squad for the Rio 2016 Olympics and beyond.

We are unique in that we are a seven-a-side only rugby club, representing the entire East Bay of San Francisco, California.

Our squad is made up from exciting college athletes returning home for the summer, NorCal 15-a-side Division 1 clubs and rugby players who have learned the game at East Bay junior clubs like the Oakland Warthogs, Lamorinda, Pleasanton and Danville.

Over 3 weekend tournaments in July, we will play a series of frantic, high speed games only 14 minutes long to determine which rugby club represents NorCal in the National Championships.

We need your help.


What We Need

  • A tent to act as a clubhouse at our NorCal tournaments with your company logo.
  • Training equipment such as tackle suits, hit shields and more.
  • 50 Rugby balls with your company logo. (25 for the East Bay Blues, 25 for one of our junior clubs)
  • Hydration and recovery tools such as foam rollers, coolers, and water bottles.
  • Travel and tournament expenses.


What You Get

  • Website recognition on the Member's Page on www.eastbayblues.com
  • Snapback hats
  • Dry-FIT workout T-shirts
  • Hooded sweatshirts
  • Pint glasses
  • Social media exposure on facebook 
  • Business exposure on our clubhouse tent and/or playing jersey.

The Impact

Funding our campaign will allow local, homegrown East Bay men the opportunity to play at the highest level of American Rugby and showcase their skills for USA Eagles 7s selectors.

The East Bay is full of passionate sports fans and we want to create a powerful club that represents you in NorCal and on the national scene.


Other Ways You Can Help

  • Come out and support the East Bay's only Men's 7s Rugby Club on tournament day. Check www.eastbayblues.com for the updated schedule.
  • Share our links to facebook and other social media. Spread the East Bay love!
  • Like our page on facebook.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools.


East Bay All Day!


EIN 94 - 3289023

(as a non profit, all donations are tax deductible.)
