story:
Short Summary

MIND ∙ BODY ∙ RAW brings you Raw Wholefood Snack Bars just as nature intended but in a healthy, easy and convenient form for modern living.

From the careful selection of the ingredients to the precise blending of the wholefoods, our aim is to bring you healthy, handcrafted products that taste great and do not require any of the prepping and chopping associated with raw diets.

About This Campaign

Well I guess the first thing to explain is why and how we came up with this idea.


                                  


MIND ∙ BODY ∙ RAW is the brain child of Tony Anderson, a dynamic, results-driven professional  with over 15 years’ experience in sales, account management and business development across various sectors.

After a serious knee injury cut short a promising career in football in his 20s, Tony entered the recruitment industry where he quickly rose through the ranks to become branch manager, before turning his attention to business.

While working in recruitment, Tony had spotted a gap in the market for high-quality gifts aimed at the corporate market. He decided to set up his own exclusive gift business and began importing premium organic food and drink products from Europe into the UK.

The business grew quickly. Tony managed to secure a preferred supplier contract with British Airways (First Class), and built up an extensive portfolio of corporate and retail accounts with key clients such as Virgin Airlines, Waitrose and over 300 independent health food shops around the country.

In the first year of trading, Tony won first prize and was highly commended in the prestigious Organic Food Awards, presented by HRH The Prince of Wales.

As a former sports professional, Tony has always been passionate about organic food, health and wellness, and understands the importance of good nutrition. So when various food allergies forced him to cut out many of his favourite foods Tony turned to his partner, a vegetarian and keen advocate of yoga and natural nutrition for advice.

This led Tony on a journey to eating less meat and more raw plant-based wholefoods. Within weeks, many of his ailments vanished.

Tony tried to find healthy snacks to supplement his diet but to his dismay found that many of the snacks and cereal bars on the market that claimed to be healthy were actually far from it. Others were made up of just one or two wholefood ingredients and tasted too sweet, same-y or plain weird.

Out of frustration, Tony started making his own snack bars at home that he could take to work or to the gym. He used only raw, natural wholefoods and tested and tweaked his recipe until he found the right balance of wholesome ingredients that were satisfying, nutritious and tasted great. He shared his Raw Wholefood Snack Bars with family, friends and colleagues, and was amazed by their response.

                             

“Let food be thy medicine and medicine be thy food” ~ Hippocrates

On their urging, Tony decided to set up a new business venture and inspired by the Hippocrates quote above, called it MIND ∙ BODY ∙ RAW. 

Tony is committed to making his bars more widely available to other health and wellness enthusiasts across the UK. He has completed extensive research into the market and looked at all the current trends, competitors and market potential.  

The wholefood bars produced by MIND ∙ BODY ∙ RAW have been developed from Tony's own handcrafted recipe and use only raw wholefoods and natural ingredients.

We believe they are the best Raw Wholefood Snack Bars on the market. But it’s not just us. Everyone who has tried our bars has said the same thing!

As you can see, we have always been interested in eating well and living a healthy lifestyle, but had no idea how much of an impact raw food could have on our diet and our lives. You see we didn’t plan to start a raw wholefood business based on eating well, clean and healthy, but somehow that’s exactly what happened.

This campaign has been put together to raise funds for the development of the MIND ∙ BODY ∙ RAW brand and product range including our Raw Wholefood Snack Bars.

We have come up with a great range of products that provide all of the nutrient-dense qualities of raw food in a convenient modern day format - the snack bar - making it quick and easy for our customers to eat healthy.

By supporting this Crowdfunding campaign you will be helping us to develop our range of products, promote and market them and introduce a great range of truly healthy convenient Raw Wholefood Snack Bars to everyone in the UK.

A Little Bit About RAW Food:

Perhaps you've heard the term "raw food" already or maybe you've only just come across it, but are not sure what it means exactly.

A raw food vegan diet consists of unprocessed plant-based ideally organic wholefoods such as fruits, vegetables, nuts, seeds, and grains that are eaten cold or a little warm, as long as the temperature doesn't go above 46 degrees.

This temperature is generally accepted as the cut-off point beyond which vital nutrients and natural enzymes are destroyed by the cooking process. That’s why raw foods are also referred to as live or “living” foods.

                               

Our bodies need the enzymes found in these raw “living” foods because they aid digestion, help fight chronic disease like arthritis and diabetes, clear up headaches and allergies, improve your immunity and enhance your memory and ability to concentrate.

Since wholefoods are all naturally high in vitamins, minerals, fibre, and phytochemicals that are not zapped by heat, eating a wide variety of such foods on a regular basis can boost energy, increase the body’s ability to remove toxins, help burn calories, improve your complexion and assist with weight loss.

We all know that eating lots of fruit and vegetables is good for us but who has the time to shop, cut and prep wholefoods every day? While a full raw diet is not suitable or practical for everyone, we believe that each one of us can benefit by introducing more raw wholefoods into our daily diet.

And one of the easiest ways to do this is through our healthy Raw Wholefood Snack Bars.

Research and studies have shown that people are finally ready to embrace a healthy, raw, organic clean food lifestyle. This is not a fad or a diet, but a way of consuming food that serves the body well and keeps it healthy, strong and in balance.

According To Recent Studies:

  • 64% of men and 74% of women ‘really care about what they eat’ (HSCIC).
  • The cereal, energy and snack bars market is set to continue growing with forecast of 32% to £560 million by 2017 in the UK (Mintel).
  • Overall organic sales grew by over 1% in 2013 (Nielsen).
  • 98% of adults snack at home or work and 70% snack on-the-go (Mintel).
  • Healthy foods cost around 3 times as much as unhealthy foods (Cambridge University).

Based on this research we created our flagship product – Raw Wholefood Snack Bars – to fit into people’s lives and meet them at their point of need, a healthy live organic snack they can consume on the go, at work or play.  

About MIND ∙ BODY ∙ RAW

MIND ∙ BODY ∙ RAW combines an incredible array of raw fruits, nuts, seeds, grains and oils – all natural ingredients and wholefood goodness – and nothing else!

The wholefoods undergo a unique natural air drying process at low temperatures that maintains nutrients at their peak level. This makes MIND ∙ BODY ∙ RAW an incredibly nutritious food that gives your body the widest variety of nutrients it needs on a daily basis.

Handcrafted in small batches, MIND ∙ BODY ∙ RAW is produced to the highest standards using the finest raw ingredients that are organic where possible, otherwise pesticide and GMO-free.

Our Raw Wholefood Snack Bars are convenient, nutrient-dense great tasting snacks that everyone can enjoy for breakfast, lunch, as an energy bar on-the-go or in place of a meal on days when you’ve overindulged – without sacrificing taste or your health.

We know that healthy snacking improves overall health in the following ways:

  • Curbs Cravings
  • Fights Weight Gain 
  • Regulates Mood 
  • Boosts Brain Power
  • Provides Energy

Resisting the urge for fast foods, sweets, biscuits, chocolate or crisps when you're hit with a snack attack can make a big difference to a person’s health.

Our Raw Wholefood Snack Bars have been developed to provide the following:

  • 5 healthy, nutritious and tasty flavours; original, blueberry, chocolate, banana and strawberry
  • Premium 50g raw, unprocessed snack bars made in the UK with passion, care and a commitment to health and vitality
  • Made from wholefoods bursting with vitamins, minerals and essential nutrients
  • Nutrient-dense, healthy, incredibly tasty and no added sugar
  • Completely free of additives, preservatives and other toxic ingredients
  • A 100% natural and Free-From food that is raw, non-GM, soya-free, dairy-free, wheat-free, gluten-free, as well as organic and certified Fairtrade
  • Suitable for vegetarians and vegans

Check out our supporters perks to the above right to try our Raw Wholefood Snack Bars in any of the five flavours available.

OUR GOAL IS TO RAISE £15,000

This will help us to bring MIND ∙ BODY ∙ RAW ~ wholefood goodness in a bar to a retailer near you and online.

The funds raised will be broken down and used for the following:

1.  Create ecommerce website to sell direct to consumers

2.  Send samples to media and industry contacts  

3.  Set up marketing, PR and advertising campaign to raise market awareness

4.  Secure retail orders for initial production via UK manufacturer 

Please support our campaign as we go forward into this new venture, it’s a little frightening but so exhilarating at the same time.

Please share our campaign on social media and with all of your foodie friends, healthy eaters and of course raw foodists.

Tell everyone you know about MIND ∙ BODY ∙ RAW ~ wholefood goodness in a bar and remember to contribute!

Check out our supporter’s rewards on the above right to be inspired and to learn of the many ways you can support us.

THE IMPACT

By launching our campaign successfully, we will become a leading light in the fight against obesity, poor diet and unhealthy eating and heart disease. As the world becomes more and more unwell one of the leading factors is a poor diet. 

                             

For many years we have all been led to believe that a variety of factors have been the cause but we have never really been told the truth about the positive impact of eating raw foods until now.

The struggle to eat healthy and find healthy snacks that taste great, are genuinely good for you and come in a convenient format are challenges faced by many people every day.

We plan to address this need by introducing our Raw Wholefood Snack Bars as a convenient healthy solution.

We know that this is just the tip of the iceberg, so to speak, however this is a significant step in the healthy eating revolution.

  • Every contributor will have the opportunity to experience delicious Raw Wholefood Snack Bars in a variety of flavours
  • This campaign and the promotion of our Raw Wholefood Snack Bars will educate people on the benefits of snacking healthily in order to manage calorie intake and improve nutritious eating everyday
  • By launching this campaign successfully MIND ∙ BODY ∙ RAW will become a beacon of hope for many who are struggling with heart disease, obesity and a poor diet, by providing raw wholefood goodness in the form of a convenient snack

HOW YOU CAN HELP

MIND BODY RAW LTD is ready to launch. The figures have been crunched, the products have been tested and tasted and we are ready for business.

                      

We simply need your help, your support and your contributions to make our dream a reality.

We decided to launch a Crowdfunding campaign because we know it’s a great way to reach out to people who are keen followers of healthy eating, and raw food, and we know that this is an option for those who are looking for a simple and convenient way to introduce raw wholefoods to their diet.

We need all of you to get on board and help us out by sharing our message on social media sites, tell everyone you know about our plans, promote and make sure that you purchase our Raw Wholefood Snack Bars.

So support us by sharing, contributing and donating, MIND ∙ BODY ∙ RAW Crowdfunding campaign and help us to make this a real success.

By supporting this campaign you will receive perks to show our appreciation for getting involved. 

Backers are encouraged to keep contributing until the end of the campaign, as any additional funds will go towards a bigger marketing and production budget. 

We would like to thank every contributor and supporter of MIND ∙ BODY ∙ RAW

Remember to share the project via social media and for further information or to contact us about your perks, or for general information contact us via email.

Connect with us on Facebook and Twitter and learn about our journey to market!

Like us on Facebook: http://www.Facebook.com/MindBodyRaw

Follow us on Twitter: http://www.Twitter.com/MindBodyRaw

Use Hashtag: #MindBodyRaw

Subscribe to our newsletter to stay up to date and be the first to hear when we launch: http://www.MindBodyRaw.com

Email: Contact@MindBodyRaw.com

We look forward to connecting with you!

Tony won first prize and was highly commended in the prestigious Organic Food
Awards, presented by HRH The Prince of Wales.
As a former sports
professional, Tony has always been passionate about organic food, health and
wellness, and understands the importance of good nutrition. So when various
food allergies forced him to cut out many of his favourite foods Tony turned to
his partner, a vegetarian and keen advocate of yoga and natural nutrition for
advice. 
This led Tony on a journey to
eating less meat and more raw plant-based wholefoods. Within weeks, many of his
ailments vanished. 
Tony tried to find healthy
snacks to supplement his diet but to his dismay found that many of the snacks
and cereal bars on the market that claimed to be healthy were actually far from
it. Others were made up of just one or two wholefood ingredients and tasted too
sweet, same-y or plain weird.
Out of frustration, Tony started
making his own snack bars at home that he could take to work or to the gym. He
used only raw, natural wholefoods and tested and tweaked his recipe until he
found the right balance of wholesome ingredients that were satisfying,
nutritious and tasted great. He shared his Raw
Wholefood Snack Bars with family, friends and colleagues, and was
amazed by their response. 
                             “Let
food be thy medicine and medicine be thy food” ~ Hippocrates

On their urging, Tony decided
to set up a new business venture and
inspired by the Hippocrates quote above, called it MIND ∙ BODY ∙ RAW.  
Tony is committed to making his
bars more widely available to other health and wellness enthusiasts across the
UK. He has completed extensive research into the market and looked at all the
current trends, competitors and market potential.  
The wholefood bars produced
by MIND ∙ BODY ∙ RAW have been
developed from Tony's own handcrafted recipe and use only raw wholefoods and natural
ingredients. 
We believe they are the best Raw Wholefood Snack Bars on the market.
But it’s not just us. Everyone who has tried our bars has said the same thing!
As you can see, we have
always been interested in eating well and living a healthy lifestyle, but had
no idea how much of an impact raw food could have on our diet and our lives.
You see we didn’t plan to start a raw wholefood business based on eating well,
clean and healthy, but somehow that’s exactly what happened.This campaign has been put
together to raise funds for the development of the MIND ∙ BODY ∙ RAW brand and product range including our Raw Wholefood Snack Bars. 
We have come up with a great
range of products that provide all of the nutrient-dense qualities of raw food
in a convenient modern day format - the snack bar - making it quick and easy
for our customers to eat healthy. 
By supporting this
Crowdfunding campaign you will be helping us to develop our range of products,
promote and market them and introduce a great range of truly healthy convenient
Raw Wholefood Snack Bars to everyone
in the UK.
A Little Bit About RAW Food:
Perhaps you've heard the term
"raw food" already or maybe you've only just come across it, but are
not sure what it means exactly. 
A raw food vegan diet
consists of unprocessed plant-based ideally organic wholefoods such as fruits,
vegetables, nuts, seeds, and grains that are eaten cold or a little warm, as
long as the temperature doesn't go above 46 degrees. 
This temperature is generally
accepted as the cut-off point beyond which vital nutrients and natural enzymes
are destroyed by the cooking process. That’s why raw foods are also referred to
as live or “living” foods.
                               Our bodies need the enzymes
found in these raw “living” foods because they aid digestion, help fight
chronic disease like arthritis and diabetes, clear up headaches and allergies,
improve your immunity and enhance your memory and ability to concentrate. 
Since wholefoods are all
naturally high in vitamins, minerals, fibre, and phytochemicals that are not
zapped by heat, eating a wide variety of such foods on a regular basis can boost
energy, increase the body’s ability to remove toxins, help burn calories,
improve your complexion and assist with weight loss. 
We all know that eating lots
of fruit and vegetables is good for us but who has the time to shop, cut and
prep wholefoods every day? While a full raw diet is not suitable or practical
for everyone, we believe that each one of us can benefit by introducing more
raw wholefoods into our daily diet. 
And one of the easiest ways
to do this is through our healthy Raw
Wholefood Snack Bars.
Research and studies have
shown that people are finally ready to embrace a healthy, raw, organic clean
food lifestyle. This is not a fad or a diet, but a way of consuming food that
serves the body well and keeps it healthy, strong and in balance. 
According To Recent Studies:


64% of men and 74% of women ‘really care about what
they eat’ (HSCIC).


The cereal, energy and snack bars market is set to
continue growing with forecast of 32% to £560 million by 2017 in the UK
(Mintel).


Overall organic sales grew by over 1% in 2013
(Nielsen).


98% of adults snack at home or work and 70% snack
on-the-go (Mintel).


Healthy foods cost around 3 times as much as unhealthy
foods (Cambridge University).


Based on this research we
created our flagship product – Raw
Wholefood Snack Bars – to fit into people’s lives and meet them at their
point of need, a healthy live organic snack they can consume on the go, at work
or play.  
About MIND ∙ BODY ∙ RAW
MIND ∙ BODY ∙ RAW combines an incredible array of raw fruits, nuts, seeds, grains and
oils – all natural ingredients and wholefood goodness – and nothing else!
The wholefoods undergo a
unique natural air drying process at low temperatures that maintains nutrients
at their peak level. This makes MIND ∙
BODY ∙ RAW an incredibly nutritious food that gives your body the widest
variety of nutrients it needs on a daily basis.
Handcrafted in small batches,
MIND ∙ BODY ∙ RAW is produced to the
highest standards using the finest raw ingredients that are organic where
possible, otherwise pesticide and GMO-free. 
Our Raw Wholefood Snack Bars are convenient, nutrient-dense great
tasting snacks that everyone can enjoy for breakfast, lunch, as an energy bar
on-the-go or in place of a meal on days when you’ve overindulged – without
sacrificing taste or your health. 
We know that healthy snacking
improves overall health in the following ways:


Curbs Cravings


Fights Weight Gain 


Regulates Mood 


Boosts Brain Power


Provides
Energy


Resisting the urge for fast
foods, sweets, biscuits, chocolate or crisps when you're hit with a snack
attack can make a big difference to a person’s health.Our Raw Wholefood Snack Bars have been developed to provide the
following:


5 healthy, nutritious and tasty flavours; original,
blueberry, chocolate, banana and strawberry


Premium 50g raw, unprocessed snack bars made in the UK
with passion, care and a commitment to health and vitality


Made from wholefoods bursting with vitamins, minerals
and essential nutrients


Nutrient-dense, healthy, incredibly tasty and no added
sugar


Completely free of additives, preservatives and other
toxic ingredients


A 100% natural and Free-From food that is raw, non-GM,
soya-free, dairy-free, wheat-free, gluten-free, as well as organic and
certified Fairtrade


Suitable for vegetarians and vegans


Check out our supporters perks
to the above right to try our Raw Wholefood Snack
Bars in any of the five flavours available.
OUR GOAL IS TO RAISE £15,000
This will help us to bring MIND ∙ BODY ∙ RAW ~ wholefood goodness in
a bar to a retailer near you and online. 
The funds raised will be
broken down and used for the following:
1. 
Create ecommerce
website to sell direct to consumers
2. 
Send samples to
media and industry contacts  
3. 
Set up marketing,
PR and advertising campaign to raise market awareness 
4. 
Secure retail orders
for initial production via UK manufacturer 

Please support our campaign
as we go forward into this new venture, it’s a little frightening but so
exhilarating at the same time. 
Please share our campaign on
social media and with all of your foodie friends, healthy eaters and of course raw
foodists.
Tell everyone you know about MIND ∙ BODY ∙ RAW ~ wholefood goodness in a bar and remember to contribute!
Check out our supporter’s
rewards on the above right to be inspired and to learn of the many ways you can
support us. 
THE IMPACT
By launching our campaign
successfully, we will become a leading light in the fight against obesity, poor
diet and unhealthy eating and heart disease. As the world becomes more and more
unwell one of the leading factors is a poor diet.                              For many years we have all
been led to believe that a variety of factors have been the cause but we have
never really been told the truth about the positive impact of eating raw foods
until now.
The struggle to eat healthy and
find healthy snacks that taste great, are genuinely good for you and come in a
convenient format are challenges faced by many people every day. 
We plan to address this need by
introducing our Raw Wholefood Snack Bars
as a convenient healthy solution. 
We know that this is just the
tip of the iceberg, so to speak, however this is a significant step in the
healthy eating revolution. 


Every contributor will have the opportunity to
experience delicious Raw Wholefood Snack
Bars in a variety of flavours


This campaign and the promotion of our Raw Wholefood Snack Bars will educate
people on the benefits of snacking healthily in order to manage calorie intake
and improve nutritious eating everyday


By launching this campaign successfully MIND ∙ BODY ∙ RAW will become a beacon
of hope for many who are struggling with heart disease, obesity and a poor
diet, by providing raw wholefood goodness in the form of a convenient snack


HOW YOU CAN HELP
MIND BODY RAW LTD is ready to launch. The figures have been crunched, the products have
been tested and tasted and we are ready for business.                       We simply need your help,
your support and your contributions to make our dream a reality. 
We decided to launch a
Crowdfunding campaign because we know it’s a great way to reach out to people
who are keen followers of healthy eating, and raw food, and we know that this
is an option for those who are looking for a simple and convenient way to
introduce raw wholefoods to their diet.
We need all of you to get on
board and help us out by sharing our message on social media sites, tell
everyone you know about our plans, promote and make sure that you purchase our Raw Wholefood Snack Bars.
So support us by sharing,
contributing and donating, MIND ∙ BODY ∙
RAW Crowdfunding campaign and help us to make this a real success.
By supporting this campaign
you will receive perks to show our appreciation for getting involved. Backers are encouraged to
keep contributing until the end of the campaign, as any additional funds will
go towards a bigger marketing and production budget. We would like to thank every
contributor and supporter of MIND ∙ BODY
∙ RAW
Remember to share the project
via social media and for further information or to contact us about your perks,
or for general information contact us via email.
Connect with us on Facebook and Twitter and learn about our journey to market!
Like us on Facebook: http://www.Facebook.com/MindBodyRaw
Follow us on Twitter: http://www.Twitter.com/MindBodyRaw
Use Hashtag: #MindBodyRaw
Subscribe to our newsletter to stay up to date and be the first to hear when we launch: http://www.MindBodyRaw.com
Email: Contact@MindBodyRaw.com
We look forward to connecting with you!

story:
On New Years day morning of 2014, I was awakened to a vision from God to start a wellness company that would primarily focus on the empowering communities with the tools of health, fitness and overall wellness.  The MARK Total Body Wellness Network is a catalyst of change for those who are stuck in a sedentary lifestyle or struggle with obesity.  Being well in one's mind, body, soul and spirit is essential to being all that God created us to be.

Over the past year The MARK has helped transformed many lives with our innovative approach to weight management, exercise and overall wellness using biblical principles.  Our partnerships with churches and non-profit organizations in our communities has given us access to hundreds of men, women and children in need of dire change.  2014 focused on serving and relationship building.

2015 is the year of branding and expanding territory.  At the start of this year our logo was created as a statement of professionalism and marketability.  It has been a steady growth ever since.  The presence of our social media pages on FaceBook and Instagram has made the MARK accessible not only locally but as a possible global expansion.  The most equip way to expand is through an interactive website that would expand our clientele with state of the art on-line services such as:
* Fitness Videos/Workouts (General and Specified)
* Nutrition Counseling
* Meal Planning
* Blogging and Devotionals and more
This interactive website will be a tool accessible not only those interested in the services offered but also to organizations and churches.  Another way to expand will be the hiring of contracted wellness coaches who will learn the systems in place and use them as a means of training their group of clientele rendered from the MARK.  The goal is to use these two components to expand the companies reach and effectively bring change to churches and communities at large.  One of the primary goals of funding will be to start gardens in our inner-cities.  We are currently working with organizations in our communities to make sure that families and their children connect with the land God has blessed us with.  As our clients get healthy and whole it is an objective of The MARK to get them involved in bringing change to our communities and the world at large.  The earth is the Lord's and the fullness thereof!!  

This is where help is needed.  The MARK is a growing company and completed funded by Whamae Boayue, CEO and the clients who have purchased packages and used services rendered.  A investment of $50-500 or more will help reach the initial fundraising goal of $6,000 to take care of current expenses associated with running the company so that further investments can be made to expand our territory.  We are grateful for whatever you can contribute to this worthy cause.  Thank you in advance!

story: Hello people, my house help Helen Mascarenhas has been diagnosed with cancer which is in its 3rd stage. She cannot afford the surgery expense . She needs to be operated asap or else her cancer would spread and doctors say it will be difficult to save her then. We need to collect funds for her surgery and post surgery therapy which includes chemo  and radiations. She is in a lot of pain and we apeal to all of you to pray for her and help us to generate funds for her. Please contribute and save her life. Even a small contribution will make a lot of difference. She will be operated at Kokilaben hospital Mumbai. Thank-you for your support. If you wish to know about her status , you can contact me on simple_kaul@yahoo.com

story:
You can help save a life for as little as $50!

Every year 45,000 people lose their lives in India due to untreated bites from venomous snakes.

Reasons? 
Lack of anti-venom, wrong or no first-aid and an age-old belief in black magic and faith healers to treat snakebites.

Most of these people work on farms where they come in contact with snakes on a daily basis. Majority of the victims are in the age group of 15-40 as they work on farms, sleep outside and are consistently exposed to unprotected environs which snakes inhabit. Many also get bitten inside their houses, since they aren’t completely secure, with multiple points of entry for snakes looking for food including windows, doors, rat holes and various other crevices.

Needless to say these sudden deaths especially in the income earning age group, render the family helpless often with no financial backup to supplement the loss of income. Forced to sell off their valuables, sometimes including cattle, poverty is a common for the families of the thousands of victims.


How do we help?

By making sure the anti-venom reaches the people who need it! Each vial is given at a special subsidized rate of $10 so that the not-for-profit medical centres, set up in parts of rural India catering to those who can’t access treatment in big hospitals, can use it for the victims of snake bites.

$5000 dollars = 500 anti-venom vials

One human life could be saved with approximately 5 vials

(The number of vials administered depends on various factors including the height, weight of the victim as well as the severity of symptoms)

Monsoon has already arrived in some parts of India and is expected to make their appearance all over the country by the end of July. More snakes tend to emerge during this season than any other, as they seek dry shelter increasing instances of conflict and bites. In Pithora, which is just one block of one district of Chhattisgarh, where we currently help a not for profit hospital  " Anjali  health care centre " which treat snakes bites and it is the only place in a radius of 80 kms where snake bite can be treated.  Since 2014 we are supporting the hospital  by equipping them with a ventilaor ( a much needed life support system in snake bite treatment ) , sending the doctor to participate in a snake bite workshop & establish a 24 x 7 support over phone by  snake bite treatment experts who will oversee the treatment.


We anticipate an average of 60-80 cases between July to October, out which at least 25 will require urgent medical attention due to venomous snake bites.

In addition to that block, we also aim to stock a minimum of 500 anti-venom vials across selected non-profit health care centres in rural India to make sure they ALWAYS have vials handy this monsoon, in case of emergencies.


What percentage of the target money goes to Indiansnakes.org for other purposes?  


Zero.      

All the money given will be used for procuring the anti-venom for the non-profit charity.

Any amount that we raise over $5000 will be used to make awareness material for the public, in regional languages, to educate people about snake bites and proper first aid, encouraging them to always go to the hospital and seek treatment.


Who are we and why are doing this?

About Indiansnakes:

·  Indiansnakes is a voluntary a group of committed young herpetologists (mostly snake experts) and conservationists from across India, working towards mitigating the snake bite deaths across the country. We also run the largest snake database of the country along with one of the biggest snake rescuer maps, plotting all rescuers across India.

·  More than 45000 people die of snake bites in India and we would like to replicate a successful working model to resolve this  problem across the country. Our aim is a 50% reduction in deaths in the next 5 years!

(Click to read the full technical report on  Snakebite Mortality in India: A Nationally Representative Mortality Survey )

·  By setting up about ten rural snake bite treatment centers in association with not-for-profit hospitals across India, we propose to set a cost effective and practical solution for snake bite deaths.

Indiansnakes vision: #ZeroSnakeBites

24x7 anti-venom  availability : Making sure that there is enough stock of anti-venom for the health care centres to never be caught without enough vials in hand to tackle any emergency, on any day, at any hour.

Capacity building workshops: To hold workshops with leaders of select villages. This includes but is not limited to school teachers, health workers, representatives from the educated youth, and members of local NGOs. The aim of the workshops will be to help them understand about snakes, snake bites and how essential medical treatment is especially incase of venomous snake bites.

Awareness: Sensitising the public and key authorities on proper first-aid procedures at the site and how the on-lookers can help in containing venom in a timely manner before the patient is taken to the hospital. They will also be taught how to avoid snake bites during monsoons which is generally the time of the year when maximum bites occur. Modes, depending on resources available, will include audio visuals (radio, powerpoint presentations), visuals (posters, banners) among other tried and test communication modules.

If you want to help us in a bigger way, please contact  savelives@indiansnakes.org

Your support is crucial in helping save thousands of lives across the country.

venom in a timely manner before the patient is taken to the hospital. They will

story:
My name is Nancy Novack. I am the editor and author of this anthology for those who are living with cancer.

My Passion, My Mission

Jul 14, 2015

  • 17views
  • 0Comments
  • Share on LinkedIn
  • Share on Facebook
  • Share on Google Plus
  • Share on Twitter

I am Nancy Novack, Founder and Director of Nancy’s List and Nancy’s Club. I am immensely grateful to everyone who generously supports our commitment to improve the quality of the lives of our many neighbors who are living with cancer and those who love and care for them.

My MISSION is very clear … and I am PASSIONATE! I want to make very certain that no one in the world is alone in the dark with cancer.

I survived a lethal cancer diagnosis (April 29, 2004, stage 4 ovarian metastasized into my liver) and my gratitude for my life is abundant. I know the fear, the desperate anxiety, the profound loneliness, how broken and breathless one can feel when one hears those words,”You have cancer.”

I created the anthology I Am with You: Love Letters to Cancer Patients with 46 authors who truly understood my vision because it was so obvious. You are alone and perhaps awake all night. Your loved ones have gone to their warm beds and you are likely in a very strange bed in a extremely strange hospital room and you have never ever ever felt so scared. And even though you may be surrounded by nurses waking you up to give you a sleeping pill or perhaps a loved one standing beside you holding your hand and wiping your brow, the questions and worries are heart-breaking … “Am I going to die?” “What part of me is dying?” “Why me?” “Why now?” “Please help me. Please. Tell me I am not going to die.”

On that sleepless night, and for many thereafter, I needed to connect with people who knew how to talk to me, who understood what I was freaking out about, who had been there, who had the same or worse fears, who knew ME … who just simply knew who I was in that moment. I didn’t need answers to my enormous questioning but I so needed to feel connected to kindred spirits. I so needed that.

I am PASSIONATE about getting our anthology into the hands of patients when they need our support the most … in my mind, the night of their diagnosis. Our book can mean so much. We offer connection. We offer our wisdom and love and relationship, and our pragmatic ways of coping with the shock and awe. That is when we are needed … desperately needed.

My magnificent community of writers truly understood that our audience ideally would be those men and women of all ages … and those who love them and would care for them … who had just experienced one of life’s most traumatic experiences. The writers gathered from all over this country and a lovely man from Ireland joined us. We shared the same intention. We had experienced the same experience. We knew that the book of essays needed to address that time when a newly-diagnosed patient faces her or his dramatically changed world.

We were joined by a mission … to make a difference.We share passion, determination, camaraderie, memories, frustration.
And we hold tight to our vision that we would have a balance … the number of men and women, the different diagnoses,
the single occurrence vs. the many recurrences, the children, the families, the caregivers. We knew what we were doing and we did it very well.

We completed the book and it was published a month before expected. We generously gave it to hospitals and oncologists and cancer organizations. We did sell a good number and we received fabulous feedback. I anticipated that cancer hospitals and oncologists would jump for joy when we published … that now they had something REAL to offer these patients rather than a wicked diagnosis … something that immediately could bring these frightened persons a compassionate hand and heart and, most importantly, connection to sisters and brothers who had ‘walked the cancer walk’.

However … as some of you have heard me vent … that is not the reality. After donating so many books to various hospitals, the response is “beautiful, powerful, great work” AND “We have no budget to care for the emotional needs of our patients.” Oh, we knew that already!!! That is why we wrote the book!

This small book means so much to me and to the authors and designers. Creating this book together taught me far more
about human beings and their capacity for love than I ever learned in kindergarten. Our book is a community ‘tour de force’ and I am very proud and honored to be in the same sentence as these remarkable courageous generous spirits.

I can’t be stopped when I have a passion. I am beginning a new approach … asking everyone I know and many I don’t know
to be very very sure that
NO ONE WILL EVER GO THROUGH CANCER ALONE.

I want your help. And I need it.

I want to take an author or two or ten and talk … radio, TV, cancer conferences, Oprah, whatever, and tell OUR story and why we care.

I invite people to donate to Nancy’s List so that I can donate books in their name … specifically to a doctor or hospital or infusion center or a nurse or whomever or whatever made a difference in their treatment. I want people to donate books in honor of a loved one’s recovery or in memory of the love they shared with a cancer patient. These books will be placed in the patients’ rooms the night of the diagnosis or in their new patient packets, in the infusion and radiation centers, in hospital libraries, the waiting rooms, in the oncologists’ offices.

Please send your contribution to
Nancy’s List
3421 Pecos Street, Unit 4,
Austin, Texas 78703.
I will gift books to the doctor or institution of your choice. All donations are tax deductible to the extent permitted by law. Nancy’s List is a non-profit 501©(3) foundation. Our tax ID number is 20-5899826.

I need your help in identifying pharmas, foundations, and ANYONE involved in the cancer world who will support our costs of publication.

I ask everyone who has been touched by the book (and I so appreciate all your beautiful feedback) to push it all over social media with these links for ordering throughAmazon http://www.amazon.com/Am-You-Letters-Cancer-Patients/dp/0985939974/ref=sr_1_1?s=books&ie=UTF8&qid=1436709359&sr=1-1&keywords=I+am+with+you or Book Passage(www.BookPassage.com). Book Passage is a wonderful independent bookstore in San Francisco and Corte Madera.

Please pay it forward. And hit Amazon and give them your review …

Who do you know? How can I contact with them or will you make an introduction? We could really use a fine publicist or PR person. Think about individuals (particularly ones who have had cancer and want to ‘give back’ to new patients), companies that make money off of cancer patients and ‘should’ give back, women’s and men’s philanthropic organizations,
GOOD people who appreciate what we have created.

I want to write more books … for the parents of children who are diagnosed for cancer, for teens and young adults. I need to resolve these issues so we can move forward.

I LOVE what we created together. I want everyone in the world to benefit from our splendid work.

My PASSION is set in my heart … I want to be very sure that no one walks in the dark with cancer. We can help. We do.

With so much love and gratitude,
Nancy Novack

I Am with You: Love Letters to Cancer Patients is an offering of friendship to sustain a newly diagnosed patient on the day he or she receives the diagnosis of cancer and throughout the journey, to support those who love and care for the patient. I am with you ... as are all of the 46 writers who have grappled with cancer themselves or alongside their loved ones. I Am with You is a book of hope, wisdom, wit, inspiration, compassion, and love. It is so good, so rich in detail and deep in feeling. Every essay speaks to the power of those simple exquisite words spoken to me by my oncologist, "I am with you."

With your generosity and collaboration, I will be able to donate books to the cancer healing centers around the world ...  so that this powerful helpful book can get into the hands of those who need it the most. 


What We Need & What You Get

The more funding, the more impact we can make. I am asking for $10,000. I can place 1,000 books into the hands of patients, the medical libraries, the waiting rooms, the infusion and radiation centers, and hopefully in the binders of newly diagnosed patients. 
And for you ... MY GRATITUDE! For every $100 you contribute, I will send you a personally inscribed copy. I will donate the books to the institution or oncologist or nurse practitioner or social worker of your choosing to distribute as you wish. 
Nancy's List is a 501(c)(3) organization and I will send you an acknowledgment letter for your tax purposes. 
I know I will reach my goal because this is such a valuable book and it is filled with love and hope. I will be able to offer as many books as I am able to fund. 

The Impact

As a clinical psychologist and, most importantly, as a survivor of a very lethal form of cancer (I am Stanford's poster child), I have had the honor to meet and consult with many many cancer patients and their loved ones. Because of my specific diagnosis and my miraculous recovery, I have worked with many women around the world with difficult challenges. The unfortunate part is that I have met these patients late in their treatment, sometimes too late, and our work together is more about dying than living. 
My goal with this book is to help patients, particularly newly-diagnosed patients, develop a relationship with their cancer early in the process, one that is based on hope, choices, truth, great coping strategies, community support, and love. Each essayist in the book has a section to share what helped her or him get "through the angst and agony" of having cancer. They offer very practical suggestions for coping with their traumas. I consider this to be one of the more profound parts of the anthology. 

I would like to share some of the reviews we have received ...
"I thought it might be worth noting that I read your book while standing several steps between the refrigerator and the kitchen counter. That is, I read nearly the entire book, standing in the middle of the kitchen, by the light above the sink. This is not exactly The New York Times Book Review, but probably a good sign nonetheless. It occurred to me that all of the stories are vividly, unmistakably about living. Your book isn't just for people facing cancer. It's for anyone facing life."

"I took my Warrior Mask off just long enough to read these courageous, inspiring essays in Nancy's book. We all need stories overflowing with wisdom, healing, hope and love. Thanks, Nancy, for the uplifting reminder of how precious life is and how tenacious we must be to preserve it. If there was a word stronger than BRILLIANT to describe this book, I would use it. I have tears of joy for these amazing fighters and for their willingness to share their stories with us. These stories shine on us the light we need to keep moving forward despite the odds. Do your friends a favor if they are fighting any kind of debilitating illness and send them a copy of this book NOW."


"I loved the book. A beautiful book and collaboration by so many cancer survivors, including me. I am honored to be a part of such a wonderful group of loving, caring strong people and their stories inspire me. The stories will bring tears, laughter, pride and thoughtfulness. We tell our stories not to bemoan the fact that we have or have had cancer (3 times for me), but that we are joyfully living our lives."


"I wish this was published when my mom was battling cancer. It's heartfelt, informative and a wonderful collection of love in regards to the horrible disease. Thank you!"


"No amount of data moves us like a personal story can! These honest, open-hearted stories from those who have been there help in a way nothing else can. This is a beautiful book in every way! You couldn't get a more touching, loving and even humorous account of having to deal with this tragedy than from this wonderful book. It speaks with heart-warming honesty ... cancer patients are a very special and brave lot and this book is a testament to it. Could not be more pleased!"


"A friend gave me this book recently, as I am just finishing a journey with cancer, and it helps to reaffirm trust, inner strength and the love that heals. I bought several to send to other friends who are experiencing the emotional and physical roller coaster that is part of this challenge. Kudos to the women who compiled this positive antidote to all the fear-based rhetoric one can find on the Internet or from rigid medicine. The love and gratitude expressed can do wonders for women, and I hope this book gets into every cancer center!"


"People who fight for their lives and show us the beauty of life are gifts. Each chapter in this book is a gift."



"I Am With You is a book of hope and healing for new cancer patients. Cancer survivors share different aspects of their cancer story in this very moving and inspiring book about life. It is a book for everyone. I originally bought the book because a friend of mine wrote one of the chapters. I bought another copy for a client who was struggling with severe medical issues. However, once I started reading, I opened up to so much more. It is a heart-felt experience. So far every story has brought me to tears. This should be essential reading for new cancer patients. If I were newly diagnosed with cancer and received this this book, I really wouldn't feel alone. If you know someone with cancer, reach out and be part of their community of support. They need you. Bring them dinner, walk their dog, watch TV together -- whatever it is they would like you to do. Love them.


Risks & Challenges

I published this anthology in March 2015. We sold out our first printing of 1,000 copies in 5 weeks. I am extraordinarily pleased with our success. My intention is to enhance the reach of this valuable book by getting it into cancer hospitals, oncologist offices, support groups, and any organization supporting those who are living with cancer. I have received wonderful encouraging responses from many of those institutions with the caveat, "We don't have funds in our budgets to deal with the emotional crises that cancer patients face." 

This campaign is an obvious opportunity to break through that obstacle. 

I am also inviting the many who have supported Nancy's List to fund this project. 

I believe that by personalizing the gift, having contributors state where and to whom they want the books to be delivered, accompanied by a note if they desire (perhaps a "thank you" to a nurse for her generosity in supporting your loved one), we will have more success.


Other Ways You Can Help

You can be helpful in so many ways. Talk about it in your social media community. Send a note to your friends and family who may be interested. Send me suggestions of how I can best promote this campaign (Nancy@NancysList.org) or names of people and institutions you believe I should approach. 

And you can use the Indiegogo share tools to make this all happen.

With immense gratitude, 

Nancy Novack Ph.D.
story_txt:
My name is Nancy Novack. I am the editor and author of this anthology for those who are living with cancer.

My Passion, My Mission

Jul 14, 2015

17views
0Comments


Share on LinkedIn
Share on Facebook
Share on Google Plus
Share on Twitter


I am Nancy Novack, Founder and Director of Nancy’s List and Nancy’s Club. I am immensely grateful to everyone who generously supports our commitment to improve the quality of the lives of our many neighbors who are living with cancer and those who love and care for them.
My MISSION is very clear … and I am PASSIONATE! I want to make very certain that no one in the world is alone in the dark with cancer.
I survived a lethal cancer diagnosis (April 29, 2004, stage 4 ovarian metastasized into my liver) and my gratitude for my life is abundant. I know the fear, the desperate anxiety, the profound loneliness, how broken and breathless one can feel when one hears those words,”You have cancer.”
I created the anthology I Am with You: Love Letters to Cancer Patients with 46 authors who truly understood my vision because it was so obvious. You are alone and perhaps awake all night. Your loved ones have gone to their warm beds and you are likely in a very strange bed in a extremely strange hospital room and you have never ever ever felt so scared. And even though you may be surrounded by nurses waking you up to give you a sleeping pill or perhaps a loved one standing beside you holding your hand and wiping your brow, the questions and worries are heart-breaking … “Am I going to die?” “What part of me is dying?” “Why me?” “Why now?” “Please help me. Please. Tell me I am not going to die.”
On that sleepless night, and for many thereafter, I needed to connect with people who knew how to talk to me, who understood what I was freaking out about, who had been there, who had the same or worse fears, who knew ME … who just simply knew who I was in that moment. I didn’t need answers to my enormous questioning but I so needed to feel connected to kindred spirits. I so needed that.
I am PASSIONATE about getting our anthology into the hands of patients when they need our support the most … in my mind, the night of their diagnosis. Our book can mean so much. We offer connection. We offer our wisdom and love and relationship, and our pragmatic ways of coping with the shock and awe. That is when we are needed … desperately needed.
My magnificent community of writers truly understood that our audience ideally would be those men and women of all ages … and those who love them and would care for them … who had just experienced one of life’s most traumatic experiences. The writers gathered from all over this country and a lovely man from Ireland joined us. We shared the same intention. We had experienced the same experience. We knew that the book of essays needed to address that time when a newly-diagnosed patient faces her or his dramatically changed world.
We were joined by a mission … to make a difference.We share passion, determination, camaraderie, memories, frustration.And we hold tight to our vision that we would have a balance … the number of men and women, the different diagnoses,the single occurrence vs. the many recurrences, the children, the families, the caregivers. We knew what we were doing and we did it very well.
We completed the book and it was published a month before expected. We generously gave it to hospitals and oncologists and cancer organizations. We did sell a good number and we received fabulous feedback. I anticipated that cancer hospitals and oncologists would jump for joy when we published … that now they had something REAL to offer these patients rather than a wicked diagnosis … something that immediately could bring these frightened persons a compassionate hand and heart and, most importantly, connection to sisters and brothers who had ‘walked the cancer walk’.
However … as some of you have heard me vent … that is not the reality. After donating so many books to various hospitals, the response is “beautiful, powerful, great work” AND “We have no budget to care for the emotional needs of our patients.” Oh, we knew that already!!! That is why we wrote the book!
This small book means so much to me and to the authors and designers. Creating this book together taught me far moreabout human beings and their capacity for love than I ever learned in kindergarten. Our book is a community ‘tour de force’ and I am very proud and honored to be in the same sentence as these remarkable courageous generous spirits.
I can’t be stopped when I have a passion. I am beginning a new approach … asking everyone I know and many I don’t knowto be very very sure thatNO ONE WILL EVER GO THROUGH CANCER ALONE.
I want your help. And I need it.
I want to take an author or two or ten and talk … radio, TV, cancer conferences, Oprah, whatever, and tell OUR story and why we care.
I invite people to donate to Nancy’s List so that I can donate books in their name … specifically to a doctor or hospital or infusion center or a nurse or whomever or whatever made a difference in their treatment. I want people to donate books in honor of a loved one’s recovery or in memory of the love they shared with a cancer patient. These books will be placed in the patients’ rooms the night of the diagnosis or in their new patient packets, in the infusion and radiation centers, in hospital libraries, the waiting rooms, in the oncologists’ offices.
Please send your contribution toNancy’s List3421 Pecos Street, Unit 4,Austin, Texas 78703.I will gift books to the doctor or institution of your choice. All donations are tax deductible to the extent permitted by law. Nancy’s List is a non-profit 501©(3) foundation. Our tax ID number is 20-5899826.

I ask everyone who has been touched by the book (and I so appreciate all your beautiful feedback) to push it all over social media with these links for ordering throughAmazon http://www.amazon.com/Am-You-Letters-Cancer-Patients/dp/0985939974/ref=sr_1_1?s=books&ie=UTF8&qid=1436709359&sr=1-1&keywords=I+am+with+you or Book Passage(www.BookPassage.com). Book Passage is a wonderful independent bookstore in San Francisco and Corte Madera.
Please pay it forward. And hit Amazon and give them your review …

Think about individuals (particularly ones who have had cancer and want to ‘give back’ to new patients), companies that make money off of cancer patients and ‘should’ give back, women’s and men’s philanthropic organizations,GOOD people who appreciate what we have created.
I want to write more books … for the parents of children who are diagnosed for cancer, for teens and young adults. I need to resolve these issues so we can move forward.
I LOVE what we created together. I want everyone in the world to benefit from our splendid work.
My PASSION is set in my heart … I want to be very sure that no one walks in the dark with cancer. We can help. We do.
With so much love and gratitude,Nancy Novack

story:
I started out writing my budget on a scrap piece of paper and with the method I implemented in Kashier notice how simple it was, but primarily how effective it was in keeping me in budget. It allowed me to know how much money I would need now and if I had plans to do something like take a vacation in 6 months to let me know exactly how much I would have then.  Everyone I shared it with felt the same way. Then it hit me I needed to put together something everyone could access this method and benefit from it.

So in September of  2012 I went all out in building the framework of the software and now need funding to automate the whole process and purchase the feeds to connect banking and stock data to Kashier.

Beyond just budgeting I want a tool that allowed you to structure your entire financial future by connecting all the needed aspects to grow your finances but keep it very simple; it will allow you to know where you are at financially, where you will be, set plans and know if you will make it, signal pitfalls, show you opportunities,  all this will be KASHIER!

story:
Dear friends,

In August 2010, a group of 5 queer people of color came together and articulated a desire to begin to build an LGBTQ-friendly/affirming people of color yoga community in Seattle.  Our primary goal has been to create and sustain a weekly yoga class for people of color (POC) that is explicitly queer and trans friendly and is led by instructors of color.  Over 150 people have participated in our classes!

In an effort to make our monthly class as accessible as possible, we ask participants to donate $0-10 to cover the cost of the instructor.  This makes our yoga class exceptionally affordable as the typical rates for yoga in Seattle are often above $15 a class.  Currently, we run solely on donations and we do not turn
away those who are unable to financial contribute.  It is because of our core value of creating an accessible POCyoga class that we require and are requesting financial support from people in community such as yourself.
This year we made two huge moves, firstly we moved into a beautiful space in the central district of Seattle and the other huge thing for us is we have now a monthly class.  When we first began this work we only had 1 class a month!

Yoga has been shown to be a valuable spiritual practice that impacts physical, mental, and emotional well-being of those who practice it.Yet, In the U.S., people of color are under-represented in yoga classes both as students and instructors.  Primary reasons that people of color don’t often attend yoga classes is: cost/financial inaccessibility of yoga classes, lack of people of color in yoga
classes can make spaces feel alienating, cultural appropriation can be off-putting (especially for Hindu and/or South Asian students), lack of yoga instructors who are people of color, location, etc.  For queer and trans people of color, poor folks, people of color with disabilities, and fat people of color, these barriers can also be
exacerbated by feeling that classes are not welcoming, or that instructors are not equipped to meet their unique needs.  Our classes are aiming to break down some of these barriers and make yoga accessible to diverse people of color in our community.

If you have questions or would like more information about POCyoga and/or our fundraising efforts, please feel free to get in touch.  I appreciate your consideration and support of this exciting community
project!

story:
Yo Amo la Vida/ I Love Life

El cáncer cervical es la primera causa de muerte por cáncer en la mujer guatemalteca. Debido a muchos factores económicos, sociales y de educación, muchas mujeres no pueden realizarse o incluso pagar una prueba de Papanicolaou. Desafortunadamente, estas mujeres consultan al médico cuando el cáncer ya está en un estadío avanzado. Esto, aunado al hecho de que muchas de estas mujeres no pueden costear un tratamiento de quimioterapia y radioterapia, imposibilita que ellas puedan ser tratadas adecuadamente.

Actualmente en Guatemala, el precio de un Papanicolaou varía entre Q35-Q150 dependiendo del área y la persona que lo realiza (puede ser una enfermera, un estudiante de medicina o un médico). Considerando que muchas mujeres en el área rural de Guatemala no trabajan, no pueden asistir a una clínica y pagar el monto mencionado anteriormente. Por otro lado, existen muchos factores culturales como machismo por parte de sus esposos e ignorancia, lo cual hace que estas mujeres tengan miedo de acercarse a su médico o a una clínica cercana a su aldea para realizárselo. 

En el club Rotaract Majadas, nos preocupamos por la población guatemalteca, y en especial por las mujeres, porque consideramos que son una parte importante de la población y deben recibir la atención médica adecuada, tanto preventiva como de tratamiento. Por eso, nuestro proyecto consiste en tres fases: concientización, la cual se enfoca en educar y empoderar a la mujer sobre la prevención del cáncer cervical; la detección temprana, organizando jornadas médicas para realizar Papanicolaous a las mujeres de comunidades rurales como Joya de las Flores en San Juan Sacatepéquez  por personal calificado; y por último, la fase de tratamiento, que es encontrarles a estas mujeres el lugar donde puedan recibir el tratamiento adecuado y poderlas acompañar durante todo el proceso. 

¡¡Ayúdennos a ayudar!! 


Cervical cancer is the main cause of death by cancer in the Guatemalan woman. Due to many economical, social, and educational factors, many women can't have a Papanicolaou done. Unfortunately, these women visit the doctor when the cancer is already in an advanced stage. This, together with the fact that many of these women can't pay the necessary chemo or radiotherapy, makes it almost impossible for these women to have the proper treatment. 

Currently, in Guatemala, the price of a Pap smear goes from about $4-20, depending on the area where this women live and on the health professional who makes it (it can be a nurse, a medical student, or a doctor). Considering the fact that in rural areas most of these women don't actually work, they can't go to the clinic and pay the aforementioned amount. On the other hand, there are also many other cultural factors such as chauvinism from the husbands and ignorance, which makes these women scared of approaching a doctor or a clinic to have a Pap smear done. 

At Rotaract Majadas, we worry about the Guatemalan population, and especially about Guatemalan women, because we consider them to be an important part of the population with a right to adequate medical attention: both prevention and treatment. That's why our project consists of three phases: conscientization, which focuses on educating and empowering women on cervical cancer prevention; early detection, organizing medical visits to have Pap smears done on these women by the adequate and qualified medical personnel; and the third phase, which is the treatment phase, aiming to find a place for these women where they can get the appropiate medical treatment and company throughout the process. 

Help us help!!

story:
Any questions regarding this crowdfunding campaign please feel free to email me at jonahlupton@gmail.com

HERE'S OUR STORY: in late September 2013 I achieved one of my long-time entrepreneurial goals and launched a supplement company called Nutraspire. The company offered high-quality products at very reasonable prices. Sales were strong and we only sold our products online. We didn't spend any money on marketing which kept overhead expenses low thus enabling us to pass those savings onto our customers. Things were going great for 12 months but then we ran into some major problems with our manufacturer such as order delays due to running out of ingredients and running out of bottles. After hearing that my manufacturer was likely going out of business, I decided in October 2014 it would be best to shut down the Nutraspire.com website and stop taking customer orders until I could find a more reliable manufacturer to partner with.

After speaking with nearly a dozen different manufacturers over the past 6 months I have finally partnered with a well established company that has been around for 25+ years serving some very well-known clients. This manufacturer has been named a "Top 100" global manufacturer and is listed on the "Inc. 5000" list. I am confident they'll do a wonderful job providing superior products to our customers. 

We are hoping to raise at least $25,000 to relaunch Nutraspire which added to the $20,000 we have already set aside will allow us to do our first big production run with the new manufacturer. 


PRODUCTS: we will be starting with the following products...

1. Fat burner (capsules)

2. Whey Protein (powder, available in 5-6 flavors)

3. Pre-workout (powder, 5-6 flavors)

4. BCAA's (powder, available in 4-5 flavors)

5. Testosterone Booster (capsules)

6. Creatine (powder, unflavored)

7. Men's & Women's Multi-vitamin (capsules)

8. Glutamine (powder, unflavored) 

9. Beta Alanine (powder)

10. Raspberry Ketones (capsules)

11. Joint pills (capsules)

*we are still working on a casein protein, whey isolate protein and a few others


PRICES: our prices will be very reasonable, we have not finalized them yet but I assure you they will be very similar to these...

1. Fat burner = $30 for 60 servings

2. Whey Protein = $28 for 20 servings

3. Pre-workout = $24 for 30 servings

4. BCAA's = $24 for 30 servings

5. Creatine = $15 for 30 servings

6. Men's & Women's Multi-vitamin = $14 for 30 servings

7. Glutamine = $16 for 30 servings

8. Testosterone Booster = $24 for 30 servings


SHIPPING: let's keep this simple...for anyone that gives to this crowdfunding campaign, your orders and products will be shipped for FREE.
